{"sentences": [{"text": "GONZALO RODRIGUEZ GACHA ALIAS "THE MEXICAN," A WELL-KNOWN COLOMBIAN DRUG TRAFFICKER WHO IS ONE OF THE DRUG LORDS OF THE MEDELLIN CARTEL HAS ADMITTED THAT HE IS IN FAVOR OF "CEASING OFFENSIVE ACTIONS AGAINST THE MILITARY FORCES.""}, {"text": "IN A LETTER TO THE OPPOSITION'S DAILY LA PRENSA EDITED IN BOGOTA, HE STRESSED THAT "THE MISSION EACH ONE OF US HAS AS COLOMBIAN CITIZENS IS TRYING TO RESTORE PEACE IN COLOMBIA.""}, {"text": "RODRIGUEZ GACHA, WHO ALONG WITH PABLO ESCOBAR HAVE BECOME THE COUNTRY'S MOST WANTED MEN, DENIED HAVING PROPOSED AN ALLIANCE WITH THE COMMUNIST GUERRILLAS OF THE REVOLUTIONARY ARMED FORCES OF COLOMBIA (FARC)."}, {"text": "ONLY 1 WEEK AGO, LA PRENSA REPORTED THAT RODRIGUEZ GACHA HAD PROPOSED AN ALLIANCE WITH THE FARC IN ORDER TO FACE THE WAR AGAINST DRUG TRAFFICKING DECLARED BY LIBERAL PRESIDENT VIRGILIO BARCO IN MID-AUGUST."}, {"text": ""THE TRUTH IS THAT THERE IS NO SUCH LETTER," SAID THE "CAPO" FOR WHOSE HEAD -- ALONG WITH PABLO ESCOBAR -- COLOMBIAN AUTHORITIES HAVE OFFERED A REWARD OF 100 MILLION PESOS (APPROXIMATELY $250,000)."}, {"text": "RODRIGUEZ GACHA ALSO RECALLED HIS STRUGGLE AGAINST THE FARC."}, {"text": "TAKING ADVANTAGE OF THE OCCASION, THE DRUG TRAFFICKER REJECTED ALL INFORMATION THAT STATING THAT HE IS THE "ACKNOWLEDGED PERPETRATOR OF ALL CRIMES AGAINST PATRIOTIC UNION LEADERS (UP).""}, {"text": "HE ADDED THAT ALTHOUGH HE WAS CHARGED WITH THE MURDER OF JAIME PARDO LEAL "THE COURT'S VERDICT WAS FAVORABLE TO ME.""}, {"text": "PARDO LEAL WAS THE FOUNDER AND FIRST PRESIDENT OF UP."}, {"text": "UP WAS FORMED IN 1984, DURING A TRUCE SIGNED BETWEEN FARC AND THE THEN SOCIAL CONSERVATIVE PRESIDENT BELISARIO BETANCUR."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS, PARDO LEAL WAS MURDERED BY TWO PAID ASSASSINS WHO RECEIVED ORDERS FROM "EL MEXICANO" ON 11 OCTOBER 1987."}, {"text": "RODRIGUEZ GACHA ARGUED: "NOBODY HAS BEEN CHASED WITH SUCH FIERCENESS IN COLOMBIA BEFORE AS I HAVE.""}, {"text": "HE ADDED: "IT SEEMS THAT ALL THE ARTICLES OF THE PENAL CODE HAVE BEEN THROWN AT ME AND MY DETRACTORS ARE NOT BINDED BY ANY OF THESE NORMS.""}, {"text": "AFTER HE INSISTED THAT OFFENSIVES AGAINST THE COLOMBIAN ARMED FORCES SHOULD STOP, RODRIGUEZ GACHA NOTED THAT THOSE WHO DISTURB PUBLIC ORDER "SHOULD DEFINITELY STOP USING WEAPONS.""}, {"text": ""THESE ARE THE FIRST STEPS THAT ARE NEEDED TO GET COLOMBIANS TO SIT AT A NEGOTIATING TABLE WITHOUT EXCLUDING ANYONE," HE CONCLUDED."}, {"text": "VIRGILIO BARCO'S GOVERNMENT HAS REJECTED ALL POSSIBILITY OF DIALOGUE WITH THE DRUG MAFIAS."}], {"sentences": [{"text": "THE ARMY OF NATIONAL LIBERATION (ELN) HAS ANNOUNCED IN A COMMUNIQUE SENT TO ANTONIO ROLDAN BETANCUR, GOVERNOR OF THE NORTHWESTERN ANTIOQUIA DEPARTMENT, THAT IT REJECTS THE PEACE PLAN PROPOSED BY THE GOVERNMENT AND THAT IT WILL CONTINUE ARMED ATTACKS, IT WAS LEARNED A FEW HOURS AGO."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO INITIAL REPORTS, THE ARMED MOVEMENT--THE MOST RADICAL OF THE GUERRILLA GROUPS IN THE COUNTRY--SENT THE MESSAGE THROUGH LUIS MESA PUERTA, A POLICE INSPECTOR OF EL TIGRE, WHO WAS KIDNAPED LAST FRIDAY FOR THIS PURPOSE."}, {"text": "ROLDAN BETANCUR DID NOT DISCLOSE ANY MORE DETAILS AND MERELY CONFIRMED THAT THE CASTROITE ELN, WHICH HAS STAGED SEVERAL DYNAMITE ATTACKS AGAINST OIL INSTALLATIONS, DID NOT ACCEPT THE PROPOSAL MADE BY PRESIDENT VIRGILIO BARCO VARGAS' GOVERNMENT."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, THE M-19 SENT A LETTER A FEW HOURS AGO TO MISAEL PASTRANA BORRERO, A FORMER PRESIDENT AND MEMBER OF THE OPPOSITION SOCIAL CONSERVATIVE PARTY (PSC), REQUESTING THAT HIS PARTY ACTIVELY PARTICIPATE IN A NEW PEACE INITIATIVE THAT FORMALLY BEGAN THE 2D WEEK OF JANUARY."}, {"text": "AT THAT TIME, ON BEHALF OF THE GOVERNMENT, RAFAEL PARDO RUEDA--THE PRESIDENTIAL ADVISER FOR PEACE--AND THE TOP M-19 COMMANDER, CARLOS PIZARRO LEON GOMEZ, SIGNED A PRELIMINARY AGREEMENT THAT CONTEMPLATES THE BEGINNING OF A DIRECT DIALOGUE BETWEEN THE GUERRILLA GROUPS AND SPOKESMEN OF THE POLITICAL PARTIES REPRESENTED IN PARLIAMENT."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, THE FARC, WHICH DECLARED A UNILATERAL TRUCE TO FACILIATE THE BEGINNING OF THE CONVERSATIONS, SAID THAT THESE AGREEMENTS WERE "EXCLUSIVE," AS THEY WERE SIGNED BY ONLY ONE OF THE COUNTRY'S REBEL MOVEMENTS."}, {"text": "THE DOCUMENT SIGNED BY THE GOVERNMENT AND THE M-19 SPECIFIES THAT THE TASKS WITH ALL THE REBEL ORGANIZATIONS ARE CONDUCTED THROUGH THE SIMON BOLIVAR NATIONAL GUERRILLA COORDINATING BOARD (CNGSB)."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, WITH THE ELN ANNOUNCEMENT, A JOINT AGREEMENT HAS BEEN RULED OUT."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, PRIOR TO LEAVING TODAY FOR CARACAS WHERE HE WILL ATTEND THE INAUGURATION OF CARLOS ANDRES PEREZ, THE PRESIDENT HELD A MEETING WITH THE CHIEFS OF THE TWO TRADITIONAL PARTIES, FORMER PRESIDENTS JULIO CESAR TURBAY OF THE RULING LIBERAL PARTY, AND PASTRANA BORRERO, OF THE PSC."}, {"text": "THE MEETING HELD AT THE NARINO PALACE (SEAT OF THE GOVERNMENT) WAS CALLED SO THAT BARCO VARGAS COULD REPORT TO THE PSC ON THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE MOST RECENT EVENTS CONCERNING THE NEW PEACE PROCESS THAT BEGAN WITH THE M-19."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO SOME POLITICAL CIRCLES, IN THIS MANNER THE PATH TOWARD PEACE MIGHT BE CLEARED, INASMUCH AS ONE OF THE "RESERVATIONS" THE PSC HAD WAS THAT THE BARCO VARGAS GOVERNMENT DID NOT CONSULT WITH THE PARTIES ON THE NEGOTIATIONS."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0062", "message_template": 1, "message_template_optional": true, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 01 FEB 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", {"sentences": [{"text": "THE ROME FOREIGN MINISTRY ON FRIDAY CONFIRMED THAT TWO ITALIAN ENGINEERS AND A SPANISH TECHNICIAN WERE KIDNAPPED THURSDAY IN COLOMBIA FROM A CONSTRUCTION SITE SOME THIRTY KILOMETERS FROM THE CITY OF MEDELLIN."}, {"text": "THE TWO ITALIANS, ROBERTO ROASCIO OF MILAN AND MARIO ACCURSO OF ROME, TOGETHER WITH SPANIARD FRANCISCO PUJA, WERE TAKEN HOSTAGE FROM THE WORK SITE WHERE THE MILANESE FIRM "TORNO" IS COLLABORATING IN THE CONSTRUCTION OF A HYDRO-ELECTRIC PLANT BEING FINANCED BY THE WORLD BANK."}, {"text": "THE FOREIGN MINISTRY ADDED THAT IT WAS IN CONSTANT CONTACT WITH ROME'S AMBASSADOR TO BOGOTA', FILIPPO ANFUSO, AND THAT THE EMBASSY'S STAFF WAS WORKING WITH LOCAL AUTHORITIES TO ASCERTAIN THE DYNAMICS OF THE KIDNAPPING AND WHO MAY HAVE BEEN RESPONSIBLE."}, {"sentences": [{"text": "THE BODIES OF THE SPANISH JESUITS MURDERED LAST FRIDAY (17 NOVEMBER) BY UNIFORMED INDIVIDUALS WERE BURIED IN SAN SALVADOR TODAY."}, {"text": "THE SPANISH GOVERNMENT HAS ASKED THE SALVADORAN GOVERNMENT FOR EXPLANATIONS CONCERNING THESE DEATHS."}, {"text": "TODAY IN PARIS THE SPANISH PRIME MINISTER SAID THAT FUTURE CONFIDENCE IN THE GOVERNMENT LED BY ALFREDO CRISTIANI DEPENDS ON THE RESPONSE TO THIS REQUEST FOR AN IMMEDIATE INVESTIGATION: (BEGIN RECORDING) (GONZALEZ) THE GREATEST POSSIBLE EFFORT SHOULD BE MADE IMMEDIATELY TO INVESTIGATE WHAT HAPPENED REGARDING MURDERS WHICH SOME PEOPLE ARE APPARENTLY INTERPRETING IN TERMS OF WHETHER OR NOT THEY ARE SPANISH, OR SPANISH CITIZENS WHO TOOK ON SALVADORAN CITIZENSHIP, BUT REGARDLESS OF WHETHER OR NOT SOME OF THE CITIZENS WHO SUFFERED THIS APPALLING ATTACK, THIS MURDER, WERE SPANISH."}, {"text": "OUR CONCERN OBVIOUSLY IS NOT EXPRESSED MERELY IN TERMS OF THIS OR THAT NATIONALITY BECAUSE THIS MURDER IS A HIDEOUS CRIME AND THUS THE MATTER MUST BE CLEARED UP AS SOON AS POSSIBLE, AND FURTHERMORE MUCH OF THE EFFORT OF CONFIDENCE IN THE FUTURE OF (WORDS INDISTINCT) WITH REGARD TO THAT COUNTRY DEPENDS UPON IT."}, {"text": "(END RECORDING) A SPANISH DIPLOMATIC DELEGATION HEADED BY UNDERSECRETARY FOR FOREIGN AFFAIRS INOCENCIO ARIAS ATTENDED THE BURIAL OF THE JESUITS."}, {"text": "HE PUT HIMSELF AT THE DISPOSAL {"sentences": [{"text": "DESPITE AMPLE EVIDENCE, NO SALVADORAN GOVERNMENT HAD BLAMED THE ARMED FORCES OF KILLING DEFENSELESS CIVILIANS SINCE THE CIVIL WAR WORSENED IN 1979."}, {"text": "THE ANNOUNCEMENT MADE BY PRESIDENT ALFREDO CRISTIANI OF THE ARREST OF 45 SOLDIERS AND 2 OFFICERS FOR KILLING 6 CLERGYMEN, A MAID, AND HER DAUGHTER, ON 16 NOVEMBER IS IN ITSELF A SMALL AND PARTIAL MILESTONE."}, {"text": "CRISTIANI, WHOSE NATIONALIST REPUBLICAN ALLIANCE PARTY WAS FOUNDED AT THE BEGINNING OF THE EIGHTIES BY INDIVIDUALS LINKED TO PARAMILITARY BANDS, THE ARMY, AND SECURITY CORPS, ASSERTED THAT THE NAMES OF THOSE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE CRIMES WILL BE RELEASED IN THE NEXT 48 HOURS."}, {"text": "JESUIST FRANCISCO ESTRADA, WHO REPLACED FATHER JOSE IGNACIO ELLACURIA -- ONE OF THOSE MASSACRED -- AT THE RECTORSHIP OF THE CENTRAL AMERICAN UNIVERSITY IN SAN SALVADOR, WARNED THAT IT IS NOT ENOUGH TO KNOW WHICH SARGENT PULLED THE TRIGGER BUT WHO GAVE HIM ORDERS TO DO SO NEEDS TO BE REVEALED."}, {"text": "CRISTIANI WILL NOT GO THAT FAR."}, {"text": "COSMETIC SACRIFICES ARE MADE IN ORDER TO NEUTRALIZE THE THREAT OF U.S. CONGRESS INTERRUPTING THE $1.5 MILLION IT SENDS A DAY FOR THE WAR AGAINST THE FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT (FMLN) AND THE REPRESSION OF THE PEOPLE."}, {"text": "THE DISMISSAL OF GENERAL JUAN RAFAEL BUSTILLO AS CHIEF OF THE AIR FORCES AND THE POSSIBLE PUNISHMENT OF SOME OF THE COUNTERINSURGENT ATLACATL BATTALION FULFILL THESE REQUIREMENTS."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, CRISTIANI WILL ATTEND THE NEXT INFORMAL SUMMIT OF CENTRAL AMERICAN PRESIDENTS IN TEGUCIGALPA, HONDURAS ON 28 JANUARY UNDER ADVERSE CONDITIONS."}, {"text": "THE MOBILIZATION OF THE LATIN AMERICAN PUBLIC OPINION AGAINST THE U.S. INTERVENTION IN PANAMA AND ITS AIM OF EXTENDING THE INTERVENTION TO OTHER NATIONS OF THE AREA HAVE WEAKENED WASHINGTON'S DIPLOMATIC SPACE."}, {"text": "THIS COULD HAVE AN EFFECT ON ITS POLITICAL ALLY OF EL SALVADOR WHICH, IN THE PREVIOUS SUMMIT HELD IN DECEMBER, PRESENTED NICARAGUA AND THE FMLN AS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE WORSENING OF THE CRISIS IN CENTRAL AMERICA."}, {"text": "THE FACTS ARE CONCLUSIVE."}, {"text": "WHAT WILL NOW BE THE EXCUSE OF SALVADORAN PRESIDENT ALFREDO CRISTIANI AND HIS PROTECTOR GEORGE BUSH?"}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0069", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": {"sentences": [{"text": "TWO U.S. MORMON MISSIONARIES -- AGED 19 AND 21 -- WERE SHOT TO DEATH LAST NIGHT BY A GROUP OF TERRORISTS FROM THE ZARATE WILKA ARMED FORCES OF LIBERATION (FAL)."}, {"text": "THIS IS THE SAME TERRORIST GROUP THAT CLAIMED CREDIT FOR THE FOILED ATTACK AGAINST FORMER U.S. SECRETARY OF STATE GEORGE SHULTZ IN AUGUST 1988."}, {"text": "IN OCTOBER, THE GROUP BLEW UP THE LINES PROVIDING POWER TO LA PAZ, RESULTING IN A POWER OUTAGE THERE."}, {"text": "THE GROUP ALSO CLAIMED CREDIT FOR THE JANUARY DYNAMITE BOMBING IN THE CONGRESS."}, {"text": "THE MURDER TOOK PLACE AT 2220 LAST NIGHT AND, 30 MINUTES LATER, THE TERRORISTS LEFT MESSAGES WITH LOCAL NEWSPAPERS CLAIMING TO BE THE ASSAILANTS."}, {"text": "THE MESSAGE, WHICH WAS HANDRITTEN, SAID: "THE VIOLATION OF OUR NATIONAL SOVEREIGNTY CANNOT REMAIN UNPUNISHED."}, {"text": "THIS IS A WARNING TO THE YANKEE INVADERS WHO COME HERE TO MASSACRE OUR PEASANT BROTHERS AND TO THEIR LACKEYS."}, {"text": "WE POOR HAVE NO OTHER OPTION BUT TO TAKE UP ARMS."}, {"text": "OUR HATRED IS IMPLACABLE, AND OUR WAR IS TO THE DEATH."}, {"text": "FAL, ZARATE WILKA.""}, {"text": "THE U.S. CITIZENS -- TODD RAY WILSON BURDENSON AND JEFFREY BRENT BALL -- WERE MISSIONARIES OF THE CHRISTIAN CHURCH OF LATTER DAY SAINTS (HEADQUARTERED IN UTAH), WHICH, IN RECENT YEARS, HAS EXTENDED ITS ACTIVITIES IN BOLIVIA BY BUILDING DOZENS OF TEMPLES."}, {"text": "BOTH MISSIONARIES HAD LIVED IN THE VICINITY OF THE GENERAL CEMETERY LOCATED IN A DENSELY POPULATED LA PAZ DISTRICT."}, {"text": "THEY WERE KILLED WITH TWO BURSTS OF MACHINEGUN FIRE."}, {"text": "A MORMON CHURCH SPOKESMAN SAID THAT THIS WAS AN ATTACK AGAINST "TWO INNOCENT PEOPLE" AND CALLED ON THE POLICE TO SOLVE THE MURDER."}, {"text": "HE SAID THAT LAST YEAR DYNAMITE WAS PLACED AT A TEMPLE IN THE SAME AREA BUT THAT THE CULPRITS WERE NEVER IDENTIFIED."}, {"text": "THE BOLIVIAN GOVERNMENT HAS CONDEMNED THE ATTACK AND ORDERED AN IMMEDIATE INVESTIGATION."}, {"text": "DEPUTY INTERIOR MINISTER WALTER COSTAS ANNOUNCED THAT THE TRAFFIC AND POLICE DEPARTMENTS WILL CARRY OUT DRAGNETS IN LA PAZ."}, {"text": "THE KILLING OF THE U.S. MISSIONARIES HAS COINCIDED WITH THE ARRIVAL IN BOLIVIA OF THE FIRST CONTINGENT OF U.S. MILITARY ENGINEERS, TECHNICIANS, AND TROOPS, WHO WILL BE IN CHARGE OF THE TASK OF LEVELING PATTI-PATTI HILL TO BUILD AN AIRPORT FOR THE CITY OF POTOSI."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0071", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["24 MAY 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": {"sentences": [{"text": "AFTER A HUGE EFFORT THE ELECTRIC SUPPLY SYSTEM WAS QUICKLY RESTORED IN THE METROPOLITAN REGION AND THE REST OF THE COUNTRY WHICH ON SATURDAY NIGHT WAS AFFECTED BY A BLACKOUT EXTENDING FROM COPIAPO, IN NORTHERN CHILE, TO TALCA, IN SOUTHERN CHILE."}, {"text": "CHILECTRA (CHILEAN ELECTRIC COMPANY, LTD.) AND ENDESA (NATIONAL ELECTRIC POWER, INC.) HAVE ASKED FOR THE CITIZENRY'S UNDERSTANDING."}, {"text": "THESE COMPANIES ASKED THE CITIZENRY TO BE AWARE THAT THE PROBLEMS AND TECHNICAL FAILURES WILL BE REPAIRED IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE PERSONNEL AVAILABLE."}, {"text": "THE COMPANIES CONCLUDED BY STATING THAT THE TERRORIST ATTACKS AFFECTED THE MAIN POWERLINE AND THAT THE ELECTRIC SUPPLY TO SOME TOWNS WILL BE RESTORED IN THE NEXT FEW HOURS."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0072", "message_template": 1, "message_template_optional": true, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 27 NOV 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["CHILE"], "document_mentions": [[210, 215], [239, 244], [246, 251], [257, 262]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[210, 215], [239, 244]], "1": [[0, 5], [11, 16]]}}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["COPIAPO"], "strings_rhs": ["CITY"], "document_mentions": [[189, 196]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[189, 196]]}}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["TALCA"], "strings_rhs": ["CITY"], "document_mentions": [[220, 225]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[220, 225]]}}], "incident_type": "ATTACK", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["ACCOMPLISHED"]}, "incident_instrument_id": null, "perp_incident_category": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["TERRORIST ACT"]}, "perp_individual_id": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["TERRORIST"], "document_mentions": [[572, 581]], "sentence_mentions": {"3": [[44, 53]]}}], "perp_organization_id": null, "perp_organization_confidence": null, "phys_tgt_id": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["MAIN POWERLINE", "POWERLINE"], "document_mentions": [[603, 617], [608, 617]], "sentence_mentions": {"3": [[75, 89], [80, 89]]}}], "phys_tgt_effect_of_incident": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["SOME DAMAGE"], "strings_rhs": ["MAIN POWERLINE", "POWERLINE"]}], "hum_tgt_name": null, "hum_tgt_description": null, "hum_tgt_effect_of_incident": null}, "hit_id": 49}

{"sentences": [{"text": "POLICE TODAY REPORTED THAT DURING THE LAST FEW HOURS TERRORISTS STAGED THREE BOMB ATTACKS AGAINST U.S. PROPERTIES."}, {"text": "NO ONE HAS CLAIMED RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE ATTACKS SO FAR."}, {"text": "THEY AFFECTED THE U.S.-CHILEAN CULTURAL INSTITUTE, A MORMON CHURCH IN THE CAPITAL, AND A BRANCH OF THE "CITICORP" FINANCIAL FIRM IN VINA DEL MAR, 125 KM NORTHEAST OF SANTIAGO."}, {"text": "CARABINEROS HAVE REPORTED THAT A BOMB, WHICH WAS PLACED ON THE 5TH FLOOR OF THE CHILEAN-U.S. CULTURAL INSTITUTE, 150 METERS FROM THE GOVERNMENT PALACE, WENT OFF LAST NIGHT CAUSING DAMAGE BUT NO VICTIMS."}, {"text": "THE BOMB HAD BEEN MANUFACTURED WITH L KILO OF AMMONIUM GELAGNITE AND WAS ACTIVATED WITH A FUSE, POLICE SOURCES SAID."}, {"text": "AT 0LL5 THIS MORNING (0415 GMT) INCENDIARY BOMBS WERE HURLED AT A MORMON TEMPLE AT NUNOA DISTRICT, IN SANTIAGO."}, {"text": "THE BOMBS CAUSED MINOR DAMAGE."}, {"text": "AT THE TIME OF THE ATTACK THE BUILDING WAS EMPTY, ACCORDING TO THE SOURCES."}, {"text": "THE ATTACKERS PAINTED THE WALLS AND LEFT PAMPHLETS WITH ULTRA-LEFTIST MESSAGES OF THE LAUTARO YOUTH FRONT."}, {"text": "A BOMB, WHICH SHATTERED THE GLASSES AND DESTROYED THE MASONRY OF THE "CITICORP" FINANCIAL COMPANY OFFICES IN DOWNTOWN VINA DEL MAR, EXPLODED TODAY SHORTLY AFTER 0200 (0500 GMT)."}, {"text": "THE POLICE REPORTED THAT ANOTHER BOMB WAS DISCOVERED AND DEFUSED BEFORE IT EXPLODED AT A CATHOLIC SCHOOL IN VINA DEL MAR."}, {"text": "A FEW DAYS AGO, THE CHILEAN-U.S. CULTURAL INSTITUTES IN VINA DEL MAR, TALCA, AND TEMUCO WERE THE TARGET OF BOMB ATTACKS."}, {"text": "THE MANUEL RODRIGUEZ PATRIOTIC FRONT (FPMR), WHICH THE PINOCHET REGIME CONSIDERS TO BE THE COMMUNIST PARTY'S ARMED BRANCH, ANNOUNCED FOLLOWING THE U.S. INVASION OF PANAMA THAT IT WOULD ATTACK "U.S. INTERESTS IN CHILE.""}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0073", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["28 DEC 89 - 29 DEC {"sentences": [{"text": "JOSE ALEJANDRO BONIVENTO, FORMER PRESIDENT OF THE SUPREME COURT OF JUSTICE AND CURRENT MEMBER OF THE COURT OF APPEALS, RESIGNED HIS POST TODAY, CLAIMING THAT HE HAD BEEN SUBJECTED TO UNDUE PRESSURE BY THE GOVERNMENT."}, {"text": "BONIVENTO MAINTAINS THAT IN APPLYING WHAT IS TANTAMOUNT TO A STATE OF SIEGE, THE GOVERNMENT IS ISSUING MEASURES AND WANTS THEM TO BE DECLARED CONSTITUTIONAL FOR ITS CONVENIENCE AND TO SATISFY FOREIGN INTERESTS."}, {"text": "IT WAS ANNOUNCED THAT 40 JUDGES MIGHT RESIGN NEXT WEEK TO PROTEST THE ASSASSINATION OF THEIR COLLEAGUE MARIELA ESPINOSA ARANGO."}, {"text": "COLOMBIAN JUDGES TODAY BEGAN A NUMBER OF STAGGERED STOPPAGES TO PROTEST THE ASSASSINATION OF JUDGE MARIELA ESPINOSA ARANGO THE EVENING OF 1 NOVEMBER IN MEDELLIN."}, {"text": "A TOTAL OF 17,000 JUDGES PARTICIPATED IN A 2-HOUR STOPPAGE."}, {"text": "THERE WILL BE TWO SIMILAR ACTIONS THE MORNING AND AFTERNOON OF 3 NOVEMBER."}, {"text": "MEDELLIN'S SUPERIOR COURT WILL BE IN RECESS FOR 1 WEEK."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, THE SUPREME COURT OF JUSTICE COMPLAINED THAT FIVE JUDGES HAVE BEEN KILLED IN 2 MONTHS, AND IT REQUESTED A MEETING WITH PRESIDENT VIRGILIO BARCO."}, {"text": "JUDGE ESPINOSA WAS BURIED THIS AFTERNOON."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0074", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": {"sentences": [{"text": "A COLOMBIAN JUDGE HAS PAID THE HIGHEST PRICE FOR DOING HER DUTY."}, {"text": "MARIA ELENA DIAZ PEREZ, THIRD JUDGE OF PUBLIC ORDER, AND TWO OF HER BODYGUARDS FROM THE DAS (ADMINISTRATIVE DEPARTMENT OF SECURITY), WERE ASSASSINATED IN MEDELLIN TODAY BY A GROUP OF 10 PAID ASSASSINS IN TWO CARS, A MAZDA AND WHAT WAS THOUGHT TO BE A MERCURY."}, {"text": "SHE WAS TRAVELING HOME IN HER CAR TODAY AT NOON."}, {"text": "ABOUT HALF A BLOCK FROM HER HOME, HER CAR, A TOYOTA WITH LICENSE PLATE NO. A-3037, WAS INTERCEPTED BY A WHITE MAZDA AND POSSIBLY A MERCURY."}, {"text": "DIAZ' DRIVER HAD TO HIT THE BRAKES, AS THE MOTORCYCLE OF ONE OF HER BODYGUARDS SLAMMED INTO THE REAR OF HER CAR."}, {"text": "IN A MATTER OF SECONDS, THE 10 PAID ASSASSINS OPENED FIRE ON THE JUDGE'S CAR."}, {"text": "A TOTAL OF 55 9-MM SUBMACHINE GUN ROUNDS HIT THE LEFT SIDE OF THE CAR."}, {"text": "THE JUDGE, WHO WAS SITTING IN THE BACK SEAT, WAS ABLE TO LEAVE THE CAR AND RUN, BUT SHE WAS ONLY ABLE TO TAKE A FEW STEPS BEFORE BEING GUNNED DOWN BY 19 BULLETS."}, {"text": "TWO OF HER DAS BODYGUARDS, DAGOBERTO RODRIGUEZ AND ALFONSO DE LIMA, WHO WERE INSIDE THE CAR, WERE KILLED INSTANTLY."}, {"text": "NO ONE HAS BEEN ARRESTED YET IN CONNECTION WITH THIS INCIDENT."}, {"text": "THE TRUTH IS THAT THE MANY THREATS MADE AGAINST HER BECAME A REALITY TODAY."}, {"text": "MARIA ELENA DIAZ, 34, WILL BE BURIED IN MEDELLIN TOMORROW."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0075", "message_template": 1, {"sentences": [{"text": "A COLOMBIAN JUDGE HAS PAID THE HIGHEST PRICE FOR DOING HER DUTY."}, {"text": "MARIA ELENA DIAZ PEREZ, THIRD JUDGE OF PUBLIC ORDER, AND TWO OF HER BODYGUARDS FROM THE DAS (ADMINISTRATIVE DEPARTMENT OF SECURITY), WERE ASSASSINATED IN MEDELLIN TODAY BY A GROUP OF 10 PAID ASSASSINS IN TWO CARS, A MAZDA AND WHAT WAS THOUGHT TO BE A MERCURY."}, {"text": "SHE WAS TRAVELING HOME IN HER CAR TODAY AT NOON."}, {"text": "ABOUT HALF A BLOCK FROM HER HOME, HER CAR, A TOYOTA WITH LICENSE PLATE NO. A-3037, WAS INTERCEPTED BY A WHITE MAZDA AND POSSIBLY A MERCURY."}, {"text": "DIAZ' DRIVER HAD TO HIT THE BRAKES, AS THE MOTORCYCLE OF ONE OF HER BODYGUARDS SLAMMED INTO THE REAR OF HER CAR."}, {"text": "IN A MATTER OF SECONDS, THE 10 PAID ASSASSINS OPENED FIRE ON THE JUDGE'S CAR."}, {"text": "A TOTAL OF 55 9-MM SUBMACHINE GUN ROUNDS HIT THE LEFT SIDE OF THE CAR."}, {"text": "THE JUDGE, WHO WAS SITTING IN THE BACK SEAT, WAS ABLE TO LEAVE THE CAR AND RUN, BUT SHE WAS ONLY ABLE TO TAKE A FEW STEPS BEFORE BEING GUNNED DOWN BY 19 BULLETS."}, {"text": "TWO OF HER DAS BODYGUARDS, DAGOBERTO RODRIGUEZ AND ALFONSO DE LIMA, WHO WERE INSIDE THE CAR, WERE KILLED INSTANTLY."}, {"text": "NO ONE HAS BEEN ARRESTED YET IN CONNECTION WITH THIS INCIDENT."}, {"text": "THE TRUTH IS THAT THE MANY THREATS MADE AGAINST HER BECAME A REALITY TODAY."}, {"text": "MARIA ELENA DIAZ, 34, WILL BE BURIED IN MEDELLIN TOMORROW."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0075", "message_template": 2, "message_template_optional": true, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 28 JUL 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["COLOMBIA"], "document_mentions": [[2, 10]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[2, 10]]}}], "incident_type": "ATTACK", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["THREATENED"]}, "incident_instrument_id": null, "perp_incident_category": null, "perp_individual_id": null, "perp_organization_id": null, "perp_organization_confidence": null, "phys_tgt_id": null, "phys_tgt_effect_of_incident": null, "hum_tgt_name": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["MARIA ELENA DIAZ PEREZ"], "document_mentions": [[65, 87]], "sentence_mentions": {"1": [[0, 22]]}}], "hum_tgt_description": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["THIRD JUDGE OF PUBLIC ORDER", "JUDGE"], "strings_rhs": ["MARIA ELENA DIAZ PEREZ"]}], "hum_tgt_effect_of_incident": null}, "hit_id": 59}

{"sentences": [{"text": "THE POLICE INSTITUTION REPORTED TODAY THAT THE RISARALDA PROVINCE 3D DISTRICT POLICE COMMANDER'S WIFE, STELA TORRADO DE OTALORA, WAS KILLED ON MONDAY, 4 AUGUST."}, {"text": "THE VICTIM, MARRIED TO MAJOR JAIRO OTALORA, WAS SHOT TO DEATH IN HER VEHICLE WHILE ON PEREIRA - BELEN DE UMBRIA ROAD, IN THE COLOMBIAN COFFEE AREA, APPROXIMATELY 300 KM TO THE WEST OF BOGOTA."}, {"text": "THE PERSON DRIVING THE VEHICLE WAS ALSO KILLED."}, {"text": "THE CRIMINALS, RIDING MOTORCYCLES, INTERCEPTED THE R-18 VEHICLE THAT CARRIED THE POLICE OFFICER'S WIFE, STELA TORRADO, 32."}, {"sentences": [{"text": "LIBERAL SENATOR FEDERICO ESTRADA VELEZ WAS KIDNAPPED ON 3 APRIL AT THE CORNER OF 60TH AND 48TH STREETS IN WESTERN MEDELLIN, ONLY 100 METERS FROM A METROPOLITAN POLICE CAI (IMMEDIATE ATTENTION CENTER)."}, {"text": "THE ANTIOQUIA DEPARTMENT LIBERAL PARTY LEADER HAD LEFT HIS HOUSE WITHOUT ANY BODYGUARDS ONLY MINUTES EARLIER."}, {"text": "AS HE WAITED FOR THE TRAFFIC LIGHT TO CHANGE, THREE HEAVILY ARMED MEN FORCED HIM TO GET OUT OF HIS CAR AND GET INTO A BLUE RENAULT."}, {"text": "HOURS LATER, THROUGH ANONYMOUS TELEPHONE CALLS TO THE METROPOLITAN POLICE AND TO THE MEDIA, THE EXTRADITABLES CLAIMED RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE KIDNAPPING."}, {"text": "IN THE CALLS, THEY ANNOUNCED THAT THEY WILL RELEASE THE SENATOR WITH A NEW MESSAGE FOR THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT."}, {"sentences": [{"text": "THE EXTRADITABLES, A COLOMBIAN MAFIA GROUP LINKED WITH DRUG TRAFFICKING ACTIVITIES, ANNOUNCED TODAY THAT THEY WILL LAY DOWN THEIR WEAPONS AND SUSPEND THEIR COCAINE SHIPMENTS."}, {"text": "THE EXTRADITABLES ADMITTED TO THE GOVERNMENT'S VICTORY AND ADMITTED THAT THEY WANT PEACE IN COLOMBIA."}, {"text": "THE EXTRADITABLES ALSO ANNOUNCED THAT THEY WILL RELEASE ALL THE PEOPLE THEY HAVE ABDUCTED."}, {"text": "THEY ADDED THAT THERE WILL NOT BE ANY MORE BOMBINGS, TERRORIST ATTACKS OR MURDERS OF GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS, LAWYERS, AND JOURNALISTS."}, {"text": "THE {"sentences": [{"text": "A SALVADORAN COURT YESTERDAY PRESENTED A SWORN DECLARATION BY PRESIDENT JOSE NAPOLEON DUARTE IN WHICH HE LINKS RIGHTIST LEADER ROBERTO D'AUBUISSON TO THE MARCH 1980 ASSASSINATION OF ARCHBISHOP OSCAR ARNULFO ROMERO."}, {"text": "THE DECLARATION, WHICH THE ATTORNEY GENERAL'S OFFICE REQUESTED FROM THE FOURTH PENAL COURT, DID NOT PROVIDE DETAILS REGARDING EVIDENCE THAT COULD BE USED TO SOLVE THE CASE OF MONSIGNOR ROMERO, WHO WAS A STAUNCH CRITIC OF THE GOVERNMENT BECAUSE OF ITS ALLEGED HUMAN RIGHTS VIOLATIONS."}, {"text": "THE DOCUMENT CONTAINS A LIST OF THE NAMES OF 12 ARMY OFFICERS AND 12 CIVILIANS WHO WERE ALLEGEDLY INVOLVED IN PLOTTING TO OUST THE REVOLUTIONARY GOVERNMENT JUNTA THAT TOOK OVER IN OCTOBER 1979 AFTER OVERTHROWING GENERAL HUMBERTO ROMERO."}, {"text": "THE LIST OF PLOTTERS INCLUDES RIGHTIST DEPUTY D'AUBUISSON, FOUNDER OF THE NATIONALIST REPUBLICAN ALLIANCE (ARENA) -- THE WINNER IN THE RECENT ELECTIONS -- AND CAPTAIN ALVARO SARAVIA, WHOM THE PRESIDENT ACCUSED OF BEING THE MASTERMINDS OF THE ASSASSINATION OF THE CLERGYMAN."}, {"text": "THE LIST ALSO INCLUDES THE NAMES OF CIVILIANS INVOLVED IN THE KIDNAPPING OF SEVERAL SALVADORAN BUSINESSMEN EARLY IN THE DECADE."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO DUARTE'S DECLARATION, 1ST INFANTRY BRIGADE SOLDIERS ARRESTED THE 24 COUP PLOTTERS IN 1980, AND SEVERAL DOCUMENTS WERE SEIZED FROM THEM, INCLUDING A NOTEBOOK WITH PLANS FOR KILLING ROMERO."}, {"text": "THE U.S. SENATE HAS A NOTEBOOK OWNED BY CAPT SARAVIA, AND SALVADORAN JUDICIAL AUTHORITIES ARE INVESTIGATING HOW THE U.S. SENATE ENDED UP WITH IT."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO DUARTE, "COLONEL ADOLFO ARNULFO MAJANO, A MEMBER OF THE REVOLUTIONARY JUNTA THAT OUSTED GEN ROMERO, HAD THE DOCUMENTS.""}, {"text": "THE SALVADORAN SUPREME COURT RECENTLY REVOKED A SALVADORAN GOVERNMENT EXTRADITION REQUEST FOR SARAVIA, WHOM THE GOVERNMENT WANTED TO QUESTION TO HELP SOLVE THE ROMERO CASE."}, {"text": "THE ARCHBISHOP WAS KILLED BY A SNIPER WHILE SAYING MASS AT A HOSPITAL FOR CANCER PATIENTS."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0083", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["01 MAR 80 - 31 MAR 80"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], "document_mentions": [], "sentence_mentions": {}}], "incident_type": "ATTACK", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"sentences": [{"text": "A SALVADORAN COURT YESTERDAY PRESENTED A SWORN DECLARATION BY PRESIDENT JOSE NAPOLEON DUARTE IN WHICH HE LINKS RIGHTIST LEADER ROBERTO D'AUBUISSON TO THE MARCH 1980 ASSASSINATION OF ARCHBISHOP OSCAR ARNULFO ROMERO."}, {"text": "THE DECLARATION, WHICH THE ATTORNEY GENERAL'S OFFICE REQUESTED FROM THE FOURTH PENAL COURT, DID NOT PROVIDE DETAILS REGARDING EVIDENCE THAT COULD BE USED TO SOLVE THE CASE OF MONSIGNOR ROMERO, WHO WAS A STAUNCH CRITIC OF THE GOVERNMENT BECAUSE OF ITS ALLEGED HUMAN RIGHTS VIOLATIONS."}, {"text": "THE DOCUMENT CONTAINS A LIST OF THE NAMES OF 12 ARMY OFFICERS AND 12 CIVILIANS WHO WERE ALLEGEDLY INVOLVED IN PLOTTING TO OUST THE REVOLUTIONARY GOVERNMENT JUNTA THAT TOOK OVER IN OCTOBER 1979 AFTER OVERTHROWING GENERAL HUMBERTO ROMERO."}, {"text": "THE LIST OF PLOTTERS INCLUDES RIGHTIST DEPUTY D'AUBUISSON, FOUNDER OF THE NATIONALIST REPUBLICAN ALLIANCE (ARENA) -- THE WINNER IN THE RECENT ELECTIONS -- AND CAPTAIN ALVARO SARAVIA, WHOM THE PRESIDENT ACCUSED OF BEING THE MASTERMINDS OF THE ASSASSINATION OF THE CLERGYMAN."}, {"text": "THE LIST ALSO INCLUDES THE NAMES OF CIVILIANS INVOLVED IN THE KIDNAPPING OF SEVERAL SALVADORAN BUSINESSMEN EARLY IN THE DECADE."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO DUARTE'S DECLARATION, 1ST INFANTRY BRIGADE SOLDIERS ARRESTED THE 24 COUP PLOTTERS IN 1980, AND SEVERAL DOCUMENTS WERE SEIZED FROM THEM, INCLUDING A NOTEBOOK WITH PLANS FOR KILLING ROMERO."}, {"text": "THE U.S. SENATE HAS A NOTEBOOK OWNED BY CAPT SARAVIA, AND SALVADORAN JUDICIAL AUTHORITIES ARE INVESTIGATING HOW THE U.S. SENATE ENDED UP WITH IT."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO DUARTE, "COLONEL ADOLFO ARNULFO MAJANO, A MEMBER OF THE REVOLUTIONARY JUNTA THAT OUSTED GEN ROMERO, HAD THE DOCUMENTS.""}, {"text": "THE SALVADORAN SUPREME COURT RECENTLY REVOKED A SALVADORAN GOVERNMENT EXTRADITION REQUEST FOR SARAVIA, WHOM THE GOVERNMENT WANTED TO QUESTION TO HELP SOLVE THE ROMERO CASE."}, {"text": "THE ARCHBISHOP WAS KILLED BY A SNIPER WHILE SAYING MASS AT A HOSPITAL FOR CANCER PATIENTS."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0083", "message_template": 2, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 26 APR 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], "document_mentions": [], "sentence_mentions": {}}], "incident_type": "KIDNAPPING", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": {"sentences": [{"text": "GUILLERMO UNGO, VICE PRESIDENT OF THE SOCIALIST INTERNATIONAL, FORMER PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE, AND LEADER OF THE CIVILIAN LEFT IN EL SALVADOR, TODAY LEFT FOR VENEZUELA ACCOMPANIED BY VENEZUELAN AMBASSADOR FEDERICO MALESPINA, ACCORDING TO DIPLOMATIC SOURCES."}, {"text": "UNGO SOUGHT ASYLUM AT THE VENEZUELAN EMBASSY 6 DAYS AGO TO PROTECT HIMSELF AGAINST THE THREATS ISSUED ON THE GOVERNMENT RADIO."}, {"text": "THE LEFTIST LEADER WAS ACCUSED OF BEING "AN ACCOMPLICE OF THE MASSACRE CAUSED BY THE FMLN (FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT)," WHICH A WEEK AGO LAUNCHED THE LARGEST OFFENSIVE IN 10 YEARS."}, {"text": "UNGO LEFT EL SALVADOR ACCOMPANIED BY HECTOR OQUELI COLINDRES, ASSISTANT SECRETARY OF THE NATIONAL REVOLUTIONARY MOVEMENT (MNR), A MEMBER PARTY OF THE DEMOCRATIC CONVERGENCE, A BLOC OF LEFTIST PARTIES."}, {"text": "OTHER DIPLOMATS ACCOMPANIED UNGO TO COMALAPA AIRPORT, LOCATED 50 KM SOUTH OF SAN SALVADOR, WHICH IS HEAVILY PROTECTED BY THE ARMY."}, {"text": "UNGO'S DEPARTURE OCCURRED FOLLOWING THE ASSASSINATION OF SIX JESUITS WHO WERE MACHINEGUNNED ON 15 NOVEMBER BY MEN WEARING MILITARY UNIFORMS."}], "template": {"message_id": {"sentences": [{"text": "YESTERDAY MORNING AT 0730, APPROXIMATELY 20 OR 30 TERRORISTS MACHINEGUNNED A ROUTE 302 BUS COVERING THE SAN SALVADOR - USULUTAN AND USULUTAN - SAN SALVADOR ROUTE."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE OFFICIAL REPORT, THIS CRIMINAL ACTION WAS CARRIED OUT BY THE ENEMIES OF THE PEOPLE."}, {"text": "THE BUS, WITH LICENSE PLATE 76231, WAS ATTACKED ON THE COASTAL HIGHWAY NEAR LA TIENDITA CANTON, FUENTE RIO GUALEYO, TECOLUCA JURISDICTION, SAN VICENTE DEPARTMENT."}, {"text": "FIVE PASSENGERS TRAVELING ON THE BUS TO USULUTAN WERE INJURED DURING THIS AGGRESSIVE ACTION CARRIED OUT BY THE FMLN (FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT) AGAINST THE SALVADORAN PEOPLE."}, {"text": "THE INJURED PASSENGERS WERE IMMEDIATELY TAKEN TO THE SANTA TERESA HOSPITAL IN ZACATECOLUCA WHERE THEY ARE BEING TREATED."}, {"text": "LATER, AT APPROXIMATELY 0900 IN THE SAME AREA, CRIMINAL TERRORISTS BURNED NINE VEHICLES."}, {"text": "INFORMATION CONCERNING THE BURNED VEHICLES HAS NOT BEEN PROVIDED."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, FOUR REBELS WERE KILLED DURING AN ARMED CLASH WITH ENGINEERS MILITARY DETACHMENT TROOPS."}, {"text": "THE FMLN TERRORISTS WERE ATTEMPTING TO ENTER THE CHINCHONTEPEQUE NEIGHBORHOOD IN ZACATECOLUCA, LA PAZ DEPARTMENT."}, {"text": "THE SOLDIERS ALSO SEIZED THE FOLLOWING MATERIEL: 700 ROUNDS OF AMMUNITION FOR AK-47 RIFLES, 536 ROUNDS OF AMMUNITION FOR M-16 RIFLES, 3 KNAPSACKS WITH CIVILIAN CLOTHING, 6 AK-47 GRENADES, AND A G-3 RIFLE WITH A SERIAL NUMBER THAT CANNOT BE READ."}, {"text": "THE ARMED FORCES ARE SHOWING THEIR PROFESSIONALISM BY FIGHTING AGAINST THE ENEMIES OF THE PEOPLE."}, {"text": "LIKEWISE, AN UNKNOWN NUMBER OF FMLN TERRORISTS ATTACKED THE EL TRIUNFO CIVIL DEFENSE POST, SAN MIGUEL DEPARTMENT."}, {"text": "THE FMLN REBELS BURNED THE MUNICIPAL MAYOR'S OFFICE AND THE ANTEL (NATIONAL ADMINISTRATION FOR TELECOMMUNICATIONS) OFFICES."}, {"text": "THEY ALSO BURNED A GAS STATION OWNED BY VALENTIN VILLATORO AND DESTROYED A PYLON IN SAN FRANCISCO NEIGHBORHOOD."}, {"text": "THE ATTACK ON THE DEFENSELESS RESIDENTS RESULTED IN ONE TERRORIST DEAD AND ONE WOUNDED."}, {"text": "THE REPORT ADDS THAT THE RESIDENTS OF THE TOWN PRAISED THE ATTITUDE OF THE CIVIL DEFENSE MEMBERS AND REPUDIATED THE FMLN ASSASSINS FOR THEIR CONSTANT ATTACKS ON THE SALVADORAN PEOPLE."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0089", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["08 DEC 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], "document_mentions": [], "sentence_mentions": {}}, {"sentences": [{"text": "YESTERDAY MORNING AT 0730, APPROXIMATELY 20 OR 30 TERRORISTS MACHINEGUNNED A ROUTE 302 BUS COVERING THE SAN SALVADOR - USULUTAN AND USULUTAN - SAN SALVADOR ROUTE."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE OFFICIAL REPORT, THIS CRIMINAL ACTION WAS CARRIED OUT BY THE ENEMIES OF THE PEOPLE."}, {"text": "THE BUS, WITH LICENSE PLATE 76231, WAS ATTACKED ON THE COASTAL HIGHWAY NEAR LA TIENDITA CANTON, FUENTE RIO GUALEYO, TECOLUCA JURISDICTION, SAN VICENTE DEPARTMENT."}, {"text": "FIVE PASSENGERS TRAVELING ON THE BUS TO USULUTAN WERE INJURED DURING THIS AGGRESSIVE ACTION CARRIED OUT BY THE FMLN (FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT) AGAINST THE SALVADORAN PEOPLE."}, {"text": "THE INJURED PASSENGERS WERE IMMEDIATELY TAKEN TO THE SANTA TERESA HOSPITAL IN ZACATECOLUCA WHERE THEY ARE BEING TREATED."}, {"text": "LATER, AT APPROXIMATELY 0900 IN THE SAME AREA, CRIMINAL TERRORISTS BURNED NINE VEHICLES."}, {"text": "INFORMATION CONCERNING THE BURNED VEHICLES HAS NOT BEEN PROVIDED."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, FOUR REBELS WERE KILLED DURING AN ARMED CLASH WITH ENGINEERS MILITARY DETACHMENT TROOPS."}, {"text": "THE FMLN TERRORISTS WERE ATTEMPTING TO ENTER THE CHINCHONTEPEQUE NEIGHBORHOOD IN ZACATECOLUCA, LA PAZ DEPARTMENT."}, {"text": "THE SOLDIERS ALSO SEIZED THE FOLLOWING MATERIEL: 700 ROUNDS OF AMMUNITION FOR AK-47 RIFLES, 536 ROUNDS OF AMMUNITION FOR M-16 RIFLES, 3 KNAPSACKS WITH CIVILIAN CLOTHING, 6 AK-47 GRENADES, AND A G-3 RIFLE WITH A SERIAL NUMBER THAT CANNOT BE READ."}, {"text": "THE ARMED FORCES ARE SHOWING THEIR PROFESSIONALISM BY FIGHTING AGAINST THE ENEMIES OF THE PEOPLE."}, {"text": "LIKEWISE, AN UNKNOWN NUMBER OF FMLN TERRORISTS ATTACKED THE EL TRIUNFO CIVIL DEFENSE POST, SAN MIGUEL DEPARTMENT."}, {"text": "THE FMLN REBELS BURNED THE MUNICIPAL MAYOR'S OFFICE AND THE ANTEL (NATIONAL ADMINISTRATION FOR TELECOMMUNICATIONS) OFFICES."}, {"text": "THEY ALSO BURNED A GAS STATION OWNED BY VALENTIN VILLATORO AND DESTROYED A PYLON IN SAN FRANCISCO NEIGHBORHOOD."}, {"text": "THE ATTACK ON THE DEFENSELESS RESIDENTS RESULTED IN ONE TERRORIST DEAD AND ONE WOUNDED."}, {"text": "THE REPORT ADDS THAT THE RESIDENTS OF THE TOWN PRAISED THE ATTITUDE OF THE CIVIL DEFENSE MEMBERS AND REPUDIATED THE FMLN ASSASSINS FOR THEIR CONSTANT ATTACKS ON THE SALVADORAN PEOPLE."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0089", "message_template": 4, {"sentences": [{"text": "A BOMB WENT OFF THIS MORNING NEAR A POWER TOWER IN SAN SALVADOR LEAVING A LARGE PART OF THE CITY WITHOUT ENERGY, BUT NO CASUALTIES HAVE BEEN REPORTED."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO UNOFFICIAL SOURCES, THE BOMB -- ALLEGEDLY DETONATED BY URBAN GUERRILLA COMMANDOS -- BLEW UP A POWER TOWER IN THE NORTHWESTERN PART OF SAN SALVADOR AT 0650 (1250 GMT)."}, {"text": "ON FRIDAY, 16 MARCH, THE FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT (FMLN) DECREED A SUSPENSION OF ITS ATTACKS ON CIVILIAN GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS AND OF ITS SABOTAGE OPERATIONS AGAINST MEANS OF TRANSPORTATION, BUSINESSES, AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS."}, {"text": "THAT DECISION, AIMED AT CREATING THE APPROPRIATE CONDITIONS FOR A NEW ROUND OF TALKS WITH THE GOVERNMENT, DOES NOT INCLUDE THE ENERGY SYSTEM OR ARMED {"sentences": [{"text": "4. AT 0640 AN FMLN GUERRILLA UNIT LAUNCHED AN ATTACK ON CONCHAGUA BATTALION AND 3D MILITARY DETACHMENT SOLDIERS WHO WERE TRAVELING ON THE ROAD BETWEEN ANAMOROS AND LISLIQUE, 1 KM FROM LISLIQUE, LA UNION DEPARTMENT."}, {"text": "THE CLASH, CARRIED OUT IN BROAD DAYLIGHT, ENDED AT 0930."}, {"text": "WE KILLED THREE AND WOUNDED FIVE, AND TOOK FOUR PRISONERS OF WAR IN THAT AREA OF LA UNION DEPARTMENT."}, {"text": "A CHIEF OF SECTION, A SERGEANT, IS AMONG THE DEAD."}, {"text": "WE SEIZED SIX RIFLES, AN M-79 GRENADE LAUNCHER, AND (WORDS INDISTINCT)."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, ANOTHER FMLN UNIT ENTERED LISLIQUE, WHERE THEY CARRIED OUT POLITICAL ACTIVITIES FOR 3 HOURS."}, {"text": "5. AT 0300 FMLN UNITS ATTACKED AN INFANTRY COMPANY AT THE MOUTH OF THE LEMPA RIVER, AND 30 MINUTES LATER OUR FORCES HAD TAKEN OVER THE POST."}, {"text": "WE KILLED ONE AND WOUNDED FOUR, AND SEIZED A RIFLE, A LAW ROCKET LAUNCHER, THREE BACKPACKS, AND WAR MATERIEL."}, {"text": "6. URBAN GUERRILLAS SABOTAGED PYLONS AND TRANSFORMERS IN SAN MIGUEL CITY."}, {"text": "7. A NATIONAL POLICE POST IN BERLIN WAS RAIDED AND ATTACKED."}, {"text": "ATTENTION: DURING THIS OPERATION LAUNCHED THROUGHOUT THE FOUR EASTERN DEPARTMENTS, WE INFLICTED A TOTAL OF 67 CASUALTIES."}, {"text": "AMONG THESE CASUALTIES ARE: THE CHIEF OF THE CACAHUATIQUE BATTALION, A CAPTAIN, A LIEUTENANT, AND A SERGEANT."}, {"text": "WE CAPTURED SIX PRISONERS OF WAR DURING THIS OPERATION."}, {"text": "WE ALSO SEIZED 37 RIFLES, A 90-MM CANNON, 2 M-70 MACHINE GUNS, 3 LAW ROCKET LAUNCHERS, 3 M-79 GRENADE LAUNCHERS, 5 MILITARY RADIOS, 38 BACKPACKS, AND 6,800 ROUNDS OF AMMUNITION, AND WE DAMAGED A HELICOPTER."}, {"text": "THIS IS THE RESULT OF OUR OPERATION: THE EASTERN SECTOR IS COURAGEOUS; EVERYONE AGAINST ARENA."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0092", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": null, "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], "document_mentions": [], "sentence_mentions": {}}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["SAN MIGUEL"], "strings_rhs": ["CITY"], "document_mentions": [[909, 919]], "sentence_mentions": {"8": [[57, 67]]}}], "incident_type": "ATTACK", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["ACCOMPLISHED"]}, "incident_instrument_id": null, "perp_incident_category": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["TERRORIST ACT"]}, "perp_individual_id": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["URBAN GUERRILLAS"], "document_mentions": [[855, 871]], "sentence_mentions": {"8": [[3, 19]]}}], "perp_organization_id": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["FMLN"], "document_mentions": [[14, 18], [516, 520], [612, 616]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[14, 18]], "5": [[19, 23]], "6": [[11, 15]]}}], "perp_organization_confidence": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["CLAIMED OR ADMITTED"], "strings_rhs": ["FMLN"]}], "phys_tgt_id": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["PYLONS"], "document_mentions": [[882, 888]], "sentence_mentions": {"8": [[30, 36]]}}, {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["TRANSFORMERS"], "document_mentions": [[893, 905]], "sentence_mentions": {"8": [[41, 53]]}}], "phys_tgt_effect_of_incident": null, "hum_tgt_name": null, "hum_tgt_description": null, "hum_tgt_effect_of_incident": null}, "hit_id": 75}

{"sentences": [{"text": "WE WILL ORGANIZE A PLURALIST GOVERNMENT WHICH INCLUDES REPRESENTATIVES OF ALL THE PATRIOTIC GROUPS OF THE NATION."}, {"text": "LET US SAVE OUR CAPITAL, WHICH IS BEING BOMBED DUE TO A FOREIGN MENTALITY."}, {"text": "IT IS BEING BOMBED AND DESTROYED BY AN OCCUPATION ARMY."}, {"text": "THE AIRPLANES ARE NOW BEING FLOWN BY U.S. PILOTS AT NIGHT, AND THEY HAVE THE MENTALITY OF AN OCCUPATION ARMY."}, {"text": "SALVADORANS, LET US UNITE AND ORGANIZE OURSELVES."}, {"text": "LET US NOT REMAIN IDLE."}, {"text": "WE MUST MOBILIZE OURSELVES RIGHT NOW AND ORGANIZE A COMMITTEE IN EACH NEIGHBORHOOD, RESIDENTIAL AREA, AND TOWN."}, {"text": "THE PEOPLE MUST ORGANIZE."}, {"text": "THE FMLN HAS BEGUN ITS 7TH DAY IN THE CAPITAL, AND WE ARE SURE THAT WE ARE ADVANCING TOWARD VICTORY."}, {"text": "VICTORY WILL BE OURS AND COLONEL PONCE HAS GIVEN PROOF OF HIS DESPERATION WITH THE JESUIT PRIESTS' ASSASSINATION IN SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": "HE HAS OVERSTEPPED HIS MARK AND THE PEOPLE'S PATIENCE IS EXHAUSTED."}, {"text": "WE URGE ALL OUR PEOPLE TO JOIN THE GENERAL UPRISING, STRUGGLE, TAKE UP WEAPONS, AND ORGANIZE EVERYTHING NECESSARY TO OUST THIS CORRUPT AND MURDEROUS REGIME."}, {"text": "WE URGE THE PEOPLE TO MOBILIZE,TO TAKE UP WEAPONS, AND TO STAY IN THE NEIGHBORHOODS AND RESIDENTIAL AREAS TO STRUGGLE FOR THE LIBERATION OF OUR HOMELAND."}, {"text": "WE MUST ACHIEVE PROGRESS."}, {"text": "INFORMATION HAS JUST ARRIVED FROM THE UNITED STATES, INDICATING THAT THE U.S. GOVERNMENT HAS BEGUN TO WITHDRAW ITS UNCONDITIONAL SUPPORT FOR THE DEATH SQUADS IN EL SALVADOR."}, {"text": "INFORMATION RECEIVED FROM THE UNITED STATES INDICATES THAT THE U.S. GOVERNMENT HAS BEGUN TO RECANT ITS IRRESPONSIBLE AND GENOCIDAL ATTITUDE OF SENDING U.S. PILOTS TO BOMB OUR CAPITAL BY NIGHT."}, {"text": "THAT IS THE PROFESSIONAL TRAINING THAT U.S. IMPERIALISM IS CURRENTLY GIVING THE ARMED FORCES, MEANING TO BOMB THE CAPITAL BY NIGHT, AS ALL THE PEOPLE IN THE CAPITAL HAVE WITNESSED IN RECENT HOURS."}, {"text": "THUS, WE ISSUE AN APPEAL TO THE PEOPLE: ORGANIZE YOURSELVES."}, {"text": "WE WILL ACHIEVE VICTORY."}, {"text": "WE SURE OF THIS."}, {"text": "THE BLOOD OF IGNACIO ELLACURIA, THE BLOOD OF THE JESUITS, THE BLOOD OF MONSIGNOR (ARNULFO) ROMERO, THE BLOOD OF THE FOUR U.S. NUNS, THE BLOOD OF THE 11 PRIESTS ASSASSINATED (WORDS INDISTINCT), THE BLOOD OF (WORDS INDISTINCT) SEMINARIANS, YOUTHS (WORDS INDISTINCT), AND FOR ALL THE BLOOD SHED."}, {"text": "WE MUST WIN, WE MUST ACHIEVE VICTORY, WE MUST ATTAIN A TRUE DEMOCRACY FOR OUR HOMELAND -- A DEMOCRACY WITH {"sentences": [{"text": "POLICE HAVE REPORTED THAT TERRORISTS TONIGHT BOMBED THE EMBASSIES OF THE PRC AND THE SOVIET UNION."}, {"text": "THE BOMBS CAUSED DAMAGE BUT NO INJURIES."}, {"text": "A CAR-BOMB EXPLODED IN FRONT OF THE PRC EMBASSY, WHICH IS IN THE LIMA RESIDENTIAL DISTRICT OF SAN ISIDRO."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, TWO BOMBS WERE THROWN AT A USSR EMBASSY VEHICLE THAT WAS PARKED IN FRONT OF THE EMBASSY LOCATED IN ORRANTIA DISTRICT, NEAR SAN ISIDRO."}, {"text": "POLICE SAID THE ATTACKS WERE CARRIED OUT ALMOST SIMULTANEOUSLY AND THAT THE BOMBS BROKE WINDOWS AND DESTROYED THE TWO VEHICLES."}, {"text": "NO ONE HAS CLAIMED RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE ATTACKS SO FAR."}, {"text": "POLICE SOURCES, HOWEVER, HAVE SAID THE ATTACKS COULD HAVE BEEN CARRIED OUT BY THE MAOIST "SHINING PATH" GROUP OR THE GUEVARIST "TUPAC AMARU REVOLUTIONARY MOVEMENT" (MRTA) GROUP."}, {"text": "THE SOURCES ALSO SAID THAT THE SHINING PATH HAS ATTACKED SOVIET INTERESTS IN PERU IN THE PAST."}, {"text": "IN JULY 1989 THE SHINING PATH BOMBED A BUS CARRYING NEARLY 50 SOVIET MARINES INTO THE PORT OF EL CALLAO."}, {"text": "FIFTEEN SOVIET MARINES WERE WOUNDED."}, {"text": "SOME 3 YEARS AGO TWO MARINES DIED FOLLOWING A SHINING PATH BOMBING OF A MARKET USED BY SOVIET MARINES."}, {"text": "IN ANOTHER INCIDENT 3 YEARS AGO, A SHINING PATH MILITANT WAS KILLED BY SOVIET EMBASSY GUARDS INSIDE THE EMBASSY COMPOUND."}, {"text": "THE TERRORIST WAS CARRYING DYNAMITE."}, {"text": "THE ATTACKS TODAY COME AFTER SHINING PATH ATTACKS DURING WHICH LEAST 10 BUSES WERE BURNED THROUGHOUT LIMA ON 24 OCT."}], {"sentences": [{"text": "POLICE HAVE REPORTED THAT TERRORISTS TONIGHT BOMBED THE EMBASSIES OF THE PRC AND THE SOVIET UNION."}, {"text": "THE BOMBS CAUSED DAMAGE BUT NO INJURIES."}, {"text": "A CAR-BOMB EXPLODED IN FRONT OF THE PRC EMBASSY, WHICH IS IN THE LIMA RESIDENTIAL DISTRICT OF SAN ISIDRO."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, TWO BOMBS WERE THROWN AT A USSR EMBASSY VEHICLE THAT WAS PARKED IN FRONT OF THE EMBASSY LOCATED IN ORRANTIA DISTRICT, NEAR SAN ISIDRO."}, {"text": "POLICE SAID THE ATTACKS WERE CARRIED OUT ALMOST SIMULTANEOUSLY AND THAT THE BOMBS BROKE WINDOWS AND DESTROYED THE TWO VEHICLES."}, {"text": "NO ONE HAS CLAIMED RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE ATTACKS SO FAR."}, {"text": "POLICE SOURCES, HOWEVER, HAVE SAID THE ATTACKS COULD HAVE BEEN CARRIED OUT BY THE MAOIST "SHINING PATH" GROUP OR THE GUEVARIST "TUPAC AMARU REVOLUTIONARY MOVEMENT" (MRTA) GROUP."}, {"text": "THE SOURCES ALSO SAID THAT THE SHINING PATH HAS ATTACKED SOVIET INTERESTS IN PERU IN THE PAST."}, {"text": "IN JULY 1989 THE SHINING PATH BOMBED A BUS CARRYING NEARLY 50 SOVIET MARINES INTO THE PORT OF EL CALLAO."}, {"text": "FIFTEEN SOVIET MARINES WERE WOUNDED."}, {"text": "SOME 3 YEARS AGO TWO MARINES DIED FOLLOWING A SHINING PATH BOMBING OF A MARKET USED BY SOVIET MARINES."}, {"text": "IN ANOTHER INCIDENT 3 YEARS AGO, A SHINING PATH MILITANT WAS KILLED BY SOVIET EMBASSY GUARDS INSIDE THE EMBASSY COMPOUND."}, {"text": "THE TERRORIST WAS CARRYING DYNAMITE."}, {"text": "THE ATTACKS TODAY COME AFTER SHINING PATH ATTACKS DURING WHICH LEAST 10 BUSES WERE BURNED THROUGHOUT LIMA ON 24 OCT."}], {"sentences": [{"text": "THE PERUVIAN ELECTORAL CAMPAIGN TODAY ENTERED ITS FINAL STRETCH, WITH ONLY ONE WEEK TO GO IN AN ELECTORAL CAMPAIGN THAT HAS BEEN THE MOST DISPUTED AND DANGEROUS ONE IN THE HISTORY OF THAT ANDEAN COUNTRY, PRIMARILY BECAUSE OF TERRORIST THREATS."}, {"text": "THE SPREADING WAVE OF TERRORISM, AIMED AT STOPPING THE ELECTIONS FROM TAKING PLACE, FORCED PRESIDENT ALAN GARCIA'S ADMINISTRATION TO TAKE DRASTIC SECURITY MEASURES TO PROTECT THE NEARLY 3,500 CANDIDATES (PASSAGE INDISTINCT) ARE DEPLOYED, ESPECIALLY IN AREAS UNDER STATE OF EMERGENCY AND WHERE THE ACTIVITIES OF SHINING PATH'S TERRORIST GANGS ARE MORE WIDESPREAD, SUCH AS LIMA AND THE DEPARTMENTS OF AYACUCHO, HUANCAVELICA, APURIMAC, AND JUNIN."}, {"text": "THE GOVERNMENT HAS APPOINTED FOUR MEMBERS OF THE SECURITY FORCES TO PROTECT EACH CANDIDATE AND HAS TAKEN OUT LIFE INSURANCE ON ALMOST 250,000 PEOPLE WHO HAVE BEEN SELECTED BY LOTTERY TO WORK AT OVER 52,000 POLLING STATIONS."}, {"text": "IN LIMA ALONE, HUNDREDS OF MEMBERS OF POLLING STATION TEAMS HAVE ASKED TO BE RELIEVED OF THIS DUTY, PETITIONS WHICH FOR THE MOST PART HAVE BEEN REFUSED BY THE THE ELECTORAL COURT."}, {"text": "IN LIMA, THE MAIN OBSTACLE TO NORMAL ELECTIONS ON SUNDAY COULD BE THE STRIKE OF PRIVATE BUS OWNERS WHO ARE AFRAID OF TERRORIST REPRISALS."}, {"text": "THE "MINI-BUS-OWNERS" (INDIVIDUAL OWNERS OF URBAN BUSES) HAVE ASKED THAT FOUR POLICEMEN BE ASSIGNED TO EACH BUS, A REQUEST THAT DEPARTMENTAL PREFECT (GOVERNOR) JACOBO MISHKIN HAS DEEMED "IMPOSSIBLE.""}, {"text": ""IF THERE IS NO TRANSPORTATION, THE PEOPLE WILL WALK," PRESIDENT ALAN GARCIA HAS SAID, REAFFIRMING HIS "ABSOLUTE CONFIDENCE" THAT THE PERUVIAN PEOPLE WILL VOTE EN MASSE -- DESPITE THE TERRORIST THREATS -- TO "STRENGTHEN DEMOCRACY," RECOVERED IN 1980 AFTER 12 YEARS OF MILITARY GOVERNMENTS."}, {"text": "PRESIDENT ALAN GARCIA, NATIONAL ELECTION BOARD PRESIDENT CARLOS CASTANEDA, AND THE CANDIDATES HAVE BEEN URGING THE NEARLY 10 MILLION VOTERS TO COMPLY WITH THEIR CONSTITUTIONAL DUTY BY CASTING THEIR VOTES."}, {"text": "THE GOVERNMENT CLAIMS THAT A LARGE TURNOUT WILL AMOUNT TO "THE MOST EFFECTIVE REJECTION OF SUBVERSION" AND THAT IT WILL "STRENGTHEN DEMOCRACY" IN PERU, WHICH HAS ALMOST 22 MILLION INHABITANTS."}, {"text": "OUT OF THE NINE PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES, FOUR HAVE THE BEST CHANCES, ALTHOUGH ONLY THE CANDIDATE OF THE CENTER RIGHT, MARIO VARGAS LLOSA, IS THE CLEAR-CUT FAVORITE."}, {"text": "HE WILL GET AN ESTIMATED 45 PERCENT OF THE VOTES, ACCORDING TO THE LATEST SURVEYS."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO PERUVIAN LAW, IF VARGAS LLOSA DOES NOT GET ABSOLUTE MAJORITY HE WILL HAVE TO PARTICIPATE IN A RUNOFF ELECTION WITH THE SECOND-PLACE CANDIDATE."}, {"text": "SINCE IT IS QUITE CERTAIN THAT VARGAS LLOSA, THE PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE OF THE DEMOCRATIC FRONT (FREDEMO), WILL WIN THE FIRST ROUND, THE QUESTION NOW IS WHO WILL BE HIS RIVAL FOR THE PRESIDENCY IN THE SECOND ROUND."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE SURVEYS, THE CANDIDATES WITH THE BEST CHANCE ARE LUIS ALVA CASTRO OF THE RULING AMERICAN POPULAR REVOLUTIONARY ALLIANCE (APRA), WITH 19 PERCENT OF THE VOTES; ALFONSO BARRANTES LINGAN OF THE SOCIALIST LEFT (IS), WITH 12 PERCENT; AND HENRY PEASE OF THE COMMUNIST LEFT WING COALITION UNITED LEFT (IU), WITH 8 PERCENT."}, {"text": "DURING THE LAST FIVE DAYS OF THEIR CAMPAIGNS THE CANDIDATES WILL STEP UP THEIR TRIPS TO VARIOUS POINTS OF THE COUNTRY TRYING TO GAIN THE VOTES OF A LARGE UNDECIDED SECTOR OF THE POPULATION."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE SURVEYS, THIS SECTOR REPRESENTS BETWEEN 18 AND 20 PERCENT OF THE VOTES."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE THE TERRORISTS CONTINUE ON THEIR PATH OF DEATH AND DESTRUCTION."}, {"text": "IN THE LAST 24 HOURS THE SHINING PATH MURDERED TWO STATE OFFICIALS OF THE (WORDS INDISTINCT) ON A ROAD LINKING CHAVIN AND HUARI, TWO TOWNS IN ANCASH DEPARTMENT."}, {"text": "IN HUARAZ, THE CAPITAL OF ANCASH DEPARTMENT, THE TERRORISTS SET FIRE TO THE OFFICES OF THE LOCAL DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION BUT INJURED NO ONE."}, {"text": "ONE PERSON DIED WHEN AN ORE TRAIN WAS DERAILED NEAR OROYA, A KEY MINING TOWN IN THE PERUVIAN CENTRAL JUNGLE AREA, WHERE AN ELECTORAL REGISTRATION OFFICE WAS LOCATED."}, {"text": "SEVEN PRIVATE BANK BRANCHES WERE ALSO ATTACKED AND SERIOUSLY DAMAGED IN LIMA."}, {"text": "IN BARRANCA, A SMALL VILLAGE 180 KM FROM LIMA, TERRORISTS BOMBED A RADIO STATION AND A DRUGSTORE, BOTH OF THEM BELONGING TO SANTIAGO JAO, A FREDEMO CANDIDATE FOR DEPUTY."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0100", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["31 MAR 90 - 01 APR 90"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["PERU"], "document_mentions": [[4, 8], [1564, 1568], [2071, 2075], [2379, 2383], [3808, 3812]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[4, 8]], "6": [[134, 138]], "8": [[146, 150]], "11": [[13, 17]], "19": [[84, 88]]}}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["ANCASH"], {"sentences": [{"text": "THE PERUVIAN ELECTORAL CAMPAIGN TODAY ENTERED ITS FINAL STRETCH, WITH ONLY ONE WEEK TO GO IN AN ELECTORAL CAMPAIGN THAT HAS BEEN THE MOST DISPUTED AND DANGEROUS ONE IN THE HISTORY OF THAT ANDEAN COUNTRY, PRIMARILY BECAUSE OF TERRORIST THREATS."}, {"text": "THE SPREADING WAVE OF TERRORISM, AIMED AT STOPPING THE ELECTIONS FROM TAKING PLACE, FORCED PRESIDENT ALAN GARCIA'S ADMINISTRATION TO TAKE DRASTIC SECURITY MEASURES TO PROTECT THE NEARLY 3,500 CANDIDATES (PASSAGE INDISTINCT) ARE DEPLOYED, ESPECIALLY IN AREAS UNDER STATE OF EMERGENCY AND WHERE THE ACTIVITIES OF SHINING PATH'S TERRORIST GANGS ARE MORE WIDESPREAD, SUCH AS LIMA AND THE DEPARTMENTS OF AYACUCHO, HUANCAVELICA, APURIMAC, AND JUNIN."}, {"text": "THE GOVERNMENT HAS APPOINTED FOUR MEMBERS OF THE SECURITY FORCES TO PROTECT EACH CANDIDATE AND HAS TAKEN OUT LIFE INSURANCE ON ALMOST 250,000 PEOPLE WHO HAVE BEEN SELECTED BY LOTTERY TO WORK AT OVER 52,000 POLLING STATIONS."}, {"text": "IN LIMA ALONE, HUNDREDS OF MEMBERS OF POLLING STATION TEAMS HAVE ASKED TO BE RELIEVED OF THIS DUTY, PETITIONS WHICH FOR THE MOST PART HAVE BEEN REFUSED BY THE THE ELECTORAL COURT."}, {"text": "IN LIMA, THE MAIN OBSTACLE TO NORMAL ELECTIONS ON SUNDAY COULD BE THE STRIKE OF PRIVATE BUS OWNERS WHO ARE AFRAID OF TERRORIST REPRISALS."}, {"text": "THE "MINI-BUS-OWNERS" (INDIVIDUAL OWNERS OF URBAN BUSES) HAVE ASKED THAT FOUR POLICEMEN BE ASSIGNED TO EACH BUS, A REQUEST THAT DEPARTMENTAL PREFECT (GOVERNOR) JACOBO MISHKIN HAS DEEMED "IMPOSSIBLE.""}, {"text": ""IF THERE IS NO TRANSPORTATION, THE PEOPLE WILL WALK," PRESIDENT ALAN GARCIA HAS SAID, REAFFIRMING HIS "ABSOLUTE CONFIDENCE" THAT THE PERUVIAN PEOPLE WILL VOTE EN MASSE -- DESPITE THE TERRORIST THREATS -- TO "STRENGTHEN DEMOCRACY," RECOVERED IN 1980 AFTER 12 YEARS OF MILITARY GOVERNMENTS."}, {"text": "PRESIDENT ALAN GARCIA, NATIONAL ELECTION BOARD PRESIDENT CARLOS CASTANEDA, AND THE CANDIDATES HAVE BEEN URGING THE NEARLY 10 MILLION VOTERS TO COMPLY WITH THEIR CONSTITUTIONAL DUTY BY CASTING THEIR VOTES."}, {"text": "THE GOVERNMENT CLAIMS THAT A LARGE TURNOUT WILL AMOUNT TO "THE MOST EFFECTIVE REJECTION OF SUBVERSION" AND THAT IT WILL "STRENGTHEN DEMOCRACY" IN PERU, WHICH HAS ALMOST 22 MILLION INHABITANTS."}, {"text": "OUT OF THE NINE PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES, FOUR HAVE THE BEST CHANCES, ALTHOUGH ONLY THE CANDIDATE OF THE CENTER RIGHT, MARIO VARGAS LLOSA, IS THE CLEAR-CUT FAVORITE."}, {"text": "HE WILL GET AN ESTIMATED 45 PERCENT OF THE VOTES, ACCORDING TO THE LATEST SURVEYS."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO PERUVIAN LAW, IF VARGAS LLOSA DOES NOT GET ABSOLUTE MAJORITY HE WILL HAVE TO PARTICIPATE IN A RUNOFF ELECTION WITH THE SECOND-PLACE CANDIDATE."}, {"text": "SINCE IT IS QUITE CERTAIN THAT VARGAS LLOSA, THE PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE OF THE DEMOCRATIC FRONT (FREDEMO), WILL WIN THE FIRST ROUND, THE QUESTION NOW IS WHO WILL BE HIS RIVAL FOR THE PRESIDENCY IN THE SECOND ROUND."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE SURVEYS, THE CANDIDATES WITH THE BEST CHANCE ARE LUIS ALVA CASTRO OF THE RULING AMERICAN POPULAR REVOLUTIONARY ALLIANCE (APRA), WITH 19 PERCENT OF THE VOTES; ALFONSO BARRANTES LINGAN OF THE SOCIALIST LEFT (IS), WITH 12 PERCENT; AND HENRY PEASE OF THE COMMUNIST LEFT WING COALITION UNITED LEFT (IU), WITH 8 PERCENT."}, {"text": "DURING THE LAST FIVE DAYS OF THEIR CAMPAIGNS THE CANDIDATES WILL STEP UP THEIR TRIPS TO VARIOUS POINTS OF THE COUNTRY TRYING TO GAIN THE VOTES OF A LARGE UNDECIDED SECTOR OF THE POPULATION."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE SURVEYS, THIS SECTOR REPRESENTS BETWEEN 18 AND 20 PERCENT OF THE VOTES."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE THE TERRORISTS CONTINUE ON THEIR PATH OF DEATH AND DESTRUCTION."}, {"text": "IN THE LAST 24 HOURS THE SHINING PATH MURDERED TWO STATE OFFICIALS OF THE (WORDS INDISTINCT) ON A ROAD LINKING CHAVIN AND HUARI, TWO TOWNS IN ANCASH DEPARTMENT."}, {"text": "IN HUARAZ, THE CAPITAL OF ANCASH DEPARTMENT, THE TERRORISTS SET FIRE TO THE OFFICES OF THE LOCAL DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION BUT INJURED NO ONE."}, {"text": "ONE PERSON DIED WHEN AN ORE TRAIN WAS DERAILED NEAR OROYA, A KEY MINING TOWN IN THE PERUVIAN CENTRAL JUNGLE AREA, WHERE AN ELECTORAL REGISTRATION OFFICE WAS LOCATED."}, {"text": "SEVEN PRIVATE BANK BRANCHES WERE ALSO ATTACKED AND SERIOUSLY DAMAGED IN LIMA."}, {"text": "IN BARRANCA, A SMALL VILLAGE 180 KM FROM LIMA, TERRORISTS BOMBED A RADIO STATION AND A DRUGSTORE, BOTH OF THEM BELONGING TO SANTIAGO JAO, A FREDEMO CANDIDATE FOR DEPUTY."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST1-MUC3-0100", "message_template": 3, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["31 MAR 90 - 01 APR 90"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["PERU"], "document_mentions": [[4, 8], [1564, 1568], [2071, 2075], {"sentences": [{"text": "WE HAVE A REPORT FROM SPAIN."}, {"text": "AID TO EL SALVADOR HAS BEEN SUSPENDED."}, {"text": "ATTENTION: THE SPANISH GOVERNMENT HAS SUSPENDED ITS AID TO THE SALVADORAN GOVERNMENT."}, {"text": "SPANISH FOREIGN MINISTER LUIS YANEZ (AS HEARD) REPORTED TODAY THAT SPAIN HAS SUSPENDED AID TO THE SALVADORAN GOVERNMENT UNTIL THE KILLINGS OF THE SPANISH JESUITS, WHO HAD BEEN LIVING IN OUR COUNTRY FOR YEARS, ARE RESOLVED."}, {"text": "THIS REPORT REPRESENTS A SERIOUS POLITICAL SETBACK FOR THE ALFREDO CRISTIANI GOVERNMENT."}, {"text": "THE SPANISH GOVERNMENT'S DECISION FURTHER ISOLATES THE SALVADORAN GOVERNMENT WHICH IS ALREADY UNDER PRESSURE BECAUSE OF CALLS IN THE UNITED STATES FOR THE SUSPENSION OF MILITARY AID."}, {"text": "THIS SUSPENSION REPRESENTS A HALT IN THE DELIVERY OF MILLIONS OF DOLLARS FROM THE SPANISH GOVERNMENT TO SALVADORAN GOVERNMENT."}, {"text": "THIS REPRESENTS INTERNATIONAL ISOLATION."}, {"text": "THE INTERNATIONAL ISOLATION OF THE CRISTIANI REGIME IS GROWING."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0001", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 20 NOV 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], "document_mentions": [[36, 47]], "sentence_mentions": {"1": [[7, 18]]}}], "incident_type": "ATTACK", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["ACCOMPLISHED"]}, "incident_instrument_id": null, "perp_incident_category": null, "perp_individual_id": null, "perp_organization_id": null, "perp_organization_confidence": null, "phys_tgt_id": null, "phys_tgt_effect_of_incident": null, "hum_tgt_name": null, "hum_tgt_description": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["JESUITS"], "document_mentions": [[308, 315]], "sentence_mentions": {"3": [[154, 161]]}}], "hum_tgt_effect_of_incident": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["DEATH"], "strings_rhs": ["JESUITS"]}]}, "hit_id": 85}

{"sentences": [{"text": "LAST NIGHT, A FEW HOURS BEFORE THE CHILEAN PRESIDENTIAL ELECTIONS, A VIOLENT EXPLOSION DAMAGED THE WINDOWS AND FACING OF THE SALVADORAN CONSULATE IN SANTIAGO."}, {"text": "NO ONE WAS INJURED."}, {"text": "A FLAG FROM THE MANUEL RODRIGUEZ PATRIOTIC FRONT (FPMR) WAS FOUND AT THE SCENE OF THE EXPLOSION."}, {"text": "THE FPMR IS A CLANDESTINE LEFTIST GROUP THAT PROMOTES "ALL FORMS OF STRUGGLE" AGAINST THE MILITARY GOVERNMENT HEADED BY GENERAL AUGUSTO PINOCHET."}, {"text": "POLICE SOURCES HAVE REPORTED THAT THE EXPLOSION CAUSED SERIOUS DAMAGE TO THE SALVADORAN EMBASSY BUILDING AND TO NEARBY STRUCTURES IN THE ELEGANT PROVIDENCIA NEIGHORHOOD IN EASTERN SANTIAGO."}, {"text": "THE GOVERNMENT CHARGES THAT THE FPMR, WHICH ON 14 DECEMBER WILL MARK 6 YEARS OF SUBVERSIVE ACTIVITY, IS THE "ARMED BRANCH" OF THE OUTLAWED COMMUNIST PARTY OF CHILE."}, {"text": "AS OF MIDNIGHT TONIGHT THE CARABINEROS AND POLICE AND SECURITY SERVICE AGENTS WERE CARRYING OUT AN INTENSIVE OPERATION TO ARREST THOSE RESPONISBLE FOR THE ATTACK."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0002", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["12 DEC 89"]}], {"sentences": [{"text": "A TERRORIST ARRESTED BY THE SALVADORAN NATIONAL POLICE, HAS BEEN IDENTIFIED AS RUTH ESPERANZA AGUILAR MARROQUIN, AKA SANDRA."}, {"text": "SHE HAS DESCRIBED U.S. CITIZEN JENNIFER CASOLO AS AN ERP (PEOPLE'S REVOLUTIONARY ARMY) MEMBER IN CHARGE OF LOGISTICS."}, {"text": "AS HAS BEEN REPORTED, CASOLO WAS RELEASED BY A MILITARY JUDGE AFTER HE DETERMINED THAT THERE WAS NOT ENOUGH EVIDENCE AGAINST HER."}, {"text": "SOME GROUPS, HOWEVER, ASSERT THAT CASOLO WAS RELEASED DUE TO POLITICAL PRESSURE FROM THE UNITED STATES, WHICH THREATENED TO LAUNCH A WORLDWIDE CAMPAIGN TO DISCREDIT EL SALVADOR IF CASOLO WAS NOT RELEASED."}, {"text": "AGUILAR MARROQUIN WAS ARRESTED AT 1500 ON 9 DECEMBER AFTER HAVING PARTICIPATED IN AN ATTACK ON AN URBAN PUBLIC BUS NEAR JUAN PABLO II BOULEVARD."}, {"text": "THE WOMAN FLED AND SOUGHT REFUGE INSIDE THE FACILITIES OF THE SALVADORAN ALBERTO MASFERRER UNIVERSITY, WHERE SHE TOOK A GROUP OF STUDENTS AS HOSTAGES, THREATENING THEM WITH HAND GRENADES."}, {"text": "THE POLICE PREVENTED HER FROM DOING ANYTHING AND ARRESTED HER, CONFISCATING ONE .45-CALIBER PISTOL, BULLETS, CARTRIDGES, AND TWO FRAGMENTATION GRENADES."}, {"text": "AGUILAR MARROQUIN SAID THAT SHE JOINED THE ERP LAST MARCH AND THAT SHE WAS PART OF AN URBAN COMMANDO CALLED WORKERS JUSTICE COMMAND."}, {"text": "AGUILAR ADDED THAT SHE KNOWS U.S. CITIZEN JENNIFER CASOLO, WHO BELONGS TO THE ERP, AND THAT CASOLO USED TO MEET WITH TERRORIST LEADER FERNANDO, WORKERS JUSTICE COMMAND OPERATIONS CHIEF, NEAR THE NATIONAL UNIVERSITY SCHOOL OF DENTISTRY (UES)."}, {"text": "AGUILAR ADDED THAT CASOLO WAS IN CHARGE OF ERP LOGISTICS, ESPECIALLY LODGING PEOPLE AND TRANSPORTING ARMS AND WAR EQUIPMENT."}, {"text": "THE ERP HAD GIVEN HER TWO MINIBUSES FOR HER TO CARRY OUT HER TASKS."}, {"text": "IN ADDITION, AGUILAR SAID THAT SHE BELIEVES CASOLO HAD A LEADING POSITION WITHIN THE ORGANIZATION, BECAUSE IN ADDITION TO MEETING WITH FERNANDO, SHE ALSO MET WITH AN INDIVIDUAL KNOWN AS MINCHO, WHO IS THE POLITICAL-MILITARY ERP METROPOLITAN CHIEF AND ALSO THE CHIEF OF THE SO-CALLED URBAN COMMANDOS."}, {"text": "THE PRISONER KNEW ABOUT THE EXISTENCE OF THE ARMS IN CASOLO'S HOUSE, BECAUSE ON VARIOUS OCCASIONS AGUILAR'S CHIEF, KNOWN AS MIRIAM, TOLD HER ABOUT IT."}, {"text": "OTHER TERRORISTS WENT TO CASOLO'S HOUSE TO GET WEAPONS, AMMUNITION, AND EXPLOSIVES TO CONDUCT THEIR SABOTAGE OPERATIONS AGAINST BUSES, TELEPHONE DISTRIBUTION BOXES, POWER PYLONS, OR TO CONDUCT LARGE OPERATIONS--AS AGUILAR DESCRIBED THEM-- SUCH AS ATTACKS ON MILITARY GARRISONS."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE INFORMATION OBTAINED, THE PRISONER WILL BE SENT TO COURT OVER THE NEXT FEW DAYS."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0003", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["09 DEC 89", "- 09 DEC 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], "document_mentions": [[538, 549]], {"sentences": [{"text": "A POWERFUL DYNAMITE CHARGE TODAY EXPLODED NEAR THE AMERICAN EMBASSY IN LA PAZ."}, {"text": "THE POLICE REPORTED THAT THE EXPLOSION CAUSED CONSIDERABLE DAMAGE TO ALL BUILDINGS ON THE BLOCK."}, {"text": "THE EXPLOSION OCCURRED AT 2130 (0130 GMT) ON THURSDAY (AS RECEIVED)."}, {"text": "IT DAMAGED WINDOWS OF THE BUILDINGS ON THE BLOCK."}, {"text": "JOSE PARADA GRANDY, THE BOLIVIAN POLICE CHIEF, TOLD EFE THAT AN UNIDENTIFIED PERSON STEPPED OUT OF A VEHICLE AND PLACED A PACKAGE IN ONE OF THE PLANT POTS ON JUAN DE LA RIVA STREET, A FEW METERS FROM THE U.S. EMBASSY IN DOWNTOWN LA PAZ."}, {"text": "PARADA SAID: "THE VEHICLE LEFT AND IMMEDIATELY THE CHARGE WENT OFF CAUSING CONSIDERABLE DAMAGE.""}, {"text": "THE "ZARATE WILLKA ARMED FORCES OF LIBERATION," A GROUP WITH AN INDIAN BAKCGROUND, HAS CLAIMED RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE ATTACK IN A COMMUNIQUE THAT WAS SENT TO SOME MEDIA."}, {"text": "THE NOTE, SIGNED WITH THE INITIALS OF THE "ZARATE WILLKA" GROUP, STATES: "IN DEFENSE OF THE SOVEREIGNTY OF THE PANAMANIAN PEOPLE."}, {"text": "DEATH TO THE INVADER."}, {"text": "OUR HATRED IS RELENTLESS; OUR WAR IS TO DEATH.""}, {"text": "THE "ZARATE WILLKA" GROUP CLAIMED RESPONSIBILITY IN AUGUST 1988 FOR THE ATTACK AGAINST THEN U.S. SECRETARY OF STATE GEORGE SHULTZ AND THE KILLING OF TWO MORMON MISSIONARIES."}, {"text": "TODAY'S BOMB EXPLOSION DAMAGED THE SHELVES OF A BOOK STORE, THE "PEOPLE'S PERUVIAN BANK," THE STATE BANK (NOT FURTHER IDENTIFIED); THE MARISCAL BALLIVIAN BUILDING, AND OTHER SHOPS, ALL OF WHICH ARE LOCATED NEAR THE U.S. EMBASSY."}, {"text": "AFTER THE EXPLOSION, A GROUP OF U.S. AGENTS CALLED OFF AN INVESTIGATION AT THE SCENE OF THE INCIDENT BECAUSE SOME PEOPLE SHOUTED AT THEM, "YANKEES, OUT OF PANAMA.""}, {"text": "THE U.S. EMBASSY PRESS ATTACHE, BRUCE WARTON, SAID TODAY THAT "IT IS OBVIOUSLY A DESPICABLE ACTION THAT DOES MORE HARM TO BOLIVIANS THAN TO THE U.S. EMBASSY, BECAUSE WE HAVE SUFFERED NO DAMAGES.""}], "template": {"sentences": [{"text": "MEDELLIN MAYOR JUAN GOMEZ MARTINEZ ONCE MORE INSISTED TODAY ON "AN IMMEDIATE DIALOGUE" BETWEEN THE GOVERNMENT AND THE COCAINE TRAFFICKERS "TO END THE WAR IN WHICH INNOCENT PEOPLE ARE BEING KILLED.""}, {"text": "THE MAYOR REITERATED HIS POSITION WHEN HE COMMENTED ON THE ATTACK IN WHICH 20 PERSONS WERE KILLED AND APPROXIMATELY 100 WERE INJURED, WHICH WAS PERPETRATED YESTERDAY BY TERRORISTS ON THE DRUG CARTEL'S PAYROLL NEAR ITAGUI MUNICIPALITY."}, {"text": "THE BLAST FROM THE EXPLOSION HIT A TRUCK FULL OF POLICEMEN, WHO HAD EARLIER CARRIED OUT AN ANTI-MAFIA OPERATION IN A PEASANT VILLAGE, AS WELL AS SEVERAL PUBLIC BUSES, HOUSES, AND BUSINESSES."}, {"text": "A POLICE EXPERT SAID THAT THE CAR BOMB (CONTAINING 300 KG OF DYNAMITE) WAS ACTIVATED BY REMOTE CONTROL AS THE ELITE FORCE PATROL PASSED BY."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO GOMEZ MARTINEZ, "THESE ACTIONS WILL ONLY CEASE WHEN (PRESIDENT VIRGILIO BARCO VARGAS') GOVERNMENT PUTS ASIDE SO MUCH PREJUDICE AND AGREES TO THE PEACE TALKS," PROPOSED BY THE SUBVERSIVES."}, {"text": ""THE DIALOGUE WILL TAKE PLACE SONNER OR LATER, AND IT IS BETTER TO START NOW," INSISTED THE MAYOR OF MEDELLIN, A CITY WHERE THE WORLD'S MOST POWERFUL CARTEL HAS ITS BASE OF OPERATIONS."}, {"text": "THE CHIEF OF THE CRIMINAL GANG, PABLO ESCOBAR GAVIRIA, ORDERED THE ASSASSINATION OF MEDELLIN POLICEMEN IN RETALIATION FOR THE GOVERNMENT'S ACTION AGAINST THE DRUG TRAFFICKERS."}, {"text": "TWENTY-EIGHT POLICEMEN HAVE BEEN KILLED IN THIS CITY OVER THE LAST TWO WEEKS."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO SECURITY ORGANIZATIONS, YESTERDAY'S ATTACK "COULD BE ESCOBAR GAVIRIA'S RESPONSE TO THE ARREST OF ADOLFO MESA MENESES," HIS RIGHT-HAND MAN."}, {"text": "MESA MENESES WAS ARRESTED LAST WEEK BY THE ADMINISTRATIVE DEPARTMENT OF SECURITY (DAS, SECRET POLICE), AND THE AUTHORITIES HAVE ACCUSED HIM OF ASSASSINATING -- ON ORDERS FROM THE MAFIA LEADER -- LEFTIST PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE BERNARDO JARAMILLO OSSA, AS WELL AS A CHIEF OF POLICE, A MAYOR, AND SEVERAL JOURNALISTS."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, HUNDREDS OF SOLDIERS, POLICEMEN, AND DETECTIVES ARE CARRYING OUT LARGE-SCALE OPERATIONS IN THE COLOMBIAN COUNTRYSIDE AND BORDER AREAS ON THE SUSPICION THAT ESCOBAR GAVIRIA PLANS TO FLEE THE COUNTRY."}, {"text": "LAST NIGHT, A TELEVISION NEWSCAST SHOWED PHOTOGRAPHS OF THE "DRUG LORD" THAT HAD BEEN "RECENTLY" TAKEN BY SECURITY ORGANIZATIONS AT A COLOMBIAN BEACH ON THE PACIFIC COAST."}, {"text": "A POLICE DEPARTMENT SPOKESMAN CONFIRMED TODAY THAT "WE HAVE RELIABLE INFORMATION ON HIS WHEREABOUTS," ALTHOUGH HE REFRAINED FROM GIVING FURTHER DETAILS."}, {"text": "UNOFFICIAL SOURCES SAID THAT ESCOBAR GAVIRIA "IS SOMEWHERE IN WESTERN ANTIOQUIA DEPARTMENT" -- OF WHICH MEDELLIN IS THE CAPITAL -- WHERE THE SEARCH OPERATIONS ARE CONCENTRATED."}, {"text": "COLOMBIAN AUTHORITIES HAVE ALSO ASKED FOR THE COOPERATION OF BRAZIL, ECUADOR, PANAMA, PERU, AND VENEZUELA TO STOP THE DRUG TRAFFICKERS FROM ESCAPING TO THOSE COUNTRIES."}], {"sentences": [{"text": "WE HAVE STARTED A NEW DAY, THE SEVENTH, AND THE FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT (FMLN) IS STILL HOLDING ITS POSITIONS."}, {"text": "WE HAVE NOT RETREATED A SINGLE STEP."}, {"text": "IF WE MAKE ANY MOVE, IT WILL BE TO ADVANCE TOWARD THE ENEMY BARRACKS, BECAUSE WE WILL SEIZE POWER AND EXPEL THE MILITARY DICTATORSHIP THAT HAS INSTALLED ITSELF IN OUR HOMELAND."}, {"text": "THE FMLN MAINTAINS FOR THE 7TH DAY ITS POSITIONS IN THE DEPARTMENTAL CAPITALS."}, {"text": "WE CONTINUE TO ADVANCE IN SAN MIGUEL; WE HAVE MADE AN IMPORTANT SEIZURE OF WEAPONS IN SAN MIGUEL."}, {"text": "THE SITUATION COULD NOT BE BETTER IN SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": "LAST NIGHT WE REPORTED THAT THE ARCH OF LIBERTY EXISTS IN THE CAPITAL; IT IS COMPRISED OF NEIGHBORHOODS AND HOUSING PROJECTS -- WHERE THE PROTAGONISTS OF THIS HISTORY ARE THE MASSES, WHICH ARE ORGANIZED FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF TRENCHES AND BARRICADES."}, {"text": "THE PEOPLE ARE THE MOST IMPORTANT PROTAGONISTS IN THIS HISTORIC ACTION."}, {"text": "RADIO VENCEREMOS URGES THE PEOPLE TO MULTIPLY THEIR ORGANIZATION IN EACH NEIGHBORHOOD, RESIDENTIAL AREA, AND TOWN."}, {"text": "POPULAR COMMITTEES MUST BE ORGANIZED; THE PEOPLE MUST ORGANIZE THEMSELVES; BUT IF THE ENEMY IS NEAR, THIS MUST BE DONE CLANDESTINELY."}, {"text": "ALL THE GROUPS IN EACH TOWN, MEANING THE RELIGIOUS GROUPS, STUDENT ORGANIZATIONS, TEACHERS ORGANIZATIONS, AND COOPERATIVES, MUST ALL ORGANIZE, REGARDLESS OF THEIR POLITICAL BELIEFS."}, {"text": "OUR UNITY MUST BECOME THE BEST TOOL TO EVICT, ONCE AND FOR ALL, THE MURDEROUS MILITARY DICTATORSHIP WHICH ASSASSINATES PRIESTS AND WHICH BOMBED THE CAPITAL AGAIN EARLY THIS MORNING."}, {"text": "IT HAS AGAIN CAUSED MORE DEATHS AND WOUNDED IN SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": "IT IS IMPORTANT FOR THE PEOPLE TO ORGANIZE COMMITTEES IN EACH NEIGHBORHOOD, RESIDENTIAL AREA, AND TOWN, AND THE WHOLE COMMUNITY MUST PARTICIPATE."}, {"text": "IF THE ARMED FORCES ARE NEAR, THEN CLANDESTINE ORGANIZATION MUST BE CONDUCTED IN SMALL TOWNS, VILLAGES, AND NEIGHBORHOODS."}, {"text": "THE PEOPLE MUST ORGANIZE THEMSELVE TO CONSPIRE AGAINST DEATH, TO CONSPIRE AGAINST THE ASSASSINS, TO CONSPIRE AGAINST POVERTY, TO CONSPIRE AGAINST HUNGER, AND TO CONSPIRE AGAINST THE BOMBINGS."}, {"text": "IT IS NECESSARY TO ORGANIZE THE PEOPLE; IT IS NECESSARY TO ORGANIZE THE ENTIRE COUNTRY."}, {"text": "EL SALVADOR MUST BECOME A BODY COMPRISED OF ORGANIZED CELLS -- EVERYWHERE AND IN EVERY POSSIBLE FORM -- REGARDLESS OF THE PEOPLE'S RELIGIOUS BELIEFS OR POLITICAL PARTY."}, {"text": "WE ISSUE AN APPEAL TO THE DECEIVED ARENA (NATIONALIST REPUBLICAN ALLIANCE) RANK AND FILE, WHO VOTED BELIEVING THAT THIS GOVERNMENT WOULD REPRESENT A CHANGE FOR THE BETTER."}, {"text": "WE ALSO ISSUE AN APPEAL TO ALL THE PATRIOTIC CITIZENS OF THE HOMELAND, URGING THEM TO STOP THE DESTRUCTION OF THE CAPITAL, TO STOP THE DESTRUCTION OF THE COUNTRY."}, {"text": "WE URGE THEM TO UNITE AND STOP THE WAR; AND THE END OF THE WAR IS NEAR -- WITH THE PEOPLE'S VICTORY."}, {"text": "(CONTINUED)"}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0008", "message_template": 1, "message_template_optional": true, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["17 NOV 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], "document_mentions": [[2118, 2129]], "sentence_mentions": {"17": [[0, 11]]}}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["SAN SALVADOR"], "strings_rhs": ["CITY"], "document_mentions": [[557, 569], [1555, 1567]], "sentence_mentions": {"5": [[37, 49]], "12": [[47, 59]]}}], "incident_type": "BOMBING", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["ACCOMPLISHED"]}, "incident_instrument_id": null, "perp_incident_category": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["STATE-SPONSORED VIOLENCE"]}, "perp_individual_id": null, "perp_organization_id": null, "perp_organization_confidence": null, "phys_tgt_id": null, "phys_tgt_effect_of_incident": null, "hum_tgt_name": null, "hum_tgt_description": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["DEATHS"], "document_mentions": [[1533, 1539]], "sentence_mentions": {"12": [[25, 31]]}}, {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["WOUNDED"], "document_mentions": [[1544, 1551]], "sentence_mentions": {"12": [[36, 43]]}}], "hum_tgt_effect_of_incident": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["DEATH"], "strings_rhs": ["DEATHS"]}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["INJURY"], "strings_rhs": ["WOUNDED"]}]}, "hit_id": 93}

{"sentences": [{"text": "MR. PRESIDENT, WHEN ONE SEES PERU FACING THE DIFFICULTIES IT IS EXPERIENCING NOW, THE SAME AS OUR OWN COUNTRY AND LATIN AMERICA IN GENERAL, ONE ASKS HIMSELF: WOULD A MAN, A NOVELIST LIKE MARIO VARGAS LLOSA, BE THE RIGHT MAN TO LEAD PERU?"}, {"text": "(GARCIA) AS PRESIDENT OF ALL PERUVIANS -- AND OF VARGAS LLOSA TO EVEN IF HE DOES NOT LIKE IT -- I CANNOT PASS JUDGMENT, EITHER ETHICALLY OR INTELLECTUALLY, ON A POLITICIAN AND PERUVIAN WHO IS CONTENDING FOR THE PRESIDENCY."}, {"text": "(REPORTER)"}, {"text": "WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO AFTER YOU STEP DOWN FROM THE PRESIDENCY?"}, {"text": "(GARCIA) WELL, I AM GOING TO BE FREE."}, {"text": "(AMAT) WHY DO YOU NOT COME TO COLOMBIA AND I AM SURE... (GARCIA, INTERRUPTING) SURE, I ACCEPT YOUR INVITATION, AND I HOPE SOME COLOMBIANS WILL EXTEND IT."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, I WANT TO TELL YOU VERY HONESTLY, THAT I AM PERHAPS BETTER AT SELLING DREAMS, IDEAS, AND DOCTRINES THAN AT ADMINISTERING A SITUATION OF PENURY, LIKE THE ONE OUR COUNTRIES ARE EXPERIENCING, AND MOST PARTICULARLY PERU, WHICH IS ONE OF THE POOREST COUNTRIES IN LATIN AMERICA."}, {"text": "IT IS VERY DIFFICULT."}, {"text": "FOR INSTANCE, ON A DAY WHEN THE PRICE OF RICE OR CHICKEN GOES UP, THE PEOPLE WILL NOT BELIEVE YOU, EVEN IF YOU TELL THEM THE GREATEST OF TRUTHS."}, {"text": "ONE CAN BE PREACHING SOMETHING VERY IMPORTANT, BUT IF IT FAILED TO RAIN AND THE CITY HAD NO WATER NO ONE WILL BELIEVE OF YOU THE GREATEST OF ALL TRUTHS."}, {"text": "THEN, WHEN ONE STOPS BEING PRESIDENT AND ADMINISTERING PENURY, ONE CAN DEVOTE ONESELF TO CONVINCING PEOPLE, TO EDUCATING."}, {"text": "THAT IS WHAT I SHOULD DO."}, {"text": "(AMAT) NOW, WHY DID YOU MAKE THAT ASIDE, MAKING ME PRESIDENT OF ALL PERUVIANS, EVEN OF VARGAS LLOSA?"}, {"text": "WHETHER HE LIKES OR NOT IT HURTS HIM."}, {"text": "(GARCIA) BECAUSE I AM SURE THAT SOME PEOPLE WOULD NOT LIKE TO HAVE ME AS PRESIDENT."}, {"text": "(LAUGHTER) (AMAT) EVEN HIM, FOR INSTANCE?"}, {"text": "(GARCIA)"}, {"text": "I DID NOT SAY SO."}, {"text": "I DO NOT KNOW."}, {"text": "I NEVER FALL TO THE LEVEL OF DEFINING PEOPLE OR POINTING OUT LAST NAMES."}, {"text": "I MAKE AN OUTLINE OR DEFINE THEM IN THE NEGATIVE."}, {"text": "(AMAT) MR. PRESIDENT, (WORDS INDISTINCT) THIS DIALOGUE (WORDS INDISTINCT) FOR YOUR GENEROSITY AND KINDNESS."}, {"text": "ADDRESSING OUR PEOPLE AND OUR COUNTRY, (WORDS INDISTINCT), HOW WERE THINGS TODAY AT THE SUMMIT?"}, {"text": "(GARCIA) VERY WELL."}, {"text": "COLOMBIANS, WHO HAVE SEEN THEIR INSTITUTION THREATENED, THEIR PRESS ABUSED, AND MANY POLITICIANS ALSO THREATENED, MUST HAVE CONFIDENCE THAT LATIN AMERICA, TOGETHER WITH THE UNITED STATES, WILL CONFRONT THE PROBLEM OF DRUG TRAFFICKING."}, {"text": "THIS IS NOT ONLY A PROBLEM FOR COLOMBIA."}, {"text": "IT IS OUR PROBLEM TOO, AND WE WILL TACKLE IT."}, {"text": "THE DAY A NEWSPAPER WAS BLOWN UP IN BOGOTA I CAME TO BOGOTA BECAUSE I FELT THAT FREEDOM OF THE PRESS WAS THREATENED ON THE CONTINENT."}, {"text": "AFTER ALL, WE ARE LATIN AMERICANS."}, {"text": "LET COLOMBIANS HAVE CONFIDENCE."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0010", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": null, "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["COLOMBIA"], "document_mentions": [[606, 614], [703, 711], [2134, 2142], [2400, 2408], [2629, 2637]], "sentence_mentions": {"5": [[30, 38], [127, 135]], "24": [[0, 8]], "25": [[31, 39]], "29": [[4, 12]]}}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["BOGOTA"], "strings_rhs": ["CITY"], "document_mentions": [[2492, 2498], [2509, 2515]], "sentence_mentions": {"27": [[36, 42], [53, 59]]}}], "incident_type": "BOMBING", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["ACCOMPLISHED"]}, "incident_instrument_id": null, "perp_incident_category": {"type": "simple_strings", {"sentences": [{"text": "THE CHIEF OF THE ARMED FORCES JOINT CHIEFS OF STAFF (COLONEL RENE EMILIO PONCE) HAS CATEGORICALLY DENIED THAT THERE ARE ANY RIFTS BETWEEN SALVADORAN ARMY OFFICERS AND U.S. MILITARY ADVISERS, AS ASSERTED BY THE WASHINGTON POST."}, {"text": "THE NEWSPAPER STATED THAT THE ALLEGED RIFT BETWEEN THE MILITARY OFFICERS BEGAN ONCE IT WAS DISCOVERED WHO WAS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE DEATH OF SIX JESUIT PRIESTS, IN WHICH ONE COLONEL, TWO LIEUTENANTS, AND SIX SOLDIERS ARE BEING CHARGED."}, {"text": "COLONEL PONCE SAID THAT THE RELATIONS WITH U.S. ADVISERS -- ABOUT 52 IN THE COUNTRY -- ARE VERY CORDIAL."}, {"text": "(BEGIN RECORDING) (PONCE) OUR RELATIONS WITH THE NORTH AMERICANS ARE NORMAL AS USUAL."}, {"text": "THE U.S. ADVISERS HAVE HELPED US VERY MUCH IN THE PROFESSIONALIZATION OF THE ARMED FORCES, AND THEY CONTINUE WORKING WITH US."}, {"text": "(REPORTER) WHERE DO YOU THINK THESE WIRE REPORTS STATING THERE ARE RIFTS BETWEEN SALVADORAN MILITARY OFFICERS AND U.S. ADVISERS HAVE ORGINIATED?"}, {"text": "(PONCE)"}, {"text": "I DO NOT KNOW; I CANNOT UNDERSTAND."}, {"text": "THERE ARE ALWAYS THOSE WHO TRY TO BREAK THE STRATEGIC ALLIANCE BETWEEN THE SALVADORAN GOVERNMENT AND ARMED FORCES AND THE UNITED STATES."}, {"text": "THIS IS A POOR COUNTRY THAT DEPENDS A GREAT DEAL ON U.S. ECONOMIC AND MILITARY AID."}, {"text": "(REPORTER) FOLLOWING THE MURDER OF THE JESUITS, WHAT ARE RELATIONS LIKE BETWEEN THE SALVADORAN MILITARY AND THE GRINGO ADVISERS?"}, {"text": "(PONCE) AS USUAL, THESE RELATIONS ARE VERY CORDIAL, AND THEY CONTINUE TO WORK WITH US."}, {"text": "AS YOU CAN SEE, TWO ADVISERS ARE HERE WITH ME NOW AT THE TABLE PRESIDING OVER THE EVENT."}, {"text": "THE SAME HAS BEEN THE CASE WITH ALL THE UNITS IN THE COUNTRY'S INTERIOR."}, {"text": "I FAIL TO SEE ANY DIFFERENCE IN RELATIONS BEFORE AND AFTERWARD."}, {"text": "(END RECORDING) THE MILITARY CHIEF REPEATED THE NEED TO MAINTAIN THE STATE OF EMERGENCY, NOT ONLY DUE TO THE GUERRILLA ATTACKS, BUT ALSO TO KEEP CONTROL OVER THE ORGANIZATION FRONTS JUST PRIOR TO AN EXPECTED WAVE OF PROTESTS ON THE LATEST GOVERNMENT ECONOMY MEASURES."}, {"text": "(BEGIN RECORDING) (PONCE) WE MUST START THINKING WHAT MAY HAPPEN TO DOMESTIC ORDER IN THE FACE OF THE ECONOMIC MEASURES THAT HAVE BEEN ISSUED OR ARE PLANNED."}, {"text": "WE MUST THINK WHAT THE REACTION OF THE PEOPLE OR THE FMLN (FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT) ORGANIZATION FRONTS WILL BE, AS THEY ALWAYS USE ANY EXCUSE TO DISRUPT DOMESTIC ORDER."}, {"text": "IT WOULD BE GOOD TO LOOK INTO WHAT IS NEEDED TO MAINTAIN DOMESTIC ORDER IN THE COUNTRY."}, {"text": "(END RECORDING) THE HIGH-RANKING MILITARY OFFICER GAVE THESE STATEMENTS AT THE CEREMONY TO TURN OVER COMMAND OF THE CAPTAIN GENERAL GERARDO BARRIOS MILITARY ACADEMY."}, {"text": "THE NEW COMMANDER IS COLONEL RICARDO ALFONSO CASANOVA SANDOVAL, WHO REPLACES COLONEL GUILLERMO ALFREDO BENAVIDES MORENO, REMOVED FROM HIS POST AFTER BEING ACCUSED OF ORDERING THE MURDER OF THE JESUIT PRIESTS."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, COLONEL HECTOR HERIBERTO HERNANDEZ HAS BEEN APPOINTED COMMANDER OF THE 6TH INFANTRY BRIGADE BASED IN USULUTAN, AND IN LA UNION DEPARTMENT THE CHANGE OF COMMAND CEREMONIES OF THE ARMED FORCES MILITARY TRAINING CENTER HAVE TAKEN PLACE, WHERE COLONEL FRANCISCO ARTURO LOPEZ WILL BE IN COMMAND REPLACING COLONEL CARLOS ALFREDO RIVAS, WHO HAS BEEN TRANSFERRED TO THE JOINT CHIEFS OF STAFF."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0011", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 07 FEB 90"]}],
