{"sentences": [{"text": "THE SUPREME COURT TODAY ORDERED THE APPOINTEMENT OF A SPECIAL JUDGE TO INVESTIGATE THE MURDER OF JECAR NEGHME, SPOKESMAN OF THE MIR (MOVEMENT OF THE REVOLUTIONARY LEFT)."}, {"text": "IN RESPONSE TO THIS ORDER, THE SANTIAGO APPELLATE COURT HAS APPOINTED JUDGE CARLOS MENESES PIZARRO TO INVESTIGATE THE CRIME AND TO SEND ALL INFORMATION FROM THE FOURTH CRIMINAL COURT OF SANTIAGO."}, {"text": "THE SUPREME COURT ORDERED THE INVESTIGATION AS A RESULT OF THE PUBLIC ALARM OVER THE MURDER OF JECAR NEGHME ON A STREET IN SANTIAGO."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0012", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 06 SEP 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["CHILE"], "document_mentions": [], "sentence_mentions": {}}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["SANTIAGO"], "strings_rhs": ["CITY"], "document_mentions": [[201, 209], [356, 364], [489, 497]], "sentence_mentions": {"1": [[31, 39], [186, 194]], "2": [[123, 131]]}}], "incident_type": "ATTACK", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["ACCOMPLISHED"]}, "incident_instrument_id": null, "perp_incident_category": null, "perp_individual_id": null, "perp_organization_id": null, "perp_organization_confidence": null, "phys_tgt_id": null, "phys_tgt_effect_of_incident": null, "hum_tgt_name": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["JECAR NEGHME"], "document_mentions": [[97, 109], [461, 473]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[97, 109]], "2": [[95, 107]]}}], "hum_tgt_description": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["SPOKESMAN OF THE MIR", "SPOKESMAN OF THE MIR [MOVEMENT OF THE REVOLUTIONARY LEFT]"], "strings_rhs": ["JECAR NEGHME"]}], "hum_tgt_effect_of_incident": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["DEATH"], "strings_rhs": ["JECAR NEGHME"]}]}, "hit_id": 96}

{"sentences": [{"text": "THIS AFTERNOON, ON THE BERMEJA RIVER, SUCUMBIOS PROVINCE, IN NORTHEASTERN ECUADOR, AT APPROXIMATELY ONE AND A HALF KM FROM THE COLOMBIAN BORDER, A SMALL ECUADORAN FLAGSHIP WORKING WITH THE IMANCO MINING COMPANY, WAS INTERCEPTED BY A COLOMBIAN VESSEL WHICH FIRED AUTOMATIC WEAPONS."}, {"text": "THE FOLLOWING PEOPLE WERE ABOARD THE ECUADORAN FLAGSHIP:"}, {"text": "U.S. CITIZEN SCOTT HEYNDAL, ECUADOREANS LUIS ANTONIO MENESES BENAVIDES AND EDWIN RODRIGO TENEDA PARRENO, AND COLOMBIAN PILOT JULIO TORRES."}, {"text": "MR. TORRES WAS KILLED AND MR. MENESES WAS WOUNDED."}, {"text": "THE ATTACKERS, WHO WORE FIELD UNIFORMS OF THE COLOMBIAN MILITARY, BOARDED THE ECUADORAN VESSEL, AND, AFTER NOTICING THAT MR. MENESES WAS WOUNDED, GAVE HIM 100,000 COLOMBIAN PESOS AND THEN LEFT HIM AND MR. TORRES' BODY."}, {"text": "THE ATTACKERS RETURNED TO COLOMBIA TAKING HEYNDAL AND TENEDA WITH THEM."}, {"text": "THEY CROSSED THE BORDER AND SAILED UPRIVER FOR ABOUT TWO AND A HALF HOURS ON THE RUMIYACU RIVER."}, {"text": "THE ATTACKERS SPENT THE EVENING AT A CAMP NEAR THE RIVER AND FORCED MR. HEYNDAL TO WRITE LETTERS TO HIS BOSS AT THE MINING PROJECT, MR. JEFF SINO, ALSO A U.S. CITIZEN, AND TO HIS WIFE."}, {"text": "THOSE LETTERS WERE GIVEN TO MR. TENEDA, WHO RECEIVED 20,000 COLOMBIAN PESOS."}, {"text": "HE WAS THEN ORDERED TO RETURN TO ECUADOR AND GIVEN INSTRUCTIONS FOR DELIVERING THE LETTERS."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0013", {"sentences": [{"text": "TODAY, MEDELLIN, COLOMBIA'S SECOND LARGEST CITY, ONCE AGAIN EXPERIENCED A TERRORIST ESCALATION WHEN SEVEN BANK BRANCH OFFICES WERE SHAKEN BY EXPLOSIVES THAT CAUSED HEAVY DAMAGE BUT NO FATALITIES, ACCORDING TO RADIO REPORTS BROADCAST IN BOGOTA (500 KM TO THE SOUTH)."}, {"text": "THE TARGETS OF THE ATTACKS WERE THE BANCO CAFETERO BRANCHES AND ITS OFFICES IN MEDELLIN'S MIDDLE, WESTERN, AND SOUTHEASTERN AREAS."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO PRELIMINARY REPORTS, OVER 55 KG OF DYNAMITE WERE USED IN THE ATTACKS."}, {"text": "THE RADIO REPORT ADDED THAT THE POLICE DEFUSED ANOTHER 20 KG OF EXPLOSIVES THAT HAD SLOW BURNING FUSES."}, {"text": "THE MEDELLIN CARTEL OPERATES IN THIS CITY LOCATED IN COLOMBIA'S NORTHEASTERN AREA."}, {"text": "FOR SEVERAL DAYS NOW, THE CITY HAS BEEN SHAKEN BY ARMY AND POLICE OPERATIONS IN AN UNPRECEDENTED ACTION TO CAPTURE DRUG LORDS."}, {"text": "NO ONE HAS CLAIMED RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE TERRORIST ATTACKS, WHICH LASTED FOR 1 HOUR."}], {"sentences": [{"text": "COLOMBIAN PRESIDENT VIRGILIO BARCO VARGAS CUT SHORT HIS STAY IN JAPAN AND LEFT FOR HOME FRIDAY MORNING FOLLOWING A TRUCK-BOMB EXPLOSION IN THE COLOMBIAN CAPITAL OF BOGOTA ON WEDNESDAY."}, {"text": "BARCO, THE FIRST HEAD OF STATE OF COLOMBIA TO VISIT JAPAN, WAS INITIALLY SCHEDULED TO DEPART FROM TOKYO FRIDAY EVENING, ENDING HIS FOUR-DAY OFFICIAL VISIT."}, {"text": "A TRUCK RIGGED WITH DYNAMITE EXPLODED WEDNESDAY MORNING OUTSIDE A FEDERAL POLICE BUILDING IN DOWNTOWN BOGOTA, KILLING AT LEAST 23 PEOPLE AND INJURING 1,000, ACCORDING TO REPORTS FROM COLOMBIA."}, {"text": "DURING HIS-FOUR DAY STAY IN JAPAN, BARCO MET PRIME MINISTER TOSHIKI KAIFU AND HAD AN AUDIENCE WITH EMPEROR AKIHITO."}, {"text": "KAIFU AND BARCO AGREED THAT THE WHOLE WORLD MUST FIGHT AGAINST THE DRUG PROBLEM AND KAIFU EXPRESSED HIS SUPPORT FOR BARCO IN DEALING WITH THE ISSUE."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0017", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", {"sentences": [{"text": "WE ARE RECEIVING A REPORT RIGHT NOW ON THE SITUATION IN SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": "THE REPORT SAYS THAT SAN SALVADOR NEIGHBORHOODS AND RESIDENTIAL AREAS ARE STILL UNDER THE CONTROL OF THE FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT (FMLN)."}, {"text": "ARMED FORCES OFFICIAL SOURCES HAVE ADMITTED THAT SOME AREAS OF SAN SALVADOR ARE CONTROLLED BY THE FMLN."}, {"text": "THE REPORT ADDS THAT AS OF 2140 ON 12 NOVEMBER, THERE WAS STILL TENSION IN THE CITY."}, {"text": "SOME SPORADIC SHOOTING WAS STILL HEARD, AND THE SITUATION IN VARIOUS PARTS OF THE CAPITAL CITY INDICATED THAT OUR COMRADES ARE MAINTAINING THEIR POSITIONS, THEY ARE CARRYING OUT MILITARY ENGINEERING TASKS, OPENING TRENCHES, AND SETTING UP BARRICADES WITH THE COOPERATION OF THE SAN SALVADOR PEOPLE."}, {"text": "PRESS AGENCY REPORTS NOTE THAT THERE IS GREAT TENSION IN THE CAPITAL CITY, AND APPARENTLY THEY ARE EXPECTING (CHANGES THOUGHT) HERE IS A NEWS AGENCY REPORT WHICH SAYS THAT EARLY THIS MORNING, LESS SHOOTING WAS HEARD BECAUSE APPARENTLY EACH SIDE HAD CONSOLIDATED THEIR POSITION."}, {"text": "THAT IS WHAT SOME PRESS AGENCIES ARE REPORTING."}, {"text": "WE HAVE ALSO OBSERVED THAT THE ARMED FORCES HAVE ADMITTED THAT SOME AREAS IN THE CAPITAL CITY ARE CONTROLLED BY THE FMLN."}, {"text": "THERE ARE MANY VEHICLES SCATTERED ALL OVER THE STREETS OF SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": "THAT IS THE REPORT WE HAVE RECEIVED FROM SAN SALVADOR, WHERE OUR FIGHTERS IN ZACAMIL AND OTHER NEIGHBORHOODS AND RESIDENTIAL AREAS IN THE CAPITAL CITY ARE NOW RECEIVING THE SUPPORT OF THE PEOPLE WHO ARE FORTIFYING THEMSELVES IN NEIGHBORHOODS."}, {"text": "WE CALL ON THE SAN SALVADORAN YOUTHS TO GO OUT TONIGHT TO COOPERATE WITH THE FMLN FIGHTERS."}, {"text": "MAKE THE ASSASSINS OF MSGR ROMERO PAY DEARLY FOR EVERY STEP THEY TAKE AGAINST THE PEOPLE IN THE NEIGHBORHOODS IN SAN SALVADOR CITY."}, {"text": "IT HAS BEEN 24, 25, NEARLY 26 HOURS SINCE THE FMLN FIGHTERS ESTABLISHED THEIR POSITIONS IN SAN SALVADOR IN VIEW OF THE REGIME'S INCOMPETENCE."}, {"text": "THE REGIME HAS CLEARLY SAID THAT IT IS INCAPABLE OF CONTROLLING THE SITUATION, AS IT HAS HAD TO DECREE A STATE OF SIEGE THAT BEGAN ON THE EVENING OF 12 NOVEMBER IN SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": "ANOTHER EVIDENCE OF THE GOVERNMENT'S WEAKNESS IS THE GAG PLACED ON THE MEDIA."}, {"text": "THE GOVERNMENT HAS NOT ALLOWED THE MEDIA TO BROADCAST ITS NEWSCASTS."}, {"text": "WHY DOESN'T THE GOVERNMENT WANT THE PEOPLE TO LISTEN TO NEWSCASTS IN EL SALVADOR?"}, {"text": "WHAT IS THE CRISTIANI REGIME HIDING?"}, {"text": "THIS IS A QUESTION THAT THE PEOPLE ARE ASKING; THEY WANT TO KNOW THE ANSWER."}, {"text": "THE GOVERNMENT IS AFRAID, IT DOES NOT WANT TO INFORM THE PEOPLE ABOUT THE DEVELOPMENTS OR THE SCOPE OF THE ACTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE FMLN THROUGHOUT THE NATIONAL TERRITORY."}, {"text": "COMRADE FIGHTERS: WE HAVE ALREADY TOLD YOU; THIS IS IN THE BAG."}, {"text": "YOUR COURAGE AND DETERMINATION TO WIN HAS MADE IT POSSIBLE TO CARRY OUT THE FMLN PLAN AS OUR COMMUNIQUE ISSUED BY THE GENERAL COMMAND HAS SAID."}, {"text": "COMRADES: KEEP IT UP, KEEP AN OPEN EYE, KEEP UP THE HIGH MORALE AS YOU HAVE DONE UP TO NOW, SEEK CONTACT WITH THE PEOPLE, RECEIVE THEIR COOPERATION IN THE FORTIFICATIONS THAT ARE BEING MADE THROUGHOUT SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": "LET'S GO TO THE TOP AND THAT'S IT."}], "template": {"sentences": [{"text": "PRESIDENT ALFREDO CRISTIANI SAID TODAY THAT DESPITE THE FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT'S (FMLN) TERRORIST ATTACKS AGAINST SALVADORANS, HIS GOVERNMENT IS WILLING TO HOLD TALKS WITH THE REBELS."}, {"text": "HE SAID THAT HIS ADMINISTRATION IS CONTINUING ITS EFFORTS TO FORM A COMMISSION FOR A DIALOGUE WITH THE REBELS AND THAT HE IS NOW AWAITING WORD FROM TWO PEOPLE WHOM HE HAS CHOSEN TO SERVE ON THE COMMISSION."}, {"text": "THE CATHOLIC CHURCH WILL NOT BE REPRESENTED ON THE COMMISSION BECAUSE THE COMMISSION IS COMPLETELY POLITICAL IN NATURE."}, {"text": "PRESIDENT CRISTIANI CONDEMNED THE MURDER OF NATIONAL FIRE DEPARTMENT DIRECTOR COLONEL ROBERTO ARMANDO RIVERA ESCOBAR, WHO WAS KILLED IN A MACHINEGUN ATTACK THIS MORNING."}, {"text": "PRESIDENT CRISTIANI ATTRIBUTED RIVERA'S MURDER TO THE FMLN: (BEGIN RECORDING) (CRISTIANI)"}, {"text": "IT IS CLEAR THAT THE FMLN DOES NOT WANT PEACE BUT INSTEAD WANTS TO CONTINUE THE VIOLENCE."}, {"text": "THE FMLN COMMITTED THIS CRIME."}, {"text": "I BELIEVE THAT A TREACHEROUS CRIME SUCH AS THIS ONE CANNOT BE CALLED ANYTHING BUT A COWARDLY ACT."}, {"text": "WE WILL, OF COURSE, INVESTIGATE THE CRIME."}, {"text": "I REPEAT, HOWEVER, THAT ALL THE EVIDENCE WE HAVE GATHERED ON THE FMLN'S PLANS INDICATE THAT IT WAS RESPONSIBLE FOR THIS ACTION."}, {"text": "(REPORTER)"}, {"text": "(WORDS INDISTINCT) WHAT ARE YOU DOING TO PREPARE THE COMMISSION THAT IS TO HOLD TALKS (WORDS INDISTINCT)?"}, {"text": "(CRISTIANI) THE TERRORISTS WILL NOT OF COURSE BE SUCCESSFUL WITH ACTIONS OF THIS KIND AND WILL NOT PROVOKE US INTO VIOLENT ACTION."}, {"text": "THEY SHOULD UNDERSTAND BY NOW THAT THE GOVERNMENT IS SEARCHING FOR PEACE AND WANTS TO ACHIEVE PEACE WITHIN EL SALVADOR'S LEGAL FRAMEWORK AND BY APPLYING THE LAW."}, {"text": "THE FMLN REBELS SHOULD UNDERSTAND THAT THEIR TERRORIST ACTIONS WILL NOT LEAD US TO TAKE RASH ACTIONS; IT IS USELESS FOR THEM TO CONTINUE TO ACT IN THIS WAY."}, {"text": "WE ARE CONTINUING OUR WORK ON SETTING UP THE COMMISSION."}, {"text": "TODAY WE WILL SPEAK WITH TWO PEOPLE WHO HAVE STILL NOT TOLD US IF THEY WILL ACCEPT MY INVITATION TO BE COMMISSION MEMBERS."}, {"text": "THE NAMES OF THE COMMISSION MEMBERS WILL BE RELEASED TO THE PUBLIC ONCE THE COMMISSION IS FULLY FORMED."}, {"text": "(REPORTER)"}, {"text": "(WORDS INDISTINCT) THE CATHOLIC CHURCH'S ROLE IN THIS COMMISSION?"}, {"text": "(CRISTIANI) (WORDS INDISTINCT) THE CATHOLIC CHURCH WILL NOT BE REPRESENTED IN THIS COMMISSION BECAUSE IT IS A POLITICAL COMMISSION AND NOT ONE IN WHICH THE CHURCH CAN EFFECTIVELY PARTICIPATE."}, {"text": "THE CHURCH HAS ALWAYS WORKED FOR PEACE AND HAS MADE ALL POSSIBLE EFFORTS TO FIND PEACE FOR THE COUNTRY THE CHURCH WILL CONTINUE TO WORK TOWARD THIS GOAL."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, I BELIEVE THAT THE CHURCH HAS A DIFFERENT ROLE TO PLAY IN THE SEARCH FOR PEACE, AND THAT ROLE IS NOT SERVING ON THE POLITICAL COMMISSION."}, {"text": "(REPORTER)"}, {"text": "WHAT WOULD YOU SAY IS THE BIGGEST OBSTACLE YOU HAVE ENCOUNTERED IN THE MONTH THAT YOU HAVE SERVED AS PRESIDENT?"}, {"text": "(CRISTIANI)"}, {"text": "I BELIEVE THAT THE BIGGEST OBSTACLE HAS BEEN OUR INABILITY TO LAUNCH OUR GOVERNMENT PROGRAM, WHICH IS DUE TO THE STATE OF AFFAIRS EXISTING IN THE FORMER ADMINISTRATION WHEN WE TOOK OVER."}, {"text": "WE HAVE REPEATEDLY OBSERVED THIS STATE OF AFFAIRS IN THE MAJORITY OF GOVERNMENT (WORD INDISTINCT)."}, {"text": "THROUGHOUT GOVERNMENT OFFICES, DISORDER WAS RAMPANT, AND, IN MANY CASES, WE HAVE OBSERVED THAT GOVERNMENT OFFICES WERE MANAGED IRRESPONSIBLY."}, {"text": "MOREOVER, THE NATION'S PUBLIC FINANCES HAVE GREATLY DETERIORATED."}, {"text": "WE HAVE INHERITED A COUNTRY IN VERY BAD FINANCIAL SHAPE, AND, I BELIEVE, THIS HAS DELAYED THE LAUNCHING OF OUR GOVERNMENT PROGRAM."}, {"text": "(END RECORDING) CRISTIANI, REFERRING TO COSTA RICAN PRESIDENT OSCAR ARIAS' OFFER TO HOLD A DIALOGUE WITH THE REBELS IN COSTA RICAN TERRITORY, SAID THAT THE OFFER WAS A GREAT CONTRIBUTION TOWARD CONVINCING THE FMLN TO STOP MURDERING DEFENSELESS CITIZENS."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0019", "message_template": 1, {"sentences": [{"text": "TODAY RESCUE TEAMS, ARMY TROOPS, AND POLICE HAD THE SORRY TASK OF RECOVERING 107 DISFIGURED BODIES OF THE VICTIMS OF AVIANCA'S BOEING 727 THAT EXPLODED IN MIDAIR IN A SPARSELY POPULATED REGION NEAR BOGOTA."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO OFFICIAL SPOKESMEN, THE TASK IS MORE DIFFICULT BECAUSE THE BODIES WERE SCATTERED OVER A RADIUS OF 8 KM."}, {"text": "THE PLANE DEPARTED BOGOTA TOWARD CALI, AT 1213 GMT, BUT TWO POWERFUL EXPLOSION BROUGHT IT DOWN AFTER ONLY 5 MINUTES IN THE AIR."}, {"text": "BOMB-SQUAD EXPERTS, IN COORDINATION WITH THREE CRIMINAL INVESTIGATORS, HAVE STARTED TO EXAMINE THE SITE TO INVESTIGATE THE ACCIDENT AND DETERMINE WHETHER THE TRAGEDY WAS CAUSED BY A MECHANICAL FAILURE, OR IF IT WAS A TERRORIST ACTION."}, {"text": "THE BOGOTA CARACOL NETWORK RECEIVED AN ANONYMOUS CALL FROM THE EXTRADITABLES -- COLOMBIAN DRUG KINGPINS WANTED BY SEVERAL U.S. FEDERAL COURTS -- WHO SAID THEY WERE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE ACTION."}, {"text": "ANOTHER NETWORK REPORTS THAT THE MAN WHO CALLED THE CARACOL NETWORK NEWS OFFICE SAID HE BELONGED TO THE EXTRADITABLES AND THAT THE ACTION WAS CARRIED OUT BECAUSE THERE WERE FIVE INFORMERS ON THE PLANE."}, {"text": "THE POLICE HAVE REPORTED THAT THEY ARE INVESTIGATING THE EXPLOSIONS THAT CAUSED THE PLANE TO CRASH SHORTLY AFTER IT LEFT THE BOGOTA EL DORADO AIRPORT TO GO TO CALI."}], "template": {"message_id": {"sentences": [{"text": "HEAVY FIGHTING BROKE OUT IN THE NORTHERN PART OF SAN SALVADOR TONIGHT AT ABOUT 2115 (0315 GMT), AND AS OF NOW IT IS STILL GOING ON."}, {"text": "SAN SALVADOR IS BEING SHAKEN BY STRONG DETONATIONS OF HEAVY WEAPONS AND INTENSE RIFLE AND MACHINEGUN FIRE, WHILE HELICOPTERS ARE FLYING OVER THE AREA WHERE THE FIGHTING IS TAKING PLACE."}, {"text": "THE FIGHTING SEEMS TO BE CENTERED IN THE SURROUNDING NEIGHBORHOODS OF AYUTUXTEPEQUE, COLONIA ESCANDIA, SAN RAMON, AND CUSCATANCINGO, WHERE THE REBELS REPORTEDLY BLEW UP SEVERAL ELECTRICITY POLES WITH DYNAMITE, CAUSING POWER OUTAGES IN VARIOUS SECTORS OF THE CAPITAL CITY."}, {"text": "A MILITARY SOURCE SAID THAT TROOPS FROM THE 1ST INFANTRY BRIGADE HAVE BEEN DISPATCHED TO THE AREAS WHERE THE CLASHES ARE TAKING PLACE."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0021", "message_template": 1, "message_template_optional": true, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["08 MAR 90", "07 MAR 90 - {"sentences": [{"text": "OUT OF THE TEN CANDIDATES RUNNING FOR THE COLOMBIAN PRESIDENCY, THE FOUR WHO HAVE THE BEST CHANCES OF WINNING HAVE INSERTED IN THEIR GOVERNMENT PLATFORMS SOLUTIONS TO THE CRISIS OF VIOLENCE THAT HAS TAKEN HOLD OF THE COUNTRY, CAUSED MAINLY BY THE NARCOTRAFFICKING MAFIAS AND THE GUERRILLA GROUPS."}, {"text": "FOR LIBERAL CESAR GAVIRIA TRUJILLO, "NONVIOLENT SOLUTIONS" MUST BE FOUND THROUGH A CONDITIONED DIALOGUE WITH THE GUERRILLAS AND BY STRENGTHENING JUSTICE TO CONFRONT THE NARCOTRAFFICKERS "BECAUSE EXTRADITION CANNOT BE THE ONLY PATH TO FIGHT THIS CRIME.""}, {"text": "GAVIRIA, 43, WHO ACCORDING TO THE POLLS IS THE FAVORITE TO SUCCEED VIRGILIO BARCO AS PRESIDENT AFTER THE 27 MAY ELECTIONS, HAS MADE THE PROBLEMS OF THE GUERRILLAS AND DRUG MAFIAS THE TWO MAIN ISSUES IN HIS GOVERNMENT PLATFORM."}, {"text": "REGARDING THE ARMED REBELS, HE INSISTS THAT NONVIOLENT SOLUTIONS MUST BE FOUND AND PROMISES TO "TAKE INTO CONSIDERATION" THE MERITS OF WHAT HAS BEEN TESTED UP TO NOW."}, {"text": ""THE DIALOGUE WITH THE ARMED REBELS IS A CONCESSION THAT HAS BEEN MADE TO THEM, AND FOR THIS REASON SOCIETY HAS EVERY RIGHT TO ESTABLISH CONDITIONS," GAVIRIA STATED."}, {"text": ""THUS," HE ADDED, "THE DIALOGUE WILL PREVENT THE GUERRILLAS FROM HAVING A POLITICAL PROTAGONIST ROLE AND WILL AVERT THE JUSTIFICATION OF VIOLENCE.""}, {"text": "SOCIAL CONSERVATIVE RODRIGO LLOREDA CAICEDO, 47, INSISTS THAT "THE SURRENDER OF THE MAFIA LORDS MUST BE ACHIEVED" AND THAT THIS "SHOULD INCLUDE PENALTIES FOR THE CRIMES COMMITTED, ECONOMIC COMPENSATION, AND THE CERTAINTY THAT COLOMBIA WILL NOT CONTINUE TO LEND ITSELF TO PRODUCE AND EXPORT DRUGS.""}, {"text": "LLOREDA CAICEDO IS OPPOSED TO THE EXTRADITION OF DRUG TRAFFICKERS TO THE UNITED STATES, AND HE OFFERS TO "STRENGTHEN JUSTICE" AND TO CHANGE PROCEDURES SO AS TO SURROUND JUDGES WITH GUARANTEES, ALL WITHIN THE FRAMEWORK OF A CONSTITUTIONAL REFORM THROUGH A PLEBISCITE TO CONVOKE A NATIONAL CONSTITUENT ASSEMBLY."}, {"text": "FOR THE ARMED REBELS, HE OFFERS "A 12-MONTH TERM FOR THEM TO REJOIN CIVILIAN LIFE" AND THE DRAFTING OF "MECHANISMS" FOR THEIR DISBANDING, SUCH AS THE "NATIONAL CIRCUMSCRIPTION" THAT WILL FACILITATE THEIR PARTICIPATION IN THE COUNTRY'S DEMOCRATIC AND POLITICAL LIFE."}, {"text": "LLOREDA CAICEDO, FOREIGN MINISTER DURING BELISARIO BETANCUR'S ADMINISTRATION AND ONE OF THE PROPONENTS OF THE CONTADORA GROUP TO ATTAIN PEACE IN CENTRAL AMERICA, SAID THAT AN EFFORT MUST BE MADE TO "RECOVER THE MONOPOLY OF THE PUBLIC FORCE AND CONSOLIDATE ITS SOVEREIGN PRESENCE.""}, {"text": "ALVARO GOMEZ HURTADO, 71, A "DISSIDENT" CONSERVATIVE, MAINTAINS THAT WITHOUT THE STRENGTHENING OF MORALS AND THE LAW -- "THE ROOT OF OUR ILLS" -- COEXISTENCE AND PROGRESS WILL NOT BE POSSIBLE."}, {"text": "HE PLEDGES TO RESCUE THOSE TWO VALUES."}, {"text": "GOMEZ HURTADO PRESENTED TO COLOMBIAN VOTERS A FIVE-POINT "AGREEMENT ON BASIC ISSUES," INCLUDING LAW AND MORALS, JUSTICE, ECONOMIC PLANNING, AND ECOLOGY, AS HIS GOVERNMENT PLATFORM IF HE IS ELECTED PRESIDENT ON 27 MAY."}, {"text": "ANTONIO NAVARRO WOLFF, THE M-19 (19 APRIL MOVEMENT) PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE, WHO REPLACED THE ASSASSINATED CARLOS PIZARRO, BELIEVES THAT SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC EQUILIBRIUM ARE "BASIC" TO REACHING PEACE."}, {"text": "NAVARRO WOLFF, 41, HAS REITERATED THAT HE DOES NOT AGREE WITH THE EXTRADITION OF DRUG TRAFFICKERS, AND HE ALSO CONDEMNED THE CHAIN OF ATTACKS PERPETRATED BY DRUG TERRORISTS IN THE COUNTRY OVER THE PAST FEW MONTHS."}, {"text": "REGARDING THE DRUG TRAFFICKERS, HOWEVER, HE SAID THAT THEY REQUIRE "MORE SERIOUS TREATMENT.""}, {"text": "THEREFORE, IT IS BETTER TO HAVE "A POOR DIALOGUE RATHER THAN A GOOD WAR," AND IF THAT DIALOGUE PRODUCES GOOD RESULTS "WE MUST HOLD ON TO IT," HE SAID."}, {"text": "THE FOUR CANDIDATES AGREE ON REFORMING THE CONGRESS OF THE REPUBLIC AND THE CONSTITUTION BY CONVOKING A NATIONAL CONSTITUENT ASSEMBLY."}, {"text": "THEY ALSO SHARE OPINIONS ON THE COUNTRY'S ECONOMIC OPENING TOWARD INTERNATIONAL MARKETS, ACCESS TO FOREIGN INVESTMENT, AND PROMOTION OF AN "AGRO-INDUSTRIAL REVOLUTION" WHICH WILL GUARANTEE A REDUCTION OR STABILIZATION OF THE RATE OF INFLATION."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0022", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 19 MAY 90"]}], {"sentences": [{"text": "MSGR ARTURO RIVERA Y DAMAS, ARCHBISHOP OF SAN SALVADOR, TODAY ANNOUNCED THAT HE HAS AGAIN RECEIVED DEATH THREATS THROUGH HIS SECRETARIES AND THE ARCHBISHOPRIC'S COOKS, "BUT I FEEL AT PEACE AND THAT I AM IN GOD'S HANDS," THE PASTOR SAID."}, {"text": "RIVERA Y DAMAS ADMITTED, NEVERTHELESS, THAT GENERALIZED PERSECUTION OF THE CHURCH HAS DIMINISHED, ALTHOUGH IT HAS NOT DISAPPEARED, AND ADDED THAT OVER THE PAST 10 YEARS MANY PRIESTS HAVE BEEN KILLED, INCLUDING AN ARCHBISHOP, "BUT THE BLOOD OF MARTYRS IS THE SEED OF CHRISTIANS," HE SAID."}, {"text": "RIVERA Y DAMAS POINTED OUT THAT HE HAS RECEIVED MANY COMPLAINTS CONCERNING THE CHURCH'S POSITION ON THE JESUITS' MURDER, BUT TODAY "IT IS KNOWN THAT THE ARCHBISHOPRIC WAS RIGHT TO POINT OUT WHERE IT BELIEVED THE MURDERERS WERE."}, {"text": "THIS POSITION WAS CONFIRMED BY PRESIDENT ALFREDO CRISTIANI, WHO, BY FULFILLING HIS PROMISE TO GET TO THE VERY BOTTOM OF THE CASE THROUGH INVESTIGATIONS, HAS BECOME WORTHY OF WORLDWIDE RECOGNITION.""}, {"text": "IN ANOTHER PART OF HIS HOMILY RIVERA Y DAMAS SAID TODAY THAT "TO BE BISHOP OF A PEOPLE WHO HAVE SUFFERED THE SCOURGE OF A FRATRICIDAL WAR FOR THE PAST 10 YEARS IMPLIES HAVING VERY DEEPLY ROOTED MERCY FOR HUMAN PAIN, WHICH MUST TAKE PRECEDENCE OVER ANY POLITICAL, ECONOMIC, OR IDEOLOGICAL CONSIDERATIONS, AND IS AN IRREVOCABLE PLEDGE.""}, {"text": "THE ARCHBISHOP SAID THAT AMONG THE MOST IMPORTANT ECLESSIASTICAL EVENTS OF THE WEEK IN SAN SALVADOR WERE THE SALVADORAN EPISCOPAL CONFERENCE, WHICH CONCLUDED WITH A CALL FOR PEACE, AND THE CONSIGNMENT TO COURTS OF JUSTICE OF THE SOLDIERS ACCUSED OF MURDERING THE JESUIT PRIESTS."}, {"text": "THERE WAS SPECIAL INTEREST IN THE MEETING, ESPECIALLY BECAUSE IT WAS KNOWN THAT A LETTER HAD BEEN SENT TO THE BISHOPS BY THE FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT, FMLN, REQUESTING THE CHURCH'S MEDIATION AND ITS EFFORTS TO RESUME A DIALOGUE."}, {"text": ""I BELIEVE," MSGR RIVERA Y DAMAS SAID, "THAT THE MEETINGS OF PRESIDENT ALFREDO CRISTIANI AND THE FMLN WITH THE UN SECRETARY GENERAL ARE IMPORTANT.""}, {"text": "TO CONCLUDE, RIVERA Y DAMAS REITERATED THAT "WE MUST END THIS WAR THROUGH DIALOGUE AND RATIONAL MEANS BEFORE THE WAR FINISHES US ALL.""}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0023", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["21 JAN 90", "- 21 JAN 90"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], "document_mentions": [], "sentence_mentions": {}}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["SAN SALVADOR"], "strings_rhs": ["CITY"], "document_mentions": [[42, 54], [1373, 1385]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[42, 54]], "5": [[87, 99]]}}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["SAN SALVADOR"], {"sentences": [{"text": "COMMANDER, WHAT CAN THE POPULAR MOVEMENT, THE LABOR UNIONS, AND THE HUMANITARIAN ORGANIZATIONS DO IN THE FACE OF A GOVERNMENT AND A MILITARY LEADERSHIP THAT CARRY OUT THIS TYPE OF ATTACK, THIS TYPE OF MASSACRE, IN A LEGAL FRAMEWORK THAT OFFERS NO GUARANTEE TO THE POPULAR MOVEMENT?"}, {"text": "WHAT CAN THE POPULAR MOVEMENT DO?"}, {"text": "(GONZALEZ) I BELIEVE THAT THE CRISTIANI GOVERNMENT IS CLOSING ALL THE ROADS TO A PEACEFUL SOLUTION OF THIS CONFLICT."}, {"text": "THROUGH REPRESSION IT IS CLOSING OFF THE POSSIBILITY OF LABOR UNIONS AND ASSOCIATIONS RESOLVING THEIR PROBLEMS PEACEFULLY."}, {"text": "THE GOVERNMENT IS CLOSING OFF THE POSSIBILITY OF NEGOTIATIONS."}, {"text": "THE ARMY AND THE CRISTIANI GOVERNMENT ARE OPPOSED TO TRUE NEGOTIATIONS."}, {"text": "THE PEOPLE HAVE NO ALTERNATIVE."}, {"text": "IN EL SALVADOR THERE IS A LATENT PATH, THE PATH OF ARMED ACTIONS."}, {"text": "AT THIS MOMENT, AS THIS GOVERNMENT INCREASES REPRESSION, ARMED ACTIONS BECOME INCREASINGLY LEGITIMATE, ARMED ACTIONS TO FIND SOLUTIONS TO THE CONFLICT, ARMED ACTIONS TO STOP THE REPRESSION BY THE REGIME."}, {"text": "THE WORKERS AND THEIR ASSOCIATIONS AND LABOR UNIONS ARE ENTITLED TO DEFEND THEMSELVES AND THEIR LABOR BENEFITS."}, {"text": "DEFENSE IS LEGITIMATE."}, {"text": "IT IS LEGITIMATE FOR THE WORKERS TO DECIDE TO DEFEND THEMSELVES THE ARMED WAY, THROUGH VIOLENCE."}, {"text": "IT IS THE CRISTIANI GOVERNMENT, PONCE, AND THE HIGH COMMAND WHO ARE LEAVING THE WORKERS NO ALTERNATIVE."}, {"text": "(REPORTER) TO CONCLUDE, COMMANDER: IN RECENT HOURS THERE HAVE BEEN ATTACKS IN THE CAPITAL, INCLUDING BOMB ATTACKS ON THE RESIDENCES OF DEMOCRATIC LEADERS SUCH AS RUBEN ZAMORA AND ARONETE DIAZ, AN ATTACK ON THE RESIDENCE OF COLONEL CARRANZA, AND AN ATTACK ON A RELATIVE OF COLONEL LOPEZ HUILA, AMONG OTHERS."}, {"text": "THE ARMED FORCES AND THE GOVERNMENT HAVE PUBLICLY SAID THAT THE FMLN IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THESE ATTACKS."}, {"text": "(GONZALEZ) OUR ARMED ACTIONS ARE HIGHLY JUST AND HAVE POLITICAL MOTIVATIONS."}, {"text": "OUR OBJECTIVES ARE STRICTLY MILITARY."}, {"text": "ALL OUR GUERRILLA UNITS FUNCTION ACCORDING TO THIS PRINCIPLE, BE IT IN THE RURAL AREAS OR IN THE CITIES WHERE OUR URBAN COMMANDOS OPERATE."}, {"text": "THE ATTACK ON THE ARMED FORCES STAFF INSTALLATIONS AND OTHER OPERATIONS AGAINST MILITARY TARGETS ARE OUR RESPONSIBILITY."}, {"text": "THE FMLN'S POLICY IS NOT TO ATTACK RELATIVES OF MILITARY MEN OR POLITICIANS."}, {"text": "THE HIGH COMMAND HAS BEEN TRYING TO CONFUSE THE PEOPLE HERE AND ABROAD."}, {"text": "WHAT IS ITS OBJECTIVE?"}, {"text": "TO COVER UP ITS REPRESSIVE POLICY."}, {"text": "IT IS ESCALATING ITS ACTIONS."}, {"text": "IT HAS GONE FROM THE SELECTIVE CAPTURE AND MURDER OF LEADERS TO MASS ARRESTS, AND {"sentences": [{"text": "COMMANDER, WHAT CAN THE POPULAR MOVEMENT, THE LABOR UNIONS, AND THE HUMANITARIAN ORGANIZATIONS DO IN THE FACE OF A GOVERNMENT AND A MILITARY LEADERSHIP THAT CARRY OUT THIS TYPE OF ATTACK, THIS TYPE OF MASSACRE, IN A LEGAL FRAMEWORK THAT OFFERS NO GUARANTEE TO THE POPULAR MOVEMENT?"}, {"text": "WHAT CAN THE POPULAR MOVEMENT DO?"}, {"text": "(GONZALEZ) I BELIEVE THAT THE CRISTIANI GOVERNMENT IS CLOSING ALL THE ROADS TO A PEACEFUL SOLUTION OF THIS CONFLICT."}, {"text": "THROUGH REPRESSION IT IS CLOSING OFF THE POSSIBILITY OF LABOR UNIONS AND ASSOCIATIONS RESOLVING THEIR PROBLEMS PEACEFULLY."}, {"text": "THE GOVERNMENT IS CLOSING OFF THE POSSIBILITY OF NEGOTIATIONS."}, {"text": "THE ARMY AND THE CRISTIANI GOVERNMENT ARE OPPOSED TO TRUE NEGOTIATIONS."}, {"text": "THE PEOPLE HAVE NO ALTERNATIVE."}, {"text": "IN EL SALVADOR THERE IS A LATENT PATH, THE PATH OF ARMED ACTIONS."}, {"text": "AT THIS MOMENT, AS THIS GOVERNMENT INCREASES REPRESSION, ARMED ACTIONS BECOME INCREASINGLY LEGITIMATE, ARMED ACTIONS TO FIND SOLUTIONS TO THE CONFLICT, ARMED ACTIONS TO STOP THE REPRESSION BY THE REGIME."}, {"text": "THE WORKERS AND THEIR ASSOCIATIONS AND LABOR UNIONS ARE ENTITLED TO DEFEND THEMSELVES AND THEIR LABOR BENEFITS."}, {"text": "DEFENSE IS LEGITIMATE."}, {"text": "IT IS LEGITIMATE FOR THE WORKERS TO DECIDE TO DEFEND THEMSELVES THE ARMED WAY, THROUGH VIOLENCE."}, {"text": "IT IS THE CRISTIANI GOVERNMENT, PONCE, AND THE HIGH COMMAND WHO ARE LEAVING THE WORKERS NO ALTERNATIVE."}, {"text": "(REPORTER) TO CONCLUDE, COMMANDER: IN RECENT HOURS THERE HAVE BEEN ATTACKS IN THE CAPITAL, INCLUDING BOMB ATTACKS ON THE RESIDENCES OF DEMOCRATIC LEADERS SUCH AS RUBEN ZAMORA AND ARONETE DIAZ, AN ATTACK ON THE RESIDENCE OF COLONEL CARRANZA, AND AN ATTACK ON A RELATIVE OF COLONEL LOPEZ HUILA, AMONG OTHERS."}, {"text": "THE ARMED FORCES AND THE GOVERNMENT HAVE PUBLICLY SAID THAT THE FMLN IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THESE ATTACKS."}, {"text": "(GONZALEZ) OUR ARMED ACTIONS ARE HIGHLY JUST AND HAVE POLITICAL MOTIVATIONS."}, {"text": "OUR OBJECTIVES ARE STRICTLY MILITARY."}, {"text": "ALL OUR GUERRILLA UNITS FUNCTION ACCORDING TO THIS PRINCIPLE, BE IT IN THE RURAL AREAS OR IN THE CITIES WHERE OUR URBAN COMMANDOS OPERATE."}, {"text": "THE ATTACK ON THE ARMED FORCES STAFF INSTALLATIONS AND OTHER OPERATIONS AGAINST MILITARY TARGETS ARE OUR RESPONSIBILITY."}, {"text": "THE FMLN'S POLICY IS NOT TO ATTACK RELATIVES OF MILITARY MEN OR POLITICIANS."}, {"text": "THE HIGH COMMAND HAS BEEN TRYING TO CONFUSE THE PEOPLE HERE AND ABROAD."}, {"text": "WHAT IS ITS OBJECTIVE?"}, {"text": "TO COVER UP ITS REPRESSIVE POLICY."}, {"text": "IT IS ESCALATING ITS ACTIONS."}, {"text": "IT HAS GONE FROM THE SELECTIVE CAPTURE AND MURDER OF LEADERS TO MASS ARRESTS, AND FROM MASS ARRESTS IT HAS MOVED INTO GENOCIDE AND INDISCRIMINATE ATTACKS."}, {"text": "IT IS CLEAR THAT ITS OBJECTIVE IS THE SOCIAL ORGANIZATIONS."}, {"text": "THE GOVERNMENT SAID IT IN SAN JOSE."}, {"text": "IT IS EVIDENT THAT THE HIGH COMMAND IS TRYING TO CREATE CONFUSION, BUT THE PEOPLE ABROAD AND WE KNOW THAT OUR ACTIONS ARE AIMED AT MILITARY OBJECTIVES."}], "template": {"message_id": {"sentences": [{"text": "THE GUATEMALAN GUERRILLA MOVEMENT TODAY ANNOUNCED THAT IT WILL MAKE THE GOVERNMENT OF PRESIDENT VINICIO CEREZO AND THE GUATEMALAN ARMY "PAY DEARLY" FOR HAVING "INTERVENED" IN THE SALVADORAN CONFLICT."}, {"text": "A COMMUNIQUE BY THE GUATEMALAN NATIONAL REVOLUTIONARY UNITY (URNG), RELEASED IN COSTA RICA, STRESSED THAT 126 ELITE TROOPS OF THE GUATEMALAN ARMY, KNOWN AS KAIBILES, ARE COLLABORATING WITH SALVADORAN SOLDIERS TO PUT AN END TO THE OFFENSIVE BY GUERRILLAS OF THE FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT (FMLN)."}, {"text": "THE URNG CHARGE, ALSO PRESENTED BY THE FMLN, HAS BEEN CATEGORICALLY AND REPEATEDLY DENIED BY GUATEMALAN GOVERNMENT SPOKESWOMAN CLAUDIA ARENAS."}, {"text": "THE REBEL COMMUNIQUE STATED: "WE VIGOROUSLY CONDEMN THE INTERVENTION OF THE GUATEMALAN ARMY AGAINST THE GLORIOUS SALVADORAN PEOPLE."}, {"text": "WE WILL MAKE THE GUATEMALAN ARMY AND GOVERNMENT PAY DEARLY FOR THIS AGGRESSION.""}, {"text": "THE NOTE WAS RELEASED SHORTLY AFTER SALVADORAN PRESIDENT ALFREDO CRISTIANI ANNOUNCED THE VICTORY OF HIS COUNTRY'S ARMY OVER THE FMLN, FOLLOWING FIERCE FIGHTING THAT LEFT APPROXIMATELY 1,000 DEAD AND MORE THAN 1,500 WOUNDED IN THE PAST 7 DAYS."}, {"text": "IN ADDITION, THE GUATEMALAN GUERRILLAS EXPRESSED SOLIDARITY "WITH THE COMMUNITY OF JESUIT PRIESTS" AND THEIR SORROW BECAUSE OF THE KILLING OF SIX OF THEIR MEMBERS, INCLUDING CENTRAL AMERICAN UNIVERSITY RECTOR IGNACIO ELLACURIA AND TWO WOMEN, CARRIED OUT BY UNIFORMED MEN IN SAN SALVADOR ON 16 NOVEMBER."}, {"text": "THE URNG DECLARATION IS SIGNED BY COMMANDERS ROLANDO MORAN, GASPAR ILOM, AND PABLO MONSANTO."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0025", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["16 NOV 89"]}], "incident_location": {"sentences": [{"text": "THE EXTRADITABLES, THE ARMED BRANCH OF THE MEDELLIN CARTEL, DENIED TODAY IN A TELEPHONE CALL TO A RADIO STATION BY AN ALLEGED MEMBER, ANY RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE DEATH OF CARLOS PIZARRO, POLITICAL LEADER AND FORMER GUERRILLA COMMANDER."}, {"text": "THE CALLER IDENTIFIED HIMSELF AS JOHN JAIRO ARIAS TASCON."}, {"text": "HE CALLED THE CARACOL NETWORK IN MEDELLIN TO DENOUNCE THAT THE CHARGES AGAINST THE MEDELLIN CARTEL ARE PART OF A PLAN TO BLAME THEM FOR ALL VIOLENT ACTIONS IN THE COUNTRY."}, {"text": "THE AUTHORS OF THE ASSASSINATION ARE SECTORS WHO SEEK TO DESTABILIZE THE COUNTRY, ARIAS TASCON ADDED."}, {"text": "PIZARRO, FORMER LEADER OF THE 19 APRIL MOVEMENT (M-19), THE GUERRILLA GROUP THAT LAID DOWN ITS WEAPONS ON 9 MARCH, WAS KILLED BY THE IMPACT OF THREE BULLETS FIRED AT HIM ABOARD A COLOMBIAN AVIANCA FLIGHT THAT WAS EN ROUTE TO THE CITY OF BARRANQUILLA ALONG THE COUNTRY'S ATLANTIC COAST."}, {"text": "AFTER THE CRIME, AT 1100 (1600 GMT), AN INDIVIDUAL WHO IDENTIFIED HIMSELF AS SAPATOCA CALLED CARACOL TO REPORT THAT THE KILLING HAD BEEN ORDERED BY FIDEL CASTANO AND HENRY PEREZ, HEADS OF THE EXTREME RIGHTIST PARAMILITARY MILITIAS."}, {"text": "SAPATOCA ADDED THAT CASTANO AND PEREZ PERPETRATED THE CRIME FOLLOWING ORDERS FROM THE EXTRADITABLES."}, {"text": "CASTANO WAS CONNECTED TO THE DEATH OF BERNARDO JARAMILLO, ALSO A PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE, FOR THE LEFTIST PATRIOTIC UNION (UP), ON 22 MARCH, ALTHOUGH AT THAT TIME IT WAS REPORTED THAT CASTANO HEADED A PARAMILITARY ORGANIZATION THAT DID NOT IMPLICATE THE EXTRADITABLES."}, {"text": "ON THAT OCCASION PABLO ESCOBAR, LEADER OF THE EXTRADITABLES AND THE MEDELLIN CARTEL, DENIED THAT THE DRUG TRAFFICKERS HAD KILLED JARAMILLO."}, {"text": "A CONFIDENTIAL REPORT DRAFTED RECENTLY BY THE ADMINISTRATIVE DEPARTMENT OF SECURITY (DAS, COLOMBIAN SECRET POLICE), SAID THAT SOME ARMY AND POLICE MEMBERS COOPERATE WITH CASTANO'S CRIMINAL ORGANIZATION."}, {"text": "NAVARRO WOLFF, NUMBER TWO LEADER OF M-19, TOLD NEWSMEN TODAY AFTER PIZARRO WAS KILLED THAT HIS BURIAL MUST BE ATTENDED BY ALL THE COUNTRY, BECAUSE WE MUST REPUDIATE CRIME SUCH AS THIS."}, {"text": "NAVARRO WOLFF SAID THAT PIZARRO'S DEATH SHOWS THAT THE COUNTRY IS IN TURMOIL AND THAT IT WILL BE VERY DIFFICULT TO REBUILD THE COUNTRY."}, {"text": "THERE IS NO SPACE EXCEPT FOR PAIN AND FOR IRE, HE ADDED."}, {"text": "THE BURIAL OF CARLOS MUST BE PEACEFUL, AS WAS M-19'S EXAMPLE OF PEACE GIVEN TO THE COUNTRY, HE ADDED."}, {"text": "IT IS HARD TO EXPLAIN HOW THINGS SUCH AS THIS OCCUR WHEN THE M-19 AND CARLOS PIZARRO WERE SETTING AN EXAMPLE OF PRUDENCE, TOLERANCE, AND UNDERSTANDING, NAVARRO SAID."}, {"text": "PIZARRO, A FORMER GUERRILLA COMMANDER WHO LED HIS ARMED GROUP TOWARD DEMOBILIZATION AFTER 17 MONTHS OF POLITICAL NEGOTIATIONS WITH THE GOVERNMENT OF VIRGILIO BARCO, TOLD NEWSMEN BEFORE BOARDING THE AIRCRAFT: WE ARE DOING WELL."}, {"text": "THIS WAS A REFERENCE TO THE M-19 ELECTORAL CAMPAIGN."}, {"text": "PIZARRO STATED IN HIS LAST PUBLIC STATEMENT: I AM CERTAIN THAT WE WILL KNOW HOW TO WAGE OPPOSITION."}, {"text": "WE WILL ENGAGE IN A VERY PRETTY DEMOCRATIC PLAY WITH REGARD TO THE NEXT GOVERNMENT."}, {"text": "WE WILL PARTICIPATE IN BUILDING NEW COLOMBIAN DEMOCRACY."}, {"text": "THE M-19 PARTICIPATED FOR THE FIRST TIME IN THE 11 MARCH ELECTIONS, BECOMING THE THIRD POLITICAL FORCE IN BOGOTA."}, {"text": "NOTHING HAS BEEN SAID YET CONCERNING THE BURIAL OF PIZARRO, WHO WAS BORN 39 YEARS AGO IN CARTAGENA DE INDIAS AND WHO LEAVES THREE ORPHAN DAUGHTERS, AGED 12, 9, AND 4."}], {"sentences": [{"text": "COLONEL, WHAT SPECIFIC MEASURES HAVE BEEN TAKEN AGAINST THE MISSILES?"}, {"text": "(PONCE)"}, {"text": "I BELIEVE THAT SPECIFIC MEASURES WE HAVE ADOPTED HAVE GIVEN US GOOD RESULTS."}, {"text": "THEY HAVE LAUNCHED FOUR SA-7'S IN THE ZACATECOLUCA AREA; HOWEVER, OUR PILOTS HAVE SKILLFULLY AVOIDED THE ROCKETS OR MISSILES, WHICH DID NOT HIT THEIR AIRCRAFT."}, {"text": "WE ARE ADOPTING MEASURES THAT ARE GIVING RESULTS."}, {"text": "WE MUST ALSO CLARIFY THAT WE FEEL THAT SINCE THE LIGHT AIRCRAFT TRANSPORTING THESE MISSILES DID NOT HAVE A NORMAL LANDING AND THE MISSILES WERE NOT IN THEIR ORIGINAL PACKAGE, IT IS POSSIBLE THAT THEY SUFFERED SOME FUNCTIONAL DAMAGE WHEN THE PLANE CRASHED SOUTH OF ZACATECOLUCA."}, {"text": "THANK GOD, (WORDS INDISTINCT) (REPORTER)"}, {"text": "DO YOU THINK THAT THE SUMMIT OF CENTRAL AMERICAN PRESIDENTS CAN OPEN NEW POSSIBILITIES FOR RESUMING TALKS WITH THE FMLN?"}, {"text": "DO YOU THINK THAT THIS SUMMIT COULD BRING ABOUT NEW STEPS TOWARD A DIALOGUE?"}, {"text": "(PONCE)"}, {"text": "YES, I THINK THAT THE SALVADORAN GOVERNMENT SINCE THE BEGINNING OF THE YEAR HAS OPENED THIS POSSIBILITY AND IS WILLING TO TALK ON A PERMANENT BASIS."}, {"text": "I THINK THAT AT THIS TIME IT WOULD BE A POSITIVE STEP IN THE POLITICAL FIELD."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, IN THE MILITARY FIELD, WHERE THE FMLN HAS ATTACKED US IN AN IRRATIONAL AND VIOLENT WAY IN THE MAIN CITIES, THE ARMED FORCES IS REPLYING, AND WE WILL CONTINUE TO REPLY."}, {"text": "WE WILL COMPLETELY DEFEAT THE FMLN."}, {"text": "BASED ON THE INFORMATION WE HAVE RECEIVED FROM OUR UNITS, WE HAVE INFLICTED 1,902 DEAD, 1,209 WOUNDED, AND 44 TERRORISTS HAVE DESERTED AND TURNED THEMSELVES IN TO THE AUTHORITIES."}, {"text": "WE HAVE CONFISCATED A LARGE NUMBER OF WEAPONS."}, {"text": "I WILL GIVE YOU THE QUANTITIES: 25 ANTIAIRCRAFT MISSILES -- ONE RED EYE AND 24 SA-7'S -- 915 RIFLES, 12 CARBINES, 11 SHOTGUNS, 156 GRENADE AND ROCKET LAUNCHERS, 49 MORTARS, 45 MACHINEGUNS, 41 SUBMACHINEGUNS, 67 REVOLVERS AND PISTOLS, 23 RADIOS, AND A LARGE AMOUNT OF EXPLOSIVES."}, {"text": "I MUST STRESS THAT THE FMLN HAS GATHERED ALL THESE WEAPONS WITH SUPPPORT FROM ABROAD."}, {"text": "IT IS A LARGE ARSENAL."}, {"text": "I MUST ALSO NOTE THAT MANY OF THE WEAPONS WE FOUND HAD BEEN ABANDONED, WHICH MEANS THAT THE FMLN HAS HAD MANY DESERTIONS."}, {"text": "WE HAVE ALSO FOUND WEAPONS IN HOUSES, THANKS TO THE COLLABORATION OF THE CIVILIAN POPULATION."}, {"text": "WE HAVE ALSO LEARNED THAT THE FMLN HAS KIDNAPPED A LARGE NUMBER OF YOUTHS HERE IN THE SAN SALVADOR AREA AND MAINLY IN USULUTAN, AS WELL AS IN CHALATENANGO."}, {"text": "THIS MEANS THAT THEY ARE TRYING TO FILL IN THE NUMBER OF CASUALTIES THEY HAVE SUFFERED WITH YOUTHS."}, {"text": "THIS ALSO MEANS THAT THEIR EFFICIENCY WILL BE VERY LOW."}, {"text": "(REPORTER)"}, {"text": "I DO NOT KNOW IF YOU HAVE SEEN OVER THE PAST FEW DAYS A LEAFLET ISSUED BY THE AIR FORCE, WHICH WAS DROPPED FROM AIRPLANES AND ALSO DISTRIBUTED ON THE STREETS."}, {"text": "THE LEAFLET URGES SALVADORAN PATRIOTS TO DEFEND THEIR HOMELAND, THEIR PROPERTIES, AND LIVES."}, {"text": "IT ALSO SAYS THAT IF NECESSARY, TERRORISTS MUST BE KILLED, AS WELL AS THEIR INTERNATIONALIST ALLIES."}, {"text": "WHAT IS YOUR OPINION OF THIS LEAFLET?"}, {"text": "IS IT NOT AN INVITATION TO KILL FOREIGNERS IN THIS COUNTRY?"}, {"text": "(PONCE)"}, {"text": "I DO NOT THINK SO, BECAUSE THE LEAFLETS MENTION INTERNATIONALISTS, WHO ARE FIGHTING ALONG WITH THE FMLN."}, {"text": "(CONTINUED)"}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0027", {"sentences": [{"text": "IN CONNECTION WITH THE BOMB ATTACK ON THE CENTRAL AMERICAN UNIVERSITY (UCA) AT DAYBREAK ON 22 JULY, THE FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT (FMLN) STATES THE FOLLOWING: 1."}, {"text": "THIS ACT IS PART OF THE POLICY OF TERROR THAT THE NATIONALIST REPUBLICAN ALLIANCE (ARENA) GOVERNMENT HAS IMPLEMENTED IN AN ATTEMPT TO DISCOURAGE ALL TYPES OF OPPOSITION TO THE ANTIPOPULAR AND ANTIDEMOCRATIC MEASURES THE GOVERNMENT IS TAKING."}, {"text": "WITHIN THIS FRAMEWORK, WE HAVE: THE SIEGE ON THE NATIONAL UNIVERSITY, THREATS AGAINST TEACHERS AND POLITICAL ORGANIZATIONS, AND INCREASING REPRESSION AGAINST THE PEOPLES' MOVEMENT."}, {"text": "2. THE ATTACK IS CLEARLY INTENDED TO CAUSE UNREST AMONG THE PARTICIPANTS OF THE INTERNATIONAL PEACE AND SOLIDARITY CONFERENCE OF SISTER TRADE UNIONS THAT BEGAN TODAY AT THE UCA."}, {"text": "3. WE, THEREFORE, HOLD ALFREDO CRISTIANI'S GOVERNMENT AND THE ARMED FOCES HIGH COMMAND RESPONSIBLE FOR THIS NEW TERRORIST ATTACK."}, {"text": "4. WE STRONGLY CONDEMN THE ATTACK ON THE UCA AND CALL UPON ALL INTERESTED PARTIES TO JOIN FORCES TO CONFRONT ARENA'S TERRORIST POLICIES."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0028", {"sentences": [{"text": "SALVADORAN GUERRILLAS TODAY STATED THAT CIVILIANS AND SOLDIERS WERE KILLED ON SATURDAY DURING AN ARMED CLASH BETWEEN THE HONDURAN AND SALVADORAN ARMIES."}, {"text": "THROUGH A COMMUNIQUE, THE GUERRILLAS EMPHASIZED THE ARMED CLASH TOOK PLACE AFTER HONDURAN ARMY TROOPS ATTACKED IN THE HAMLET OF SAN ANDRES, SAN MIGUEL DEPARTMENT, IN NORTHERN EL SALVADOR."}, {"text": "MEMBERS OF THE COUNTERINSURGENCY ARCE BATTALION, WHO WERE CONDUCTING AN OPERATION NEAR THE HONDURAN BORDER, RESPONDED, SUPPORTED BY TWO AIR FORCE HELICOPTERS."}, {"text": "THE REPORT BY THE REBELS, BROADCAST FROM SAN SALVADOR BY TEGUCIGALPA RADIO AMERICA, ADDED THAT AN UNNAMED ARCE BATTALION OFFICER WAS KILLED IN THE CLASH."}, {"text": "THE HONDURAN TROOPS THEN RETREATED TO LOS LLANITOS, INTIBUCA DEPARTMENT, IN HONDURAS, WHERE FOUR SALVADORAN HELICOPTERS LANDED, ACCORDING TO THE FMLN."}, {"text": "THE REPORT ADDED THAT AS A HONDURAN HELICOPTER EVACUATED THE WOUNDED, IT WAS ATTACKED AND PURSUED 7 KM INSIDE HONDURAN TERRITORY BY A SALVADORAN AIRCRAFT FIRING ROCKETS AND MACHINEGUNS."}, {"text": "THE HONDURAN SOLDIERS WERE SURROUNDED IN LOS LLANITOS AND TAKEN PRISONER."}, {"text": "THE FMLN STATED THAT SEVERAL HOMES WERE DAMAGED AND THAT ANIMALS WERE KILLED IN THE SURROUNDING HAMLETS AND VILLAGES."}, {"text": "THE SALVADORAN GUERRILLA NOTED THAT IT HAD PREVIOUSLY WARNED THAT THE INVOLVEMENT OF THE HONDURAN ARMY "DUE TO U.S. DISPOSITIONS" IN THE EL SALVADOR WAR, WOULD RESULT IN CLASHES AMONG THE ARMIES OF CENTRAL AMERICAN COUNTRIES."}, {"text": "THE FMLN REPORT STATES THAT "IT IS NO SECRET THAT THE OLIGARCHS WHO (WILL ) REACH POWER THROUGH THE NATIONALIST REPUBLICAN ALLIANCE (ARENA) GOVERNMENT ARE THE SAME PEOPLE INVOLVED IN THE 1969 INVASION OF HONDURAS.""}, {"text": "THE OFFICERS, WHO AT THAT TIME "WERE DIRECTLY RESPONSIBLE FOR KILLINGS, PILLAGING, AND OUTRAGES AGAINST THE HONDURAN PEOPLE, ARE TODAY MEMBERS OF THE SALVADORAN ARMED FORCES LEADERSHIP," THE COMMUNIQUE ADDS."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE FMLN, SATURDAY'S CLASH "WILL SET THE TONE THAT DEFINES THE BORDER CONFLICT FOR A GOVERNMENT OF OLIGARCHS THAT HAS ALWAYS HAD AN EXPANSIONIST ATTITUDE TOWARD HONDURAS.""}, {"text": "(THE COMMUNIQUE) ALSO REQUESTS THAT THE HONDURAN ARMED FORCES NOT GET INVOLVED IN A WAR FOREIGN TO THEM."}, {"text": "THE HONDURAN MILITARY HAS NEITHER DENIED NOR CONFIRMED THE SALVADORAN GUERRILLAS REPORTS, AND AN ARMY SPOKESMAN HAS STATED THAT INVESTIGATIONS ARE BEING CONDUCTED."}, {"text": "THE HONDURAN ARMED FORCES, HAVE ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS, REPORTED THAT THE GUERRILLAS HAVE "HIDEOUTS" IN SALVADORAN REFUGEE CAMPS, AND CONTINUOUSLY ENTER HONDURAN TERRITORY TO REST OR FOR RESUPPLY OF WEAPONS AND AMMUNITION."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0031", {"sentences": [{"text": "DEFENSE MINISTER GENERAL OSCAR BOTERO RESTREPO DISCLOSED THIS AFTERNOON THAT MEDELLIN CARTEL BOSS PABLO ESCOBAR GAVIRIA ORDERED THE ASSASSINATION OF BERNARDO JARAMILLO OSSA, PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE OF PATRIOTIC UNION, UP."}, {"text": "BOTERO SAID THAT INITIAL INVESTIGATIONS HAVE REVEALED THAT ESCOBAR GAVIRIA PLANNED AND ORDERED THE ATTACK ON JARAMILLO OSSA."}, {"text": "GEN. BOTERO TOLD REPORTERS THAT THE MEDELLIN CARTEL CONTRACTED THE SERVICES OF AN ORGANIZATION OF HIRED ASSASSINS AND SENT THEM TO BOGOTA TO ASSASSINATE THE UP LEADER."}, {"text": "HE ADDED THAT ESCOBAR GAVIRIA ORDERED THE DELIVERY OF AN INITIAL SUM OF 300,000 PESOS TO A THIRD PERSON AFTER THE CRIME WAS COMMITTED AT EL DORADO AIRPORT'S PEDESTRIAN OVERPASS IN BOGOTA."}, {"text": "THE DEFENSE MINISTER SAID THAT MINUTES AFTER THE KILLING THE DAS (ADMINISTRATIVE DEPARTMENT OF SECURITY) INTELLIGENCE SERVICE INTERCEPTED AN ESCOBAR GAVIRIA CONVERSATION IN MEDELLIN."}, {"text": "HE WAS ORDERING HIS ACCOMPLICES TO PAY 300,000 PESOS TO A THIRD PERSON LINKED TO THE PAID ASSASSIN WHO KILLED THE UP LEADER."}, {"text": "BOTERO ALSO DISCLOSED THAT THE ASSASSIN IS A 16-YEAR-OLD YOUTH WHO CARRIED A FALSE IDENTIFICATION CARD UNDER THE NAME OF JAIRO ALBERTO RESTREPO POSADA."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, ANONYMOUS CALLS WERE RECEIVED BY VARIOUS BOGOTA MEDIA TODAY."}, {"text": "THE CALLERS WERE ATTRIBUTING THE ATTACK ON UP LEADER JARAMILLO OSSA TO A SO-CALLED GONZALO RODRIGUEZ GACHA COMMANDO GROUP."}, {"text": "IN THESE CALLS, IT WAS SAID THAT THE MEDELLIN CARTEL DECIDED TO RESUME THE WAR BECAUSE FOR FIVE MONTHS IT OFFERED TO NEGOTIATE WITH THE VIRGILIO BARCO VARGAS GOVERNMENT, AND THE ONLY RESPONSE IT RECEIVED WAS TO URGE CARTEL MEMBERS TO TURN THEMSELVES IN TO JUSTICE."}, {"text": "IN ADDITION, THREATS WERE MADE AGAINST OTHER COLOMBIAN POLITICAL FIGURES SUCH AS LIBERAL PARTY CANDIDATE CESAR GAVIRIA TRUJILLO."}, {"text": "THE CALLERS SAID THAT THE EXTRADITABLES RELEASED KIDNAPPED PEOPLE, DELIVERED LABORATORIES, AND LARGE QUANTITIES OF DYNAMITE AS PROOF OF THEIR INTENTION TO TALK, BUT THEY NEVER RECEIVED A REPLY FROM THE GOVERNMENT."}, {"text": "THE CALLERS SAID: WE ARE GOING TO TURN OURSELVES IN, BUT WE WILL BE DEAD WHEN WE DO SO."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, BEFORE THIS HAPPENS, THEY SAID, THE COUNTRY WILL SEE THE BODIES OF ITS LEADERS, JUST AS IN THE CASE OF JARAMILLO OSSA."}], {"sentences": [{"text": "FRANCISCO MERINO, VICE PRESIDENT OF THE REPUBLIC AND INTERIOR MINISTER, HAS STRONGLY CONDEMNED THE MURDER OF FORMER SUPREME COURT PRESIDENT FRANCISCO JOSE GUERRERO."}, {"text": "MERINO DESCRIBED THE CULPRITS AS MURDEROUS BEASTS."}, {"text": "THE VICE PRESIDENT WENT TO THE MEDICAL-SURGICAL HOSPITAL OF THE SALVADORAN INSTITUTE OF SOCIAL SECURITY, TO WHICH DR GUERRERO WAS TAKEN AFTER THE ATTACK."}, {"text": "GUERRERO, WHO WAS AN ADVISER TO THE GOVERNMENTAL COMMISSION FOR SUPPORT TO THE DIALOGUE (COMISION DE APOYO GUBERNAMENTAL DE DIALOGO), WAS SHOT TO DEATH BY TERRORISTS AT THE INTERSECTION OF BOULEVARD DE LOS HEROES AND ALAMEDA JUAN PABLO II."}, {"text": "(BEGIN RECORDING) (MERINO) WHAT THEY ARE SHOWING IS THAT THEY ARE BENT ON CARRYING OUT TOTALLY DESTRUCTIVE ACTIONS TO LOWER THE CONFIDENCE OF THE POPULATION AND TO PROVOKE GENERAL PANIC."}, {"text": "I THINK THAT ALTHOUGH AS A GOVERNMENT WE HAVE ALWAYS MAINTAINED A CONCILIATORY POSITION TO ATTAIN PEACE IN EL SALVADOR, WE MUST ALSO MAKE A FIRMER DECISION TO TAKE STRONGER ACTION."}, {"text": "THE PEOPLE WHO COMMIT THESE WANTON ACTIONS ARE DERANGED PEOPLE."}, {"text": "THEY DO NOT UNDERSTAND WORDS."}, {"text": "THEY DO NOT UNDERSTAND THAT THEY MUST RESPECT A LEGAL SYSTEM, OR A DEMOCRATIC PROCESS OR ONE OF HUMANIZATION."}, {"text": "THEY ARE SIMPLY BEASTS AND MURDERERS AND MUST BE TREATED AS SUCH."}, {"text": "(END RECORDING) MERINO SAID THE MURDERERS MUST BE PUNISHED WITH THE FULL WEIGHT OF THE LAWS, AND THAT ONE OF THE TERRORISTS WHO WAS WOUNDED AND CAPTURED AT THE SITE OF THE CRIME IS UNDER INTERROGATION."}, {"text": "(BEGIN RECORDING) (MERINO) ONE OF THE CRIMINALS WAS WOUNDED."}, {"text": "THIS WILL OBVIOUSLY ENABLE US TO OBTAIN SOME CLUES AS TO THE IDENTITY OF THE ACTUAL KILLERS AND OF THE MASTERMINDS OF THIS NEW MURDER, WHICH HAS SHOCKED SALVADORAN SOCIETY."}, {"text": "AS IN PREVIOUS CASES, WE ARE CONDUCTING INVESTIGATIONS IN THIS CASE."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, I REPEAT THAT THE TIME HAS COME FOR US TO TAKE A FIRMER STAND, TO DO OUR UTMOST, AND TO REALIZE THAT IF NOTHING HAS HAPPENED TO US THUS FAR, IT DOES NOT MEAN WE WILL NOT FALL VICTIM TO THESE MURDERERS."}, {"text": "IT IS BETTER TO TAKE PRECAUTIONS NOW THAN TO HAVE REGRETS LATER."}, {"text": "(END RECORDING) MERINO SAID THAT THIS CAMPAIGN OF VIOLENCE PROMOTED BY THE TERRORIST HORDES HAS NOT ENDED."}, {"text": "CLEAR EVIDENCE OF THIS IS THIS BRUTAL AND COWARDLY MURDER, WHICH HAS AGAIN FILLED THE SUFFERING SALVADORAN PEOPLE WITH SORROW."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0033", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["28 NOV 89", "- 28 NOV 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], {"sentences": [{"text": "FIVE GUATEMALAN UNIVERSITY LEADERS THREATENED WITH DEATH HAVE SOUGHT REFUGE IN PANAMA, COSTA RICA, AND MEXICO, WHILE UN HUMAN RIGHTS OBSERVER PETER KOOIJMANS IS IN GUATEMALA CONDUCTING AN INVESTIGATION ON THE INCREASING VIOLENCE IN THIS CENTRAL AMERICAN COUNTRY."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO MEMBERS OF THE UNIVERSITY STUDENT ASSOCIATION (AEU) OF SAN CARLOS DE GUATEMALA UNIVERSITY, THE STUDENTS LEADERS DECIDED TO LEAVE THE COUNTRY BECAUSE OF THE CONTINUOUS THREATS OF DEATH AND PERSECUTION AND DUE TO THE KIDNAPPING AND ASSASSINATION OF FIVE UNIVERSITY STUDENTS."}, {"text": "THE NAMES OF THE STUDENTS WHO FLED THE COUNTRY ARE BEING KEPT SECRET TO PROTECT THEIR RELATIVES WHO LIVE IN GUATEMALA CITY AND IN THE INTERIOR OF THE COUNTRY, THE SOURCES MAINTAINED."}, {"text": "THREE OF THE STUDENTS TRAVELED TO PANAMA, ONE TO MEXICO, AND ANOTHER TO COSTA RICA."}, {"text": "THIS MONTH, THE CORPSES OF FIVE ASSASSINATED AEU LEADERS WERE FOUND IN THE CAPITAL, SOME WITH SIGNS OF TORTURE."}, {"text": "SIX OTHER UNIVERSITY STUDENT LEADERS REMAIN KIDNAPPED."}, {"text": "BELISARIO POLO, STUDENT AFFAIRS DIRECTOR AT THE UNIVERSITY OF PANAMA, TODAY TOLD EFE THAT THE THREE AEU LEADERS ARRIVED IN THE COUNTRY LAST WEEKEND AND ARE LIVING IN PRIVATE HOUSES."}, {"text": "GUATEMALAN GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS SAID THEY HAVE NO OFFICIAL REPORTS ON THE DEPARTURE OF THE HIGHEST AEU LEADERS."}, {"text": "THE DEPARTURE OF THE FIVE UNIVERSITY STUDENTS LEADERS COINCIDES WITH THE VISIT TO GUATEMALA OF PETER KOOIJMANS, WHO YESTERDAY MET GUATEMALAN PRESIDENT VINICIO CEREZO, GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS, AND ARMY OFFICERS TO GATHER INFORMATION."}, {"text": "DURING HIS MEETING WITH GOVERNMENT MINISTER ROBERTO VALLE, KOOIJMANS REQUESTED REPORTS ON THE INVESTIGATIONS THE GOVERNMENT HAS CONDUCTED ON THE CASE OF THE KIDNAPPED STUDENTS, THE GUATEMALAN GOVERNMENT OFFICIAL SAID."}, {"text": "THE KIDNAPPING AND ASSASSINATION OF THE FIVE UNIVERSITY STUDENTS AND THE THREATS AGAINST OTHER AEU MEMBERS HAVE BEEN CONDEMNED BY LEADERS FROM UNIVERSITIES IN MEXICO, HONDURAS, PERU, COLOMBIA, COSTA RICA, EL SALVADOR, NICARAGUA, AND PANAMA."}, {"text": "UNIVERSITY STUDENTS LEADERS FROM CANADA, ECUADOR, CHILE, AND THE FRG HAVE EXPRESSED THEIR SOLIDARITY AND DEMANDED THAT THE GUATEMALAN GOVERNMENT TO INVESTIGATE THESE ASSASSINATIONAS."}, {"text": "THE AEU REQUESTED THE HIGHER UNIVERSITY COUNCIL TO SUSPEND CLASSES FOR THE CURRENT SEMESTER IN VIEW OF THE WAVE OF VIOLENCE GUATEMALA IS SUFFERING AND IN VIEW OF THE DEATH THREATS AGAINST THE MAIN STUDENT LEADERS."}, {"text": "AS A RESPONSE, THE CSU HAS DECIDED TO LET EACH ACADEMIC SECTION DECIDE THE STRATEGY IT WILL IMPLEMENT TO GET PROTECTION FROM THE VIOLENCE."}, {"text": "SEVERAL OF THE STATE UNIVERSITY SCHOOLS HAVE MODIFIED THE EVENING SCHEDULE, AND MOST CLASSES HAVE BEEN REDUCED TO 2-HOURS PERIODS SO STUDENTS CAN RETURN HOME EARLY."}, {"text": "SEVERAL LABOR UNION ORGANIZATIONS HAVE CONDEMNED THE KIDNAPPING AND ASSASSINATION ON 15 SEPTEMBER OF EDUARDO ANTONIO LOPEZ PALENCIA, A STUDENT WHOSE CORPSE SHOWED SIGNS OF TORTURE."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0034", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 22 SEP 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["GUATEMALA"], "document_mentions": [[5, 14], [164, 173], [345, {"sentences": [{"text": "IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO HAVE FREE ELECTIONS IN A COUNTRY WHERE REPRESSION PREVAILS."}, {"text": "IN AN INDISPUTABLE EFFORT OF CLEAR FLEXIBILITY AND WILLINGNESS FOR PEACE, THE FMLN PRESENTED A PEACE PROPOSAL TO JOSE NAPOLEON DUARTE'S GOVERNMENT AND THE SALVADORAN ARMED FORCES HIGH COMMAND."}, {"text": "THAT PROPOSAL IS AIMED AT TURNING ELECTIONS INTO A CONTRIBUTION TO PEACE."}, {"text": "TWO WEEKS HAVE PASSED SINCE WE PRESENTED OUR PROPOSAL, AND NEITHER THE GOVERNMENT NOR THE ARMED FORCES HAVE OFFICIALLY RESPONDED TO THE FMLN INITIATIVE."}, {"text": "THAT INITIATIVE HAS HAD THE SUPPORT OF THE INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITY AND OF OUR COUNTRY'S LARGEST GROUPS."}, {"text": "NEITHER THE GOVERNMENT NOR THE HIGH COMMAND HAVE RESPONDED TO THE PEOPLE'S OUTCRY AND WORLD EXPECTATIONS, WHICH ARE AWAITING A POSITIVE RESPONSE TO OUR PROPOSAL."}, {"text": "ON THE CONTRARY, THE GOVERNMENT, ITS ARMED FORCES, AND THE MEMBERS OF THEIR SQUADS DISGUISED IN CIVILIAN CLOTHES CONTINUE THEIR DIRTY WAR AGAINST THE PEOPLES MOVEMENT AND THEIR WIDESPREAD WAR IN THE COUNTRYSIDE."}, {"text": "THE NATIONAL GUARD (WORD INDISTINCT) MURDERED UNIVERSITY STUDENT MARIO FLORES, WHOSE BODY WAS LEFT ON A HIGHWAY NEAR THE PORT OF ACAJUTLA."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, NATIONAL POLICE MEMBERS WHO WERE DRESSED IN CIVILIAN CLOTHES SEIZED UNIVERSITY STUDENTS HUGO MARTINEZ AND RAUL RAMIREZ, WHO ARE STILL MISSING."}, {"text": "JAIME ESTEVEZ, A MEMBER OF THE BREAD, LAND, WORK, AND FREEDOM MOVEMENT (MPTL) WAS TAKEN TO THE USULUTAN JAIL TO BE MURDERED AND THE CRIME WAS SUPPOSED TO GO UNNOTICED."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, ACCORDING TO REPORTS FROM MEMBERS OF THE NATIONAL FEDERATION OF AGRICULTURAL AND LIVESTOCK COOPERATIVES, FENACOA, ON 31 JANUARY, OROMONTIQUE BATTALION TROOPS OF THE 6TH INFANTRY BRIGADE COMMANDED BY LIEUTENANT PACHECHO MURDERED PEASANTS VICTOR MANUEL VASQUEZ AND RAFAEL ROMERO."}, {"text": "THE TROOPS FAKED A CLASH AT HORCONES DE BERLIN CANTON TO MURDER THOSE PEASANTS."}, {"text": "ON 4 JANUARY, LUCIA AND MARIA ASUNCION ROMERO, AND MINOR PEDRO GONZALEZ ERAZO WERE CAPTURED AT THE AHUACHAPAN BUS STATION BY ARMY TROOPS COMMANDED BY MURDERER COLONEL CANAS."}, {"text": "THE PEASANT COMMUNAL ASSOCIATION, ACC, CONTINUES TO DEMAND THE RELEASE OF PEASANTS BARTOLO RODRIGUEZ, WHO WAS CAPTURED ON 27 JANUARY, AND (NAME INDISTINCT) CAPTURED ON 2 FEBRUARY BY TROOPS OF COLONAL ORLANDO MONTANO OF THE 6TH INFANTRY BRIGADE."}, {"text": "THE NONGOVERNMENTAL SALVADORAN HUMAN RIGHTS COMMISSION REPORTED THE SEIZURE OF MACLOVIA GONZALEZ, VIRGILIO ORTIZ CRUZ, AND VIRGILIO ORTIZ, WHO {"sentences": [{"text": "IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO HAVE FREE ELECTIONS IN A COUNTRY WHERE REPRESSION PREVAILS."}, {"text": "IN AN INDISPUTABLE EFFORT OF CLEAR FLEXIBILITY AND WILLINGNESS FOR PEACE, THE FMLN PRESENTED A PEACE PROPOSAL TO JOSE NAPOLEON DUARTE'S GOVERNMENT AND THE SALVADORAN ARMED FORCES HIGH COMMAND."}, {"text": "THAT PROPOSAL IS AIMED AT TURNING ELECTIONS INTO A CONTRIBUTION TO PEACE."}, {"text": "TWO WEEKS HAVE PASSED SINCE WE PRESENTED OUR PROPOSAL, AND NEITHER THE GOVERNMENT NOR THE ARMED FORCES HAVE OFFICIALLY RESPONDED TO THE FMLN INITIATIVE."}, {"text": "THAT INITIATIVE HAS HAD THE SUPPORT OF THE INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITY AND OF OUR COUNTRY'S LARGEST GROUPS."}, {"text": "NEITHER THE GOVERNMENT NOR THE HIGH COMMAND HAVE RESPONDED TO THE PEOPLE'S OUTCRY AND WORLD EXPECTATIONS, WHICH ARE AWAITING A POSITIVE RESPONSE TO OUR PROPOSAL."}, {"text": "ON THE CONTRARY, THE GOVERNMENT, ITS ARMED FORCES, AND THE MEMBERS OF THEIR SQUADS DISGUISED IN CIVILIAN CLOTHES CONTINUE THEIR DIRTY WAR AGAINST THE PEOPLES MOVEMENT AND THEIR WIDESPREAD WAR IN THE COUNTRYSIDE."}, {"text": "THE NATIONAL GUARD (WORD INDISTINCT) MURDERED UNIVERSITY STUDENT MARIO FLORES, WHOSE BODY WAS LEFT ON A HIGHWAY NEAR THE PORT OF ACAJUTLA."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, NATIONAL POLICE MEMBERS WHO WERE DRESSED IN CIVILIAN CLOTHES SEIZED UNIVERSITY STUDENTS HUGO MARTINEZ AND RAUL RAMIREZ, WHO ARE STILL MISSING."}, {"text": "JAIME ESTEVEZ, A MEMBER OF THE BREAD, LAND, WORK, AND FREEDOM MOVEMENT (MPTL) WAS TAKEN TO THE USULUTAN JAIL TO BE MURDERED AND THE CRIME WAS SUPPOSED TO GO UNNOTICED."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, ACCORDING TO REPORTS FROM MEMBERS OF THE NATIONAL FEDERATION OF AGRICULTURAL AND LIVESTOCK COOPERATIVES, FENACOA, ON 31 JANUARY, OROMONTIQUE BATTALION TROOPS OF THE 6TH INFANTRY BRIGADE COMMANDED BY LIEUTENANT PACHECHO MURDERED PEASANTS VICTOR MANUEL VASQUEZ AND RAFAEL ROMERO."}, {"text": "THE TROOPS FAKED A CLASH AT HORCONES DE BERLIN CANTON TO MURDER THOSE PEASANTS."}, {"text": "ON 4 JANUARY, LUCIA AND MARIA ASUNCION ROMERO, AND MINOR PEDRO GONZALEZ ERAZO WERE CAPTURED AT THE AHUACHAPAN BUS STATION BY ARMY TROOPS COMMANDED BY MURDERER COLONEL CANAS."}, {"text": "THE PEASANT COMMUNAL ASSOCIATION, ACC, CONTINUES TO DEMAND THE RELEASE OF PEASANTS BARTOLO RODRIGUEZ, WHO WAS CAPTURED ON 27 JANUARY, AND (NAME INDISTINCT) CAPTURED ON 2 FEBRUARY BY TROOPS OF COLONAL ORLANDO MONTANO OF THE 6TH INFANTRY BRIGADE."}, {"text": "THE NONGOVERNMENTAL SALVADORAN HUMAN RIGHTS COMMISSION REPORTED THE SEIZURE OF MACLOVIA GONZALEZ, VIRGILIO ORTIZ CRUZ, AND VIRGILIO ORTIZ, WHO WERE CAPTURED ON 4 JANUARY BY MILITARY DETACHMENT NO 4 TROOPS AT EL MAYUELO CANTON, MORAZAN DEPARTMENT."}, {"text": "THEIR WHEREABOUTS ARE STILL UNKNOWN."}, {"text": "THE MPTL ALSO REPORTED THAT ROBERTO MENA WAS CAPTURED BY ATONAL BATTALION TROOPS AT 1600 ON 5 FEBRUARY."}, {"text": "THERE CANNOT BE FREE AND CLEAN ELECTIONS IN THIS ATMOSPHERE OF REPRESSION."}, {"text": "THE GOVERNMENT AND THE ARMY HIGH COMMAND CONTINUE TERRIFYING AND KILLING THE SALVADORAN PEOPLE."}, {"text": "THE PEOPLES' WILL CANNOT BE EXPRESSED THROUGH THEIR VOTE WITH SUCH AN ATMOSPHERE OF REPRESSION, ESPECIALLY IF THE GROUPS DISPUTING POWER ARE A BUNCH OF MURDERERS AND CORRUPT MEN."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0036", "message_template": 2, "message_template_optional": true, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 07 FEB 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], "document_mentions": [], "sentence_mentions": {}}], "incident_type": {"sentences": [{"text": "IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO HAVE FREE ELECTIONS IN A COUNTRY WHERE REPRESSION PREVAILS."}, {"text": "IN AN INDISPUTABLE EFFORT OF CLEAR FLEXIBILITY AND WILLINGNESS FOR PEACE, THE FMLN PRESENTED A PEACE PROPOSAL TO JOSE NAPOLEON DUARTE'S GOVERNMENT AND THE SALVADORAN ARMED FORCES HIGH COMMAND."}, {"text": "THAT PROPOSAL IS AIMED AT TURNING ELECTIONS INTO A CONTRIBUTION TO PEACE."}, {"text": "TWO WEEKS HAVE PASSED SINCE WE PRESENTED OUR PROPOSAL, AND NEITHER THE GOVERNMENT NOR THE ARMED FORCES HAVE OFFICIALLY RESPONDED TO THE FMLN INITIATIVE."}, {"text": "THAT INITIATIVE HAS HAD THE SUPPORT OF THE INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITY AND OF OUR COUNTRY'S LARGEST GROUPS."}, {"text": "NEITHER THE GOVERNMENT NOR THE HIGH COMMAND HAVE RESPONDED TO THE PEOPLE'S OUTCRY AND WORLD EXPECTATIONS, WHICH ARE AWAITING A POSITIVE RESPONSE TO OUR PROPOSAL."}, {"text": "ON THE CONTRARY, THE GOVERNMENT, ITS ARMED FORCES, AND THE MEMBERS OF THEIR SQUADS DISGUISED IN CIVILIAN CLOTHES CONTINUE THEIR DIRTY WAR AGAINST THE PEOPLES MOVEMENT AND THEIR WIDESPREAD WAR IN THE COUNTRYSIDE."}, {"text": "THE NATIONAL GUARD (WORD INDISTINCT) MURDERED UNIVERSITY STUDENT MARIO FLORES, WHOSE BODY WAS LEFT ON A HIGHWAY NEAR THE PORT OF ACAJUTLA."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, NATIONAL POLICE MEMBERS WHO WERE DRESSED IN CIVILIAN CLOTHES SEIZED UNIVERSITY STUDENTS HUGO MARTINEZ AND RAUL RAMIREZ, WHO ARE STILL MISSING."}, {"text": "JAIME ESTEVEZ, A MEMBER OF THE BREAD, LAND, WORK, AND FREEDOM MOVEMENT (MPTL) WAS TAKEN TO THE USULUTAN JAIL TO BE MURDERED AND THE CRIME WAS SUPPOSED TO GO UNNOTICED."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, ACCORDING TO REPORTS FROM MEMBERS OF THE NATIONAL FEDERATION OF AGRICULTURAL AND LIVESTOCK COOPERATIVES, FENACOA, ON 31 JANUARY, OROMONTIQUE BATTALION TROOPS OF THE 6TH INFANTRY BRIGADE COMMANDED BY LIEUTENANT PACHECHO MURDERED PEASANTS VICTOR MANUEL VASQUEZ AND RAFAEL ROMERO."}, {"text": "THE TROOPS FAKED A CLASH AT HORCONES DE BERLIN CANTON TO MURDER THOSE PEASANTS."}, {"text": "ON 4 JANUARY, LUCIA AND MARIA ASUNCION ROMERO, AND MINOR PEDRO GONZALEZ ERAZO WERE CAPTURED AT THE AHUACHAPAN BUS STATION BY ARMY TROOPS COMMANDED BY MURDERER COLONEL CANAS."}, {"text": "THE PEASANT COMMUNAL ASSOCIATION, ACC, CONTINUES TO DEMAND THE RELEASE OF PEASANTS BARTOLO RODRIGUEZ, WHO WAS CAPTURED ON 27 JANUARY, AND (NAME INDISTINCT) CAPTURED ON 2 FEBRUARY BY TROOPS OF COLONAL ORLANDO MONTANO OF THE 6TH INFANTRY BRIGADE."}, {"text": "THE NONGOVERNMENTAL SALVADORAN HUMAN RIGHTS COMMISSION REPORTED THE SEIZURE OF MACLOVIA GONZALEZ, VIRGILIO ORTIZ CRUZ, AND VIRGILIO ORTIZ, WHO WERE CAPTURED ON 4 JANUARY BY MILITARY DETACHMENT NO 4 TROOPS AT EL MAYUELO CANTON, MORAZAN DEPARTMENT."}, {"text": "THEIR WHEREABOUTS ARE STILL UNKNOWN."}, {"text": "THE MPTL ALSO REPORTED THAT ROBERTO MENA WAS CAPTURED BY ATONAL BATTALION TROOPS AT 1600 ON 5 FEBRUARY."}, {"text": "THERE CANNOT BE FREE AND CLEAN ELECTIONS IN THIS ATMOSPHERE OF REPRESSION."}, {"text": "THE GOVERNMENT AND THE ARMY HIGH COMMAND CONTINUE TERRIFYING AND KILLING THE SALVADORAN PEOPLE."}, {"text": "THE PEOPLES' WILL CANNOT BE EXPRESSED THROUGH THEIR VOTE WITH SUCH AN ATMOSPHERE OF REPRESSION, ESPECIALLY IF THE GROUPS DISPUTING POWER ARE A BUNCH OF MURDERERS AND CORRUPT MEN."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0036", "message_template": 7, "message_template_optional": true, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["27 JAN 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], "document_mentions": [], "sentence_mentions": {}}], "incident_type": {"sentences": [{"text": "1. WE HAVE LEARNED ABOUT THE PATRIOTIC INVITATION INCLUDED IN THE DOCUMENT SIGNED BY MONSIGNOR MARIO REVOLLO BRAVO AND BY THE DISTINGUISHED FORMER PRESIDENTS ALFONSO LOPEZ, JULIO CESAR TURBAY, AND MISAEL PASTRANA AS WELL AS BY PATRIOTIC UNION PRESIDENT DIEGO MONTANA CUELLAR."}, {"text": "2. TO RESPOND TO SUCH PROPOSALS, WE REITERATE OUR WELL-KNOWN PEACE COMMITMENTS EXPRESSED IN OUR MOST SINCERE AND FRANK STATEMENTS."}, {"text": "3. WE FULLY SHARE THE CRITERIA EXPRESSED BY THEM REGARDING THE SURVIVAL OF THE STATE AND GOVERNMENT, WHICH WAS DEMOCRATICALLY ELECTED, AGAINST ORGANIZATIONS AND PEOPLE LIKE US, WHO HAVE SHOWN NO REGARD FOR THE LAW BY FIGHTING INSTITUTIONS AND THE LEGALLY ESTABLISHED ORDER."}, {"text": "4. AFTER EVALUATING OUR CONDUCT UNDER THE PREVIOUS CONCEPT, WE ARE ONLY INTERESTED IN PEACE, TRANQUILLITY, AND DEMOCRACY FOR OUR FATHERLAND AND FOR OUR PEOPLE."}, {"text": "5. AS A RESULT, WE ACCEPT THE VICTORY OF THE STATE, THE INSTITUTIONS, AND THE LEGALLY ESTABLISHED GOVERNMENT."}, {"text": "WE WILL LAY DOWN OUR WEAPONS AND OTHER MEANS OF STRUGGLE FOR THE SAKE OF THE COUNTRY'S BEST INTERESTS."}, {"text": "6. WE ACCEPT THE LEGAL ORDER THAT IS CURRENTLY IN FORCE WITH THE HOPE THAT THE GOVERNMENT AND SOCIETY WILL RESPECT OUR RIGHTS AND WILL ALLOW US TO RETURN TO OUR FAMILIES AND COMMUNITIES."}, {"text": "7. AS AN ABSOLUTE PROOF OF OUR INTEREST IN ACHIEVING PEACE, WE HAVE DECIDED TO IMMEDIATELY RELEASE MRS PATRICIA ECHAVARRIA AND HER DAUGHTER AS WELL AS OTHER PEOPLE WHO ARE BEING HELD HOSTAGE AS CIRCUMSTANCES PERMIT."}, {"text": "WE WOULD LIKE TO ADD THAT WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ALL THE CASES OF KIDNAPPED PEOPLE OF WHICH WE ARE ACCUSED."}, {"text": "8. WE OFFER OUR SERVICES AS MEDIATORS TO ACHIEVE PEACE WITH THE EMERALD TRAFFICKERS, THE SO-CALLED PARAMILITARY GROUPS, AND THE SO-CALLED HIRED ASSASSINS WITH THE ONLY PURPOSE OF ENDING THE VIOLENCE THAT IS HURTING OUR COLOMBIAN FATHERLAND."}, {"text": "9. WE HAVE DECIDED TO SUSPEND THE SHIPMENT OF DRUGS AND TO TURN IN OUR WEAPONS, EXPLOSIVES, LABORATORIES, CLANDESTINE LANDING STRIPS, AND OTHER ELEMENTS THAT ARE RELATED TO OUR ACTIVITIES AS SOON AS WE GET CONSTITUTIONAL AND LEGAL GUARANTEES."}, {"text": "10."}, {"text": "THERE WILL BE NO MORE BOMBINGS ANYWHERE ON NATIONAL TERRITORY AND WE HAVE ORDERED THE SUSPENSION OF ALL TYPES OF EXECUTIONS OF POLITICAL LEADERS, GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS, ASSOCIATION LEADERS, JUDICIAL OFFICIALS, JOURNALISTS, POLICEMEN, AND SOLDIERS."}, {"text": "11."}, {"text": "THE ESSENTIAL REASON FOR OUR STRUGGLE HAS BEEN AND WILL ALWAYS BE OUR FAMILIES, OUR FREEDOM, OUR PEOPLE, OUR LIVES, AND OUR RIGHTS AS CITIZENS OF THIS FATHERLAND."}, {"text": "THE EXTRADITABLES, 16 JANUARY 1990"}], "template": {"message_id": {"sentences": [{"text": "GENERAL CARLOS ARTURO CASADIEGO TORRADO, SECOND IN COMMAND OF THE COLOMBIAN POLICE, HAS REPORTED THE DEATH OF GONZALO RODRIGUEZ GACHA."}, {"text": "(POLICE DIRECTOR) GENERAL GOMEZ PADILLA, WHO IS IN CALI, WILL TRAVEL TO BOGOTA AND WILL SOON HOLD A NEWS CONFERENCE TO PROVIDE MORE DETAILS ON THE DEATH OF THIS CRIMINAL."}, {"text": "IN AN INTERVIEW, GEN CASADIEGO TORRADO INFORMED RCN OF THE OPERATION MOUNTED IN THE AREA WHERE THE INCIDENT OCCURRED."}, {"text": "(BEGIN RECORDING) (CASADIEGO) WE HAVE BEEN INFORMED BY THOSE OPERATING IN THAT AREA THAT RODRIGUEZ GACHA, HIS SON, AND THE PEOPLE WITH THEM HAVE BEEN KILLED."}, {"text": "THAT IS THE INFORMATION WE HAVE AVAILABLE."}, {"text": "WE DO NOT HAVE DETAILS ON THE OPERATION YET."}, {"text": "IT WAS THE RESULT OF LONG-TERM INTELLIGENCE WORK CARRIED OUT WITH GREAT PROFESSIONALISM, WHICH GAVE US INFORMATION ON WHERE HE COULD BE FOUND."}, {"text": "WE DEPLOYED SPECIAL GROUPS TO CARRY OUT THAT TASK."}, {"text": "(REPORTER) GENERAL, EXACTLY WHERE DID THE OPERATION, IN WHICH RODRIGUEZ GACHA, HIS SON, AND 15 OTHERS WERE KILLED, TAKE PLACE?"}, {"text": "(CASADIEGO) IN A RURAL AREA, AS YOU KNOW, IN THE NORTHERN PART OF THE COUNTRY."}, {"text": "I DO NOT KNOW THE EXACT LOCATION."}, {"text": "(REPORTER) HAS IT BEEN OFFICIALLY REPORTED THAT RODRIGUEZ GACHA AND HIS SON WERE KILLED?"}, {"text": "IS THIS AN OFFICIAL REPORT FROM THE NATIONAL POLICE?"}, {"text": "(CASADIEGO) THAT IS THE INFORMATION I HAVE."}, {"text": "THAT IS THE INFORMATION I HAVE RECEIVED FROM THE SCENE OF THE INCIDENT."}, {"text": "(REPORTER) WHO ARE THE OTHER 15 PEOPLE KILLED?"}, {"text": "(CASADIEGO) WE HAVE NOT IDENTIFIED THEM YET."}, {"text": "OFFICIALS ARE TRAVELING TO THE SITE TO OFFICIALLY IDENTIFY THE BODIES."}, {"text": "(REPORTER) WERE THEY ASSISTANTS, BODYGUARDS, ESCORTS?"}, {"text": "(CASADIEGO) YES, WE ARE SURE OF THAT."}, {"text": "(REPORTER) HAVE WEAPONS OR OTHER ITEMS BEEN CONFISCATED?"}, {"text": "WE HAVE HEARD THAT IMPORTANT DOCUMENTS WERE FOUND."}, {"text": "(CASADIEGO) YES, WE KNOW THAT WEAPONS WERE FOUND WHICH WERE USED TO PROTECT THIS MAN."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, AS I SAID, WE DO NOT HAVE THE DETAILS ON THE INCIDENT YET."}, {"text": "WE HAVE BEEN TOLD THAT RODRIGUEZ GACHA AND HIS SON WERE KILLED, AS WELL AS OTHER INDIVIDUALS WHO WERE WITH HIM."}, {"text": "(REPORTER) WHO ELSE IS THERE? IS THERE A COMMISSION OF JUDGES?"}, {"text": "WE UNDERSTAND THAT A FEW MOMENTS AGO A PLANE DEPARTED WITH REPRESENTATIVES FROM THE CRIMINAL INVESTIGATIVE DIRECTORATE AND THE ATTORNEY GENERAL'S OFFICE."}, {"text": "(CASADIEGO) I DO NOT KNOW IF REPRESENTATIVES FROM THE CRIMINAL INVESTIGATIVE DIRECTORATE HAVE TRAVELED THERE."}, {"text": "WE SENT POLICE INSPECTORS, JUDGES, AND WE KNOW THAT THE COMMANDERS OF THE THREE NEIGHBORING DEPARTMENTS WILL ALSO BE THERE."}, {"text": "(REPORTER)"}, {"text": "HOW WAS THE OPERATION PLANNED, AND HAS THE PRESIDENT BEEN INFORMED?"}, {"text": "(CASADIEGO) AS I SAID, THIS OPERATION IS THE RESULT OF ARDUOUS WORK BY THE NATIONAL POLICE."}, {"text": "IT WAS A VERY IMPORTANT MISSION."}, {"text": "FOR A LONG TIME WE HAVE BEEN CARRYING OUT THESE TYPES OF OPERATIONS."}, {"text": "WE ARE STILL DOING THIS TYPE OF WORK AND WILL CONTINUE TO DO SO."}, {"text": "(CONTINUED)"}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0042", "message_template": 1, {"sentences": [{"text": "THE ATTACK IN WHICH FIVE VENEZUELAN SOLDIERS WERE KILLED AT THE BORDER WITH COLOMBIA HAS BEEN BLAMED, ACCORDING TO SOME REPORTS, ON COLOMBIAN GUERRILLAS AND DRUG TRAFFICKING GANGS OPERATING IN COLOMBIA."}, {"text": "VENEZUELAN PRESIDENT CARLOS ANDRES PEREZ BLAMED COLOMBIAN DRUG TRAFFICKING GANGS FOR THE ATTACK -- IN WHICH FIVE GUARDS WERE KILLED -- PERPETRATED ON 26 OCTOBER IN THE BORDER STATE OF APURE AGAINST A NATIONAL GUARD PATROL IN THE AREA."}, {"text": "REFERRING LAST NIGHT TO THE DRUG TRAFFICKING GANGS, PEREZ SAID THIS IS "A PROVOCATION FOR VENEZUELA BECAUSE THEY ARE TRYING TO EXTEND THEIR CLAWS TO OUR COUNTRY.""}, {"text": "HOWEVER, JORGE ROMERO, GOVERNOR OF THE BORDER STATE OF TACHIRA, WHICH BORDERS THE STATE OF APURE, MAINTAINED THIS WAS AN "ATTACK WITH VERY POWERFUL EXPLOSIVES" PERPETRATED BY "MEMBERS OF THE COLOMBIAN GUERRILLAS, PRESUMABLY FROM THE ARMY OF NATIONAL LIBERATION ARMY, AGAINST A NATIONAL GUARD JEEP.""}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO ROMERO, IT HAS BEEN DETERMINED DURING THE PRELIMINARY INVESTIGATIONS THAT THE EXPLOSIVES THAT KILLED THE FIVE SOLDIERS WERE BURIED IN A ROAD NEAR CUTUFI, AND SET OFF BY REMOTE CONTROL AS THE MILITARY VEHICLE PASSED BY."}, {"text": "LAST NIGHT, THE DEFENSE MINISTRY ORDERED THE ARREST OF FIVE ALLEGED COLOMBIAN GUERRILLAS, WHOM IT BLAMED FOR THE ATTACK."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, THE ATTACKERS REPORTEDLY CROSSED THE BORDER INTO COLOMBIA."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0044", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["26 OCT 89"]}], {"sentences": [{"text": "... IF THE COLLEAGUES AT THE CENTRAL STUDIO HAVE ANY QUESTIONS FOR THE BOGOTA ELECTRICAL ENERGY INSTITUTE EMPLOYEE WHO WAS AT THE SITE OF THE INCIDENT."}, {"text": "WE ARE OBSERVING A TERRIBLE SCENE OF DESOLATION AND DEATH BECAUSE ALL THE PASSANGERS GOING TO CALI, VALLE DEL CAUCA DEPARTMENT, DIED."}, {"text": "THERE IS NO SINGLE SURVIVOR ACCORDING TO NATIONAL POLICE REPORTS."}, {"text": "THEY ARE AWAITING CRIMINAL INSTRUCTION JUDGES."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, THE ELECTRICITY COMPANY WORKER MAY ANSWER QUESTIONS POSED BY STUDIO REPORTERS."}, {"text": "LATER ON WE WILL HAVE MORE OFFICIAL INFORMATION."}, {"text": "(STUDIO REPORTER)"}, {"text": "CAN YOU CONFIRM THE ARRIVAL OF THE POLICE'S BOMB SQUAD?"}, {"text": "AUTHORITIES FEAR THE CRASH MAY HAVE BEEN CAUSED BY AN EXPLOSION RATHER THAN AN ACCIDENT INSIDE THE AIRPLANE."}, {"text": "(REPORTER)"}, {"text": "THE F-2 JUDICIAL POLICE AND CRIMINAL STATISTICS EXPERTS ARE HERE."}, {"text": "THEY FEEL THAT THE ACCIDENT MAY HAVE BEEN CAUSED BY A TERRORIST ACTION."}, {"text": "THE REMARK WAS MADE BASED ON WITNESS ACCOUNTS."}, {"text": "THEY NOTED THAT THIS MAY HAVE BEEN A TERRORIST ATTACK BECAUSE AIRPLANES DO NOT HAVE THIS KIND OF ACCIDENT UNLESS THERE IS AN EXPLOSION, SOMETHING THAT HAS VERY SERIOUS CONSEQUENCES."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO REPORTS BY THE NATIONAL POLICE F-2 EXPERTS, THE AIRPLANE BROKE INTO SIX PIECES."}, {"text": "IT IS COMPLETELY DESTROYED, WHICH IS WHY THE 106 PASSENGERS ABOARD ARE STREWN ACROSS AN AREA 6-8 KM WIDE."}, {"text": "ACCESS TO THE AIRPLANE'S REMAINS IS DIFFICULT BECAUSE THIS IS A MOUNTAINOUS REGION."}, {"text": "THE CASQUITO (WORD INDISTINCT) IS THROUGH THE ROAD THAT GOES FROM BOSA, CUNDINAMARCA DEPARTMENT, TO THE SCHOOL (NOT FURTHER IDENTIFIED)."}, {"text": "AUTHORITIES SAY THAT THIS AREA IS LOCATED VERY CLOSE TO SLUICE NUMBER 3, MUNA 3, WHICH FEEDS WATER TO THE DAM."}, {"text": "THE SITUATION IS VERY DIFFICULT AND DRAMATIC."}, {"text": "RIGHT NOW, EXPERTS ARE COLLECTING SAMPLES AND TRYING FIND ALL THEY CAN TO LEARN FOR SURE IF THIS WAS A TERRORIST ACTION OR A SERIOUS ACCIDENT CAUSED BY A FLAW IN THE MECHANICAL SYSTEM OF THE HK-1803 AIRPLANE."}], "template": {"sentences": [{"text": "SALVADORAN PRESIDENT-ELECT ALFREDO CRISTIANI CONDEMNED THE TERRORIST KILLING OF ATTORNEY GENERAL ROBERTO GARCIA ALVARADO AND ACCUSED THE FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT (FMLN) OF THE CRIME."}, {"text": "LEGISLATIVE ASSEMBLY PRESIDENT RICARDO VALDIVIESO AND VICE PRESIDENT-ELECT FRANCISCO MERINO ALSO DECLARED THAT THE DEATH OF THE ATTORNEY GENERAL WAS CAUSED BY WHAT VALDIVIESO TERMED THE GUERRILLAS' "IRRATIONAL VIOLENCE.""}, {"text": "GARCIA ALVARADO, 56, WAS KILLED WHEN A BOMB PLACED BY URBAN GUERRILLAS ON HIS VEHICLE EXPLODED AS IT CAME TO A HALT AT AN INTERSECTION IN DOWNTOWN SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": ""WE HAVE TO CONDEMN THIS INCIDENT, IT IS A GUERRILLA ACT," ALFREDO CRISTIANI, NATIONALIST REPUBLICAN ALLIANCE (ARENA) PRESIDENT-ELECT, WHO WILL REPLACE CHRISTIAN DEMOCRAT JOSE NAPOLEON DUARTE ON 1 JUNE, STATED."}, {"text": "CRISTIANI SAID THAT "THESE ARE THE RISKS FACED BY SOMEONE WHO ENFORCES THE LAW.""}, {"text": "HE NOTED THAT "THE GUERRILLAS' IRRATIONAL ATTITUDE MAKES IT INCREASINGLY DIFFICULT TO BELIEVE THEY WANT PEACE.""}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO CRISTIANI, THE ATTACK TOOK PLACE BECAUSE ATTORNEY GENERAL GARCIA ALVARADO WARNED THAT "HE WOULD TAKE MEASURES AGAINST URBAN TERRORISTS.""}, {"text": "VICE PRESIDENT-ELECT FRANCISCO MERINO SAID THAT WHEN THE ATTORNEY GENERAL'S CAR STOPPED AT A LIGHT ON A STREET IN DOWNTOWN SAN SALVADOR, AN INDIVIDUAL PLACED A BOMB ON THE ROOF OF THE ARMORED VEHICLE."}, {"text": ""THE DRIVER TOLD THE ATTORNEY GENERAL ABOUT THE BOMB."}, {"text": "THE VEHICLE SWERVED AND THE BOMB EXPLODED, CAUSING THE TOP OF THE VEHICLE TO COLLAPSE ON THE ATTORNEY GENERAL'S HEAD," MERINO STATED."}, {"text": "GUERRILLAS ATTACKED MERINO'S HOME IN SAN SALVADOR 5 DAYS AGO WITH EXPLOSIVES."}, {"text": "THERE WERE SEVEN CHILDREN, INCLUDING FOUR OF THE VICE PRESIDENT'S CHILDREN, IN THE HOME AT THE TIME."}, {"text": "A 15-YEAR-OLD NIECE OF MERINO'S WAS INJURED."}, {"text": ""THESE INCIDENTS," CRISTIANI SAID, "FRANKLY CAUSE US TO BECOME MORE AWARE OF THE FACT THAT WE MUST NOT PERMIT TERRORIST ACTIONS TO OCCUR IN EL SALVADOR.""}, {"text": "THE PRESIDENT-ELECT RULED OUT THE POSSIBILITY THAT THESE ATTACKS "WILL PREVENT THE INAUGURAL CEREMONY FROM TAKING PLACE.""}, {"text": ""I AM CERTAIN THAT THE INAUGURATION WILL BE ON 1 JUNE."}, {"text": "WE WILL NOT JUMP OVERBOARD OR MAKE A RUN FOR IT."}, {"text": "WE KNOW WHAT WE ARE UP AGAINST AND WILL GO ON," HE STATED."}, {"text": "CRISTIANI SAID THE GUERRILLA ATTACKS ARE INTENDED TO PROMPT A GOVERNMENT AND MILITARY REACTION SO THE FMLN CAN "EXPLOIT IT" ABROAD TO "POLITICALLY ISOLATE THE NEW GOVERNMENT.""}, {"text": "RICARDO VALDIVIESO, PRESIDENT OF THE LEGISLATIVE ASSSEMBLY AND AN ARENA LEADER, SAID THE FMLN AND ITS "FRONT" GROUPS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE "IRRATIONAL VIOLENCE THAT KILLED ATTORNEY GENERAL GARCIA.""}, {"text": "VALDIVIESO SAID THE LEGISLATIVE ASSEMBLY WILL APPROVE DRASTIC LAWS TO "HALT THE WAVE OF VIOLENCE.""}, {"text": "HE SAID THE ATTORNEY GENERAL "WAS APOLITICAL, WORKED FOR JUSTICE, AND DID NOT DESERVE TO DIE LIKE THAT.""}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE POLICE AND GARCIA ALVARADO'S DRIVER, WHO ESCAPED UNSCATHED, THE ATTORNEY GENERAL WAS TRAVELING WITH TWO BODYGUARDS."}, {"text": "ONE OF THEM WAS INJURED."}, {"text": "THE ATTORNEY GENERAL'S BODY WAS DESTROYED BY THE BOMB THAT EXPLODED OVER HIS HEAD."}, {"text": "NO GROUP HAS CLAIMED CREDIT FOR THE ATTACK YET, BUT POLICE SOURCES CLAIM IT "IS CHARACTERISTIC OF THE FMLN URBAN COMMANDOS.""}, {"text": "THE SAME SOURCES CONFIRMED THAT GARCIA ALVARADO HAD BEEN THREATENED ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS BY SALVADORAN URBAN GUERRILLAS."}, {"text": "MOMENTS AFTER THE ATTACK, ARMY AND POLICE UNITS CORDONED OFF THE AREA AND BEGAN AN ALL-OUT MILITARY OPERATION TO FIND THOSE RESPONSIBLE."}, {"text": "GARCIA ALVARADO, FATHER OF SIX, WAS APPOINTED ATTORNEY GENERAL ON 23 DECEMBER 1988."}, {"text": "HE WAS CONSIDERED TO BE CLOSELY LINKED TO ARENA."}, {"text": "ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS, HOWEVER, HE SAID HE DID NOT REPRESENT ANY PARTY AND WAS CARRYING OUT HIS JOB "IMPARTIALLY AND WITH THE INTENTION OF ENFORCING THE COUNTRY'S LAWS.""}], "template": {"message_id": {"sentences": [{"text": "AT LEAST SEVEN PERUVIAN PRESIDENTIAL GUARDS TRAVELLING ABOARD A MILITARY BUS WERE KILLED TODAY IN AN ATTACK IN DOWNTOWN LIMA."}, {"text": "THE BUS WAS TRANSPORTING 24 MEMBERS OF THE "HUSARES DE JUNIN" PRESIDENTIAL ESCORT REGIMENT FROM THE "BARBONES" BARRACKS TO THE PRESIDENTIAL PALACE NEARBY."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO RADIO REPORTS 12 SOLDIERS WERE INJURED IN THE ATTACK, AS WERE SOME PEDESTRIANS, INCLUDING A CHILD."}, {"text": "IT IS BELIEVED THAT THE BUS WAS DAMAGED BY A CAR BOMB EXPLOSION."}, {"text": "THE CAR BOMB WAS NEAR THE BARRACKS, WHICH ARE 1,200 METERS FROM GOVERNMENT PALACE, WHICH IS IN TURN ABOUT 500 METERS FROM THE CONGRESS BUILDING."}, {"text": "THE MILITARY GUARDS WHO WERE ATTACKED WERE SCHEDULED TO RELIEVE THE PRESIDENTIAL PALACE GUARDS AT 1300."}, {"text": "THE COLORFUL UNIFORMS AND THE MILITARY STEPS OF THE ABOUT 60 "HUSARES DE JUNIN:" GUARDS WHO PARTICIPATE IN THE CHANGING OF GUARD CEREMONY ARE A DAILY ATTRACTION FOR TOURISTS AND PASSERSBY WHO GATHER AT THE PLAZE DE ARMAS IN THE HISTORIC CENTER OF LIMA."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0049", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["03 {"sentences": [{"text": "THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF GUATEMALA YESTERDAY STRONGLY CONDEMNED THE MURDER OF JORGE ADOLFO VARGAS GONZALEZ, SECOND SECRETARY OF THE NICARAGUAN EMBASSY IN GUATEMALA."}, {"text": "VARGAS WAS MURDERED YESTERDAY MORNING IN ZONE 10 OF THIS CAPITAL."}, {"text": "CLAUDIA ARENAS, PUBLIC RELATIONS SECRETARY OF THE PRESIDENCY, HAS SAID THAT "THIS IS A REGRETTABLE ACT THAT WE STRONGLY CONDEMN.""}, {"text": "SHE ADDED THAT "DURING A TALK WITH INTERIOR MINISTER CARLOS A. MORALES VILLATORO, IT WAS REPORTED THAT AN INVESTIGATION OF THE MURDER WAS IMMEDIATELY ORDERED TO UNCOVER THE MURDERERS, ARREST THEM, AND BRING THEM TO COURT.""}, {"text": "THE GOVERNMENT SPOKESPERSON ADDED THAT "THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC DEEPLY REGRETS THAT THIS VIOLENT ACTION HAS TAKEN PLACE AGAINST A MEMBER OF THE DIPLOMATIC CORPS ACCREDITED TO OUR COUNTRY.""}, {"text": "THE MURDERED DIPLOMAT, JORGE ADOLFO VARGAS GONZALEZ, WAS THE SECOND SECRETARY OF THE NICARAGUAN EMBASSY IN GUATEMALA."}, {"text": "FOREIGN MINISTER ARIEL RIVERA THIS MORNING ALSO CONDEMNED THE MURDER OF THE SECOND SECRETARY OF THE NICARAGUAN EMBASSY IN GUATEMALA, JORGE ADOLFO VARGAS GONZALEZ."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0050", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", {"sentences": [{"text": "THE SUPREME COURT RULED TODAY THAT MOST OF THE DECREES ISSUED BY PRESIDENT VIRGILIO BARCO TO FACE THE SITUATION OF PUBLIC ORDER IN THE COUNTRY ARE CONSTITUTIONAL."}, {"text": "THE DECREES WERE ISSUED ON 18 AUGUST, THE SAME DAY SENATOR LUIS CARLOS GALAN SARMIENTO WAS ASSASSINATED."}, {"text": "LET US FIND OUT WHICH DECREES WERE APPROVED AND WHICH WERE DECLARED UNCONSTITUTIONAL."}, {"text": "THE SUPREME COURT DECLARED THE FOLLOWING DECREES CONSTITUTIONAL: ADMINISTRATIVE EXTRADITION, AS LONG AS THERE ARE PUBLIC ORDER PROBLEMS AND AS LONG AS THE COUNTRY IS UNDER A STATE OF SEIGE; THE IMPLEMENTATION OF FINES AND PROCEDURES TO PUNISH PEOPLE BECOMING RICH THROUGH ILLEGAL MEANS; AND FINES THAT ARE IMPOSED FOR USE OF FORCE TO ACHIEVE A POLITICAL OUTCOME."}, {"text": "THE SUPREME COURT DECLARED THE FOLLOWING DECREE UNCONSTITUTIONAL: THE SYSTEM BEING USED TO RAID, CONFISCATE, OCCUPY, AND EXPROPRIATE PROPERTY."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE SUPREME COURT, THE MECHANISM BEING USED WAS ADMINISTRATIVE AND IT SHOULD BE DONE JUDICIALLY, BY ORDER OF A JUDGE."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0051", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["18 AUG 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["COLOMBIA"], "document_mentions": [], "sentence_mentions": {}}], "incident_type": "ATTACK", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["ACCOMPLISHED"]}, "incident_instrument_id": null, "perp_incident_category": null, "perp_individual_id": null, "perp_organization_id": null, "perp_organization_confidence": null, "phys_tgt_id": null, "phys_tgt_effect_of_incident": null, "hum_tgt_name": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["LUIS CARLOS GALAN SARMIENTO"], "document_mentions": [[222, 249]], "sentence_mentions": {"1": [[59, 86]]}}], "hum_tgt_description": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["SENATOR"], "strings_rhs": ["LUIS CARLOS GALAN SARMIENTO"]}], "hum_tgt_effect_of_incident": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["DEATH"], "strings_rhs": ["LUIS CARLOS GALAN SARMIENTO"]}]}, "hit_id": 147}

{"sentences": [{"text": "VENEZUELAN PRESIDENT CARLOS ANDRES PEREZ' BROTHER-IN-LAW WAS KIDNAPPED IN COLOMBIA, ACCORDING TO FAMILY SOURCES IN CARACAS."}, {"text": "A REPORT BROADCAST ON A PRIVATE
