{"sentences": [{"text": "THE RECTOR OF THE CENTRAL AMERICAN UNIVERSITY (UCA), FATHER MIGUEL FRANCISCO ESTRADA, HAS DESCRIBED THE GOVERNMENT'S REPORT THAT ARMED FORCES ELEMENTS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE KILLING OF SIX UCA PRIESTS AS MOST IMPORTANT, ALTHOUGH HE ALSO NOTED THAT THE REPORT IS INCOMPLETE."}, {"text": "(BEGIN RECORDING) (ESTRADA)"}, {"text": "I BELIEVE IT IS INCOMPLETE BECAUSE WE DO NOT YET KNOW WHO COMMITTED THE CRIMES."}, {"text": "WE ONLY KNOW THAT THEY BELONG TO AN INSTITUTION, AND THIS OF COURSE IS ONLY PARTIAL INFORMATION."}, {"text": "(REPORTER) DID YOU KNOW THAT THE GOVERNMENT WAS GOING TO MAKE THIS ANNOUNCEMENT LAST NIGHT, OR WAS IT A SURPRISE?"}, {"text": "(ESTRADA) I THINK IT WAS A SURPRISE BECAUSE WE HAD BEEN IN TOUCH WITH THE PRESIDENT AND WITH THE CRIME COMMISSION, WHICH IS THE ONE CARRYING OUT THE INVESTIGATIONS ON ORDERS FROM THE PRESIDENT AND THE GOVERNMENT."}, {"text": "THEY PROMISED US THAT IF WE WERE TO COOPERATE BY PROVIDING INFORMATION, THEY WOULD DO EVERYTHING POSSIBLE TO RESOLVE THE PROBLEM AND CARRY OUT THE INVESTIGATIONS."}, {"text": "AT THAT POINT I WAS SKEPTICAL, BECAUSE THE PERSONS WHO HAVE TESTIFIED HAVE ACCUSED THE ARMED FORCES, AND I HAD NEVER SEEN A SALVADORAN PRESIDENT OR THE ARMED FORCES MAKING A SERIOUS EFFORT TO CLEAN UP ITS IMAGE AND CARRY OUT INVESTIGTIONS TO PUT MEMBERS OF THE ARMED FORCES IN PRISON."}, {"text": "I WAS SKEPTICAL."}, {"text": "I HAD NEVER SEEN THAT HAPPEN, BUT FACTS SHOW THAT I WAS MISTAKEN."}, {"text": "(END RECORDING) FATHER ESTRADA HAS ADMITTED THAT THERE HAS BEEN INTERNATIONAL PRESSURE TO HAVE THIS CASE INVESTIGATED, BUT HE OPTIMISTICALLY BELIEVES THAT THE DECISION TO INVESTIGATE HAS BEEN ADOPTED ALSO FOR THE SAKE OF THE PRESTIGE OF THE ARMED FORCES."}, {"text": "(BEGIN RECORDING) (ESTRADA)"}, {"text": "I AM INCLINED TO BELIEVE THAT THE ARMED FORCES ARE ACTING NOT ONLY AS A RESULT OF PRESSURE, BUT ALSO BECAUSE THEY COULD BE DENIED MILITARY OR ECONOMIC AID."}, {"text": "I BELIEVE THAT A CRIME SUCH AS THE ONE BEING INVESTIGATED GOES AGAINST THE VERY ESSENCE OF THE ARMED FORCES, WHICH EXISTS TO PROTECT THE CITIZENS, NOT TO HARM THEM."}, {"text": "(END RECORDING) FATHER ESTRADA SAID HE TRUSTS IN THE MORAL STRENGTH OF PRESIDENT CRISTIANI TO SEE THIS CASE THROUGH TO THE END."}, {"text": "HE CAUTIONED, HOWEVER, THAT SO FAR NOTHING NEW HAS BEEN SAID AND THAT A LISTING OF THE PEOPLE INVOLVED AND A JUST SENTENCE WOULD BE NEWS."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0054", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 08 JAN {"sentences": [{"text": "IN LIMA TODAY, UNOFFICIAL SOURCES REPORTED THAT AT LEAST 2,500 PEOPLE HAVE BEEN DETAINED BY THE PERUVIAN POLICE IN RAIDS CARRIED OUT IN SEARCH OF HECTOR DELGADO PARKER, A LOCAL TELEVISION IMPRESARIO, AND HIS KIDNAPPERS."}, {"text": "THE POLICE RAIDS BEGAN SHORTLY AFTER THE KIDNAPPING OF DELGADO PARKER, A FORMER ADVISER TO PERUVIAN PRESIDENT ALAN GARCIA AND ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT TELEVISION IMPRESARIO."}, {"text": "DELGADO PARKER WAS KIDNAPPED IN DOWNTOWN LIMA WEDNESDAY (4 OCTOBER) BY A COMMANDO OF THE PRO-CHE GUEVARA GROUP TUPAC AMARU REVOLUTIONARY MOVEMENT (MRTA)."}, {"text": "AS A RESULT OF THE TERRORIST ACTION, DELGADO'S DRIVER WAS KILLED, AND DELGADO'S BODYGUARD WAS SERIOUSLY WOUNDED, WHILE DELGADO HIMSELF WAS VIOLENTLY ABDUCTED BY THE MRTA ACTIVISTS."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE SOURCES, THE RAIDS CARRIED OUT BY THE POLICE, WHO DETAIN PEOPLE WITHOUT IDENTIFICATION PAPERS AND SUSPECTS AFTER CHECKING ON PEDESTRIANS AND VEHICLES, TOOK PLACE ON LIMA'S ACCESS ROADS AS WELL AS IN SOME SUBURBAN AREAS OF THIS CITY AND EVEN IN DOWNTOWN LIMA."}, {"text": "THE PERUVIAN NATIONAL POLICE HAVE REPORTED THAT SOME 2,000 AGENTS OF THE ANTITERRORIST DIRECTORATE (DIRCOTE) AND THE KIDNAPPING DIVISION ARE PARTICIPATING IN THE SEARCH OPERATIONS ORDERED BY PRESIDENT GARCIA."}, {"text": "IN TELEPHONE CALLS TO LIMA MEDIA, THE MRTA HAS CLAIMED RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE KIDPANAPPING OF HECTOR DELGADO PARKER."}, {"text": "TELEVISION "CHANNEL 5," OF WHICH THE KIDNAPPED BUSINESSMAN IS PART OWNER, WAS AMONG THE MEDIA MRTA CALLED."}], {"sentences": [{"text": "DEFENSE MINISTER GENERAL EUGENIO VIDES CASANOVA HAS VISITED LA ALAMEDA ROOSEVELT TO OBSERVE THE VOTING PROCESS."}, {"text": "HE ALSO SAID AN INVESTIGATION WILL BE CONDUCTED INTO THE MURDERS OF THREE REPORTERS, TWO SALVADORANS AND A NETHERLANDER."}, {"text": "THERE WILL ALSO BE AN INVESTIGATION INTO THE WOUNDING OF A SALVADORAN REPORTER AND A CBS REPORTER."}, {"text": "(BEGIN RECORDING) (VIDES) THIS IS THE SAME QUESTION ASKED (WORDS INDISTINCT)."}, {"text": "THE ELECTION PROCESS IS PROCEEDING NORMALLY IN ALL MUNICIPALITIES EXCEPT SEVEN."}, {"text": "CLASHES WERE REPORTED IN TWO MUNICIPALITIES AND THE ELECTIONS WERE SUSPENDED IN TWO OTHERS."}, {"text": "ONE OF THEM IS EL SAUCE, WITH WHICH COMMUNICATIONS HAVE BEEN CUT OFF."}, {"text": "THE OTHER IS SANTA ELENA, WHERE A CLASH OCCURRED."}, {"text": "I THINK PEOPLE WILL VOTE HERE LATER."}, {"text": "NO VOTING IS TAKING PLACE IN FOUR OTHER MUNICIPALITIES."}, {"text": "(REPORTER)"}, {"text": "(QUESTION INDISTINCT) (VIDES) I HAVE NO OTHER INFORMATION."}, {"text": "AT THE TIME I DEPARTED, I SENT FOR REPORTS FROM THE HOSPITAL."}, {"text": "I WAS TOLD HE DIED, BUT WE HAVE TO GATHER MORE DATA ON HOW THE INCIDENT HAPPENED."}, {"text": "(REPORTER)"}, {"text": "(QUESTION INDISTINCT) (VIDES) WE HAVE ALWAYS HELD REPORTERS IN THE HIGHEST REGARD."}, {"text": "ALL ARMED FORCES MEMBERS HAVE BEEN INFORMED OF THIS."}, {"text": "BUT PROBLEMS ARISE WHEN SOME PEOPLE IGNORE CHECKPOINTS AND THE GUARDS TRY TO STOP THEM."}, {"text": "I HEREBY APPEAL TO PEOPLE TO OBEY CHECKPOINTS."}, {"text": "WE ARE THE FIRST TO REGRET THESE INCIDENTS."}, {"text": "WE HAVE VERY GOOD AND CLOSE RELATIONS WITH THE MEDIA AND KNOW (WORDS INDISTINCT)."}, {"text": "(REPORTER) WILL THIS HAVE REPERCUSSIONS?"}, {"text": "(VIDES) SERIOUS REPERCUSSIONS WILL CERTAINLY OCCUR, BUT YOU CAN REST ASSURED THAT WHAT HAPPENED WAS UNINTENTIONAL."}, {"text": "SOME PEOPLE IGNORED THE ORDER TO STOP."}, {"text": "THE PEOPLE SHOULD BE MORE ALERT AND AWARE OF THE SITUATION BECAUSE OF THE REBELS' ATTACKS."}, {"text": "(END RECORDING)"}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0056", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": {"sentences": [{"text": "A. WE HEREBY VOICE OUR WILLINGNESS THAT THERE BE AN IMMEDIATE IN SITU CEASE-FIRE WITH INTERNATIONAL SUPERVISION AND AN OVERALL AND DEFINITIVE SIMULTANEOUS NEGOTIATION LEADING TO A NATIONAL CONSENSUS BASED ON DEMOCRATIZATION, DEMILITARIZATION OF SOCIETY, AND RESPECT FOR THE RIGHTS OF SALVADORANS."}, {"text": "B. IN ORDER TO HOLD GOOD NEGOTIATIONS, WE FEEL IT IS NECESSARY TO ESTABLISH IMMEDIATE GUARANTEES FOR THE RESPECT OF HUMAN RIGHTS, DEMOCRATIC FREEDOMS, AND POLITICAL AND SOCIAL GROUPS THROUGH:"}, {"text": "1. LIFTING OF THE STATE OF SIEGE AND REPEAL OF THE LAW ON REFO THE PENAL CODES, ALSO KNOWN AS THE ANTITERRORIST LAW THAT WAS RECENTLY APPROVED BY THE LEGISLATIVE ASSEMBLY."}, {"text": "2. RELEASE OF ALL POLITICAL PRISONERS."}, {"text": "3. ALLOWED DEPARTURE OF FMLN WAR DISABLED AND MEDICAL TREATMEN FMLN WOUNDED."}, {"text": "4. IMMEDIATE DISMISSAL OF THE FOLLOWING COMMANDERS AND OFFICER COLONEL RENE EMILIO PONCE, CHAIRMAN OF THE JOINTS CHIEFS OF STAFF, FOR HIS RESPONSIBILITY IN DECISIONS MADE BY THE ARMED FORCES HIGH COMMAND TO CARRY OUT INDISCRIMINATE BOMBINGS AGAINST THE CIVILIAN POPULATION AND THE ASSASSINATION OF THE SIX JESUIT PRIESTS; GENERAL RAFAEL BUSTILLOS, GENERAL RAFAEL ANTONIO VILLAMARIONA, AND LIEUTENANT COLONEL JUAN ANTONIO MARTINEZ VARELA, COMMANDER AND EXECUTIVE OFFICERS OF THE AIR FORCE, FOR THEIR DIRECT RESPONSIBILITY IN THE BOMBINGS OF THE CIVILIAN POPULATION; COLONEL ORLANDO ZEPEDA, DEPUTY DEFENSE MINISTER, FOR HAVING SIGNED THE ORDER TO ASSASSINATE THE SIX JESUIT PRIESTS; COLONEL HERIBERTO HERNANDEZ, DIRECTOR OF THE TREASURY POLICE, WHICH IS THE CORPS THAT CARRIED OUT THE MURDERS; AND CAPTAIN ALFONSO CHAVEZ GARCIA, WHO WAS THE DIRECT PERPETRATOR OF THESE MURDERS."}, {"text": "ALL OF THESE DISMISSALS ARE NEEDED FOR THE CREDIBILITY AND EFFECTIVENESS OF THE DECISION TO ESTABLISH GUARANTEES FOR THE RESPECT FOR HUMAN RIGHTS AND AS A FIRST STEP IN THE PURGE OF THE SALVADORAN ARMED FORCES, WHICH IS NECESSARY FOR THE DISMANTLING OF THE BLOODY MILITARY DICTATORSHIP OF THE PAST 60 YEARS."}, {"text": "5. THE IN SITU VERIFICATION OF THE RESPECT FOR HUMAN RIGHTS MUST BE CARRIED OUT BY THE INTER-AMERICAN HUMAN RIGHTS COMMISSION AND THE UN WORK TEAM ON THE FORCED DISAPPEARANCES."}, {"text": "C. WE THINK IT IS INDISPENSABLE TO REORGANIZE THE NEGOTIATING TABLE TO ENSURE THAT OPPOSITION POLITICAL PARTIES AND SOCIAL GROUPS ARE ABLE TO FULLY PARTICIPATE ALONG WITH THE GOVERNMENT AND THE FMLN."}, {"text": "THIS WILL ASSURE A NATIONAL CONSENSUS SOLUTION."}, {"text": "MESSRS PRESIDENTS: THE SCOPE OF WAR IN OUR COUNTRY DEMANDS REALISTIC VIEWPOINTS, VIABLE AND URGENT SOLUTIONS."}, {"text": "YOU CAN CONTRIBUTE SO THAT THE NEGOTIATIONS WILL PREVAIL OVER WAR AND THE CENTRAL AMERICAN PEACE PROCESS WILL YIELD SPECIFIC RESULTS."}, {"text": "WE REITERATE OUR APPRECIATION TO YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS, THE FMLN GENERAL COMMAND, EL SALVADOR, 8 DECEMBER 1989."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0057", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": null, "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", {"sentences": [{"text": "THE POLICE HAVE REPORTED THAT THREE TERRORIST ATTACKS HERE IN BOGOTA AND IN THE CARIBBEAN PORT OF CARTAGENA LEFT TWO DEAD AND THREE INJURED."}, {"text": "THE MOST SERIOUS INCIDENT TOOK PLACE AT THE HISTORICAL BEACH RESORT WHERE A BOMB EXPLODED ON THE 6TH FLOOR OF THE HILTON HOTEL KILLING TWO PEOPLE AND SERIOUSLY INJURING ANOTHER."}, {"text": "ALMOST SIMULTANEOUSLY ANOTHER BOMB EXPLODED IN FRONT OF A BANK IN ANOTHER PART OF CARTAGENA, PARTIALLY DESTROYING THE BUILDING AND INJURING A GUARD AND A PASSERBY."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, IN BOGOTA, A BOMB EXPLODED AT A BRANCH OF THE CITY'S ELECTRIC ENERGY ENTERPRISE IN THE SUBURB OF QUIRIGUA."}, {"text": "THE COMPANY'S OFFICES WERE DESTROYED, AND APPROXIMATELY 50 NEIGHBORING RESIDENCES WERE DAMAGED BY THE BLAST."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO A GUARD AT THE COMPANY, WHO ESCAPED UNHURT, TWO INDIVIDUALS WHO WERE PASSING BY THE BUILDING PLACED THE EXPLOSIVES AND FLED."}, {"text": "THE GUARD SAID HE BARELY HAD TIME TO GET AWAY FROM THE BOMB BEFORE IT WENT OFF."}, {"text": "GUESTS AT THE HOTEL, WHERE PRACTICALLY ALL THE WINDOWS WERE DESTROYED, HAD TO BE EVACUATED TO OTHER LODGINGS."}, {"text": "CARTAGENA HAD UP TO NOW ESCAPED THE WAVE OF DYNAMITE ATTACKS THAT HAVE BEEN TAKING PLACE IN THE COUNTRY'S LARGE CITIES FOR THE PAST SEVERAL WEEKS."}, {"text": "AUTHORITIES ATTRIBUTE THE ATTACKS TO DRUG TRAFFICKERS."}], {"sentences": [{"text": "BOGOTA DID NOT ESCAPE THE TERRORIST ACTIONS OF ORGANIZED CRIMINALS ON FRIDAY NIGHT."}, {"text": "TWO NATIONAL POLICE OFFICERS ASSIGNED TO THE DIJIN DIRECTORATE OF JUDIDIAL POLICE AND INVESTIGATIONS INTELLIGENCE CORPS WERE SHOT TO DEATH AS THEY PASSED BY ON A DIJIN MOTORCYCLE IN FRONT OF A HOME IN WESTERN BOGOTA."}, {"text": "THE CRIMINALS INTERCEPTED SERGEANT CARLOS JULIO BONILLA, WHO WAS DRIVING THE MOTORCYCLE, AND CORPORAL LUIS ALBERTO CHAVEZ, AS THEY ENTERED THE HOME."}, {"text": "BOTH POLICEMEN DIED INSTANTLY."}, {"text": "THE PAID ASSASINS FLED IN A MOTORCYCLE AND IN A VEHICLE THAT AWAITED THEM A FEW METERS AWAY, ACCORDING TO WITNESSES."}, {"text": "AUTHORITIES CARRIED OUT AN INTENSE OPERATION IN THE CITY TO LOCATE THE PERPETRATORS OF THIS LATEST CRIME."}, {"text": "ELSEWHERE, SEVERAL ARMED INDIVIDUALS SHOT REPEATEDLY AT THE NEWSPAPER EL SIGLO'S FACILITIES."}, {"text": "THIS IS A NEW ACT OF HARASSMENT AGAINST THE MEDIA."}, {"text": "EL SIGLO EDITOR HIPOLITO HINCAPIE WAS INTERVIEWED."}, {"text": "(BEGIN RECORDING) (HINCAPIE) THE INCIDENT TOOK PLACE AT 2120."}, {"text": "INDIVIDUALS IN A BLUE RENAULT 12 FIRED SEVERAL TIMES AT THE FACILITIES."}, {"text": "THE FACILITIES ARE AS THEY WERE PRIOR TO 2120, AND THE EMPLOYEES ARE WORKING AS USUAL."}, {"text": "(END RECORDING) THE DAMAGE WAS MINOR AND, FORTUNATELY, THERE WERE NO VICTIMS, THANKS TO THE PROMPT REACTION OF THE MARINES GUARDING THE FACILITIES."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0061", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["16 SEP 89", "15 SEP 89 - 16 SEP 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["COLOMBIA"], "document_mentions": [], "sentence_mentions": {}}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["BOGOTA"], "strings_rhs": ["CITY"], "document_mentions": [[0, 6], [293, 299]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[0, 6]], "1": [[209, 215]]}}], "incident_type": "ATTACK", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["ACCOMPLISHED"]}, "incident_instrument_id": null, "perp_incident_category": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["TERRORIST ACT"]}, "perp_individual_id": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["ARMED INDIVIDUALS", "INDIVIDUALS", "INDIVIDUALS IN A BLUE RENAULT 12"], "document_mentions": [[723, 740], [729, 740], [961, 972], [961, 993]], "sentence_mentions": {"6": [[19, 36], [25, 36]], "10": [[0, 11], [0, 32]]}}], "perp_organization_id": null, "perp_organization_confidence": null, "phys_tgt_id": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["NEWSPAPER EL SIGLO'S FACILITIES"], "document_mentions": [[764, 795]], "sentence_mentions": {"6": [[60, 91]]}}], "phys_tgt_effect_of_incident": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["SOME DAMAGE"], "strings_rhs": ["NEWSPAPER EL SIGLO'S FACILITIES"]}], "hum_tgt_name": [{"optional": true, "type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["HIPOLITO HINCAPIE"], "document_mentions": [[864, 881]], "sentence_mentions": {"8": [[16, 33]]}}], "hum_tgt_description": [{"optional": true, "type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["EL SIGLO EDITOR", "EDITOR"], "strings_rhs": ["HIPOLITO HINCAPIE"]}, {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EMPLOYEES"], "document_mentions": [[1088, 1097]], "sentence_mentions": {"11": [[55, 64]]}}], "hum_tgt_effect_of_incident": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["NO INJURY OR DEATH", "NO DEATH"], "strings_rhs": ["EMPLOYEES"]}, {"optional": true, "type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["NO INJURY OR DEATH", "NO DEATH"], "strings_rhs": ["HIPOLITO HINCAPIE"]}]}, "hit_id": 156}

{"sentences": [{"text": "IT WAS OFFICIALLY REPORTED THAT A POLICEMAN WAS WOUNDED TODAY WHEN URBAN GUERRILLAS ATTACKED THE GUARDS AT A POWER SUBSTATION LOCATED IN DOWNTOWN SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": "SEVERAL URBAN GUERRILLAS OPENED FIRED ON MEMBERS OF THE NATIONAL POLICE WHO WERE GUARDING A LEMPA RIVER HYDROELECTRIC EXECUTIVE COMMISSION (CEL) SUBSTATION THAT WAS DAMAGED DURING THE ATTACK."}, {"text": "THE WOUNDED POLICEMAN WAS IMMEDIATELY TAKEN TO THE MILITARY HOSPITAL IN SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": "THE ATTACK OCCURRED AT 1130 (1730 GMT)--LESS THAN 3 HOURS BEFORE A DEMONSTRATION THROUGH THE MAIN STREETS OF SAN SALVADOR BEGAN."}, {"text": "THE DEMONSTRATORS ATTENDED THE FUNERAL OF THE 10 UNION LEADERS WHO WERE KILLED ON 31 OCTOBER DURING AN ATTACK ON A UNION HEADQUARTERS."}, {"text": {"sentences": [{"text": "IT WAS OFFICIALLY REPORTED THAT A POLICEMAN WAS WOUNDED TODAY WHEN URBAN GUERRILLAS ATTACKED THE GUARDS AT A POWER SUBSTATION LOCATED IN DOWNTOWN SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": "SEVERAL URBAN GUERRILLAS OPENED FIRED ON MEMBERS OF THE NATIONAL POLICE WHO WERE GUARDING A LEMPA RIVER HYDROELECTRIC EXECUTIVE COMMISSION (CEL) SUBSTATION THAT WAS DAMAGED DURING THE ATTACK."}, {"text": "THE WOUNDED POLICEMAN WAS IMMEDIATELY TAKEN TO THE MILITARY HOSPITAL IN SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": "THE ATTACK OCCURRED AT 1130 (1730 GMT)--LESS THAN 3 HOURS BEFORE A DEMONSTRATION THROUGH THE MAIN STREETS OF SAN SALVADOR BEGAN."}, {"text": "THE DEMONSTRATORS ATTENDED THE FUNERAL OF THE 10 UNION LEADERS WHO WERE KILLED ON 31 OCTOBER DURING AN ATTACK ON A UNION HEADQUARTERS."}, {"text": "THE POLICE STEPPED UP SURVEILLANCE THROUGHOUT SAN SALVADOR TO PREVENT NEW ACTS OF VIOLENCE."}, {"text": "ON 1 NOVEMBER URBAN GUERRILLAS ATTACKED THE HEADQUARTERS OF THE 1ST INFANTRY BRIGADE WITH ROCKETS."}, {"text": "DURING THE ATTACK, ONE PERSON WAS KILLED AND ANOTHER WOUNDED."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0063", "message_template": 2, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", {"sentences": [{"text": "COLOMBIAN JUSTICE MINISTER MONICA DE GREIFF BRIEFED PRESIDENT VIRGILIO BARCO TODAY ON HER OFFICIAL VISIT TO THE UNITED STATES TO ASK FOR HELP IN THE FIGHT AGAINST DRUG TRAFFICKING."}, {"text": "THE 32-YEAR-OLD COLOMBIAN MINISTER RETURNED LAST NIGHT ABOARD A COMMERCIAL FLIGHT FROM WASHINGTON, WHERE SHE HAD TRAVELED ON 25 AUGUST WITH HER FAMILY AMID STRONG RUMORS THAT SHE WOULD NOT RETURN TO COLOMBIA AND THAT SHE WOULD RESIGN FROM THE POST SHE HAS HELD SINCE 16 JULY."}, {"text": "JUSTICE MINISTRY SOURCES SAID TODAY THAT DE GREIFF "IS MAINTAINING HER HEAVY AGENDA" AND ADDED THAT "NOTHING HAS BEEN SAID ABOUT HER LEAVING THE COUNTRY SOON.""}, {"text": "THE RUMORS ABOUT HER IMMINENT RESIGNATION BECAUSE OF THE THREATS AGAINST HER AND HER FAMILY, INCLUDING HER 3-YEAR-OLD SON, MIGUEL JOSE, HAVE STOPPED WITH HER RETURN TO BOGOTA."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO OFFICIAL SOURCES, MONICA DE GREIFF'S VISIT TO WASHINGTON WAS TO EXPLAIN "THE DIFFICULT SITUATION IN WHICH THE COLOMBIAN JUDICIAL BRANCH CARRIES OUT ITS DANGEROUS JOB.""}, {"text": "PART OF THE $65 MILLION IN AID THE UNITED STATES HAS PROMISED TO COLOMBIA TO FIGHT DRUG TRAFFICKING HAS ALREADY ARRIVED IN THE COUNTRY."}, {"text": "IT INCLUDES BULLETPROOF VESTS, ARMORED AUTOMOBILES, AND COMMUNICATION EQUIPMENT FOR JUDGES AND OFFICIALS OF THE JUDICIAL BRANCH."}, {"text": "THE COLOMBIAN JUSTICE MINISTER, WHO STUDIED LAW AT BOGOTA'S UNIVERSITY OF EL ROSARIO AND IN THE UNITED STATES, WILL MEET WITH THE PRESS TOMORROW AFTER HAVING PRESENTED HER REPORT ON HER TRIP."}, {"text": "SO FAR THIS YEAR THREE JUDGES WHO WERE IN CHARGE OF CASES AGAINST DRUG TRAFFICKERS HAVE BEEN KILLED."}, {"text": "IN THIS DECADE, 200 PEOPLE, INCLUDING JUDGES AND ATTORNEYS, HAVE BEEN KILLED BY DRUG TRAFFICKERS."}], {"sentences": [{"text": "SALVADORAN PRESIDENT JOSE NAPOLEON DUARTE TONIGHT CALLED FOR SPAIN, MEXICO, VENEZUELA, AND NICARAGUA TO MEDIATE WITH THE SALVADORAN REBELS SO THEY WILL NOT BOYCOTT THE 19 MARCH PRESIDENTIAL ELECTIONS."}, {"text": ""THERE CAN BE NO PEACE WITHOUT DEMOCRACY, AND VOTING IS THE PATH TO DEMOCRACY," DUARTE SAID IN A SPEECH TRANSMITTED BY A NATIONWIDE RADIO NETWORK."}, {"text": "IN THIS SPEECH, HE URGED THE GUERRILLAS TO LAY DOWN THEIR WEAPONS AND JOIN THE SALVADORAN POLITICAL PROCESS."}, {"text": "DUARTE ISSUED THIS CALL TO THE GOVERNMENTS OF THESE FOUR COUNTRIES AND TO POPE JOHN PAUL II TO INTERCEDE WITH THE FMLN IN SUPPORT OF THE ELECTIONS."}, {"text": "IN THE PAST FEW DAYS, THE REBELS HAVE CALLED FOR A TRANSPORTATION STOPPAGE TO BEGIN ON 16 MARCH, HAVE ORDERED GAS STATION OWNERS TO REFRAIN FROM SELLING FUEL, HAVE ANNOUNCED THAT THEY WILL DESTROY POWER LINES, AND THREATENED TO KILL ELECTION OFFICIALS."}, {"text": "ON SUNDAY, 19 MARCH, 1.8 MILLION SALVADORANS WILL CAST THEIR VOTE TO ELECT THE MAN WHO WILL REPLACE DUARTE."}, {"text": "THE SALVADORAN PRESIDENT CALLED ON THE PEOPLE TO VOTE AND SAID THE GOVERNMENT AND THE ARMY "WILL GUARANTEE THE SAFETY OF THE ELECTIONS.""}, {"text": "FOLLOWING THE FAILURE OF THE NEGOTIATIONS, DURING WHICH THE REBELS PROPOSED THE POSTPONEMENT OF THE ELECTIONS AND THE CREATION OF "A NEW ELECTORAL FRAMEWORK," THE FMLN HAS ASKED THE PEOPLE NOT TO VOTE OR TO "VOID" THEIR BALLOTS."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0067", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": {"sentences": [{"text": "FIRE DEPARTMENT SOURCES REPORTED TODAY THAT GUATEMALAN ARMY TROOPS KILLED NINE PEASANTS BY MISTAKE ON 17 AUGUST."}, {"text": "THE SOLDIERS MISTOOK THE PEASANTS, WHO WERE CIVIL SELF-DEFENSE PATROL (PAC) MEMBERS, WITH A REBEL COLUMN."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE SAME SOURCE, MILITARY OFFICIALS HAVE STATED THAT THE INCIDENT, WHERE THREE PEASANTS WERE ALSO WOUNDED, HAD BEEN A "TRAGIC MISTAKE.""}, {"text": "THE INCIDENT TOOK PLACE WHEN NORTHEASTERN COBAN BASE TROOPS MISTOOK THE CIVILIAN PATROL FOR A REBEL COLUMN AND ATTACKED IT."}, {"text": "THE ATTACK RESULTED IN 9 INDIAN PEASANTS KILLED AND 3 WOUNDED, INCLUDING A 17-YEAR-OLD."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE INFORMATION SUPPLIED BY THE COBAN FIRE DEPARTMENT, THE INCIDENT TOOK PLACE WHEN A PAC PATROL WAS COMBING THE AREA FOR A REBEL COLUMN THAT HAD BEEN SEEN IN "LA PROVIDENCIA" FARMING COMMUNITY AREA."}, {"text": "THE CIVILIAN PATROL WAS RETURNING TO ITS COMMUNITY ON 17 AUGUST, WHEN THE ARMY TROOPS, WHO WERE ALSO SEARCHING FOR THE REBEL COLUMN, FIRED AT THEM BELIEVING THEY WERE PART OF A REBEL GROUP."}, {"text": "THE CIVILIAN PATROL UNIT, APPROXIMATELY 70 PERSONS, DID NOT FIRE BACK AT THE SOLDIERS."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE ACCOUNT GIVEN BY ONE OF THE SURVIVORS, THE CIVILIANS SHOUTED AND MADE SIGNS TO THE TROOPS UNTIL, FINALLY, THE SOLDIERS REALIZED THEIR ERROR."}, {"text": "THE SOLDIERS, HOWEVER, REALIZED THEIR MISTAKE ONLY AFTER NINE CIVILIANS HAD BEEN KILLED."}, {"text": "GUATEMALAN DEFENSE MINISTER GENERAL HECTOR ALEJANDRO GRAMAJO WAS QUERIED ABOUT THE INCIDENT."}, {"text": "HE SAID IT WAS CAUSED BY "REGRETTABLE CONFUSION" AND THAT AN ARMY COMMAND STAFF COMMISSION HAD ALREADY BEEN SENT TO INVESTIGATE IT."}, {"text": "GRAMAJO SAID THE COMMISSION IS TO ESTABLISH HOW THE INCIDENT OCCURRED, BUT ADMITTED THAT INITIAL REPORTS INDICATE THAT THERE HAD BEEN CONFUSION BETWEEN ARMY AND PAC UNITS."}, {"text": "THE MILITARY CHIEF SAID: "THE INFORMATION WE HAVE UP TO NOW IS CONFUSING AS BOTH THE ARMY AND PAC HAD MOVED MEN BECAUSE THERE WERE REPORTS THAT A REBEL UNIT WAS IN THE AREA.""}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0068", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": {"sentences": [{"text": "MEDELLIN CONTINUES TO LIVE THROUGH A WAVE OF TERROR."}, {"text": "FOLLOWING LAST NIGHT'S ATTACK ON A BANK, WHICH CAUSED A LOT OF DAMAGE, A LOAD OF DYNAMITE WAS HURLED AGAINST A POLICE STATION."}, {"text": "FORTUNATELY NO ONE WAS HURT."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, AT APPROXIMATELY 1700 TODAY A BOMB EXPLODED INSIDE A FAST-FOOD RESTAURANT."}, {"text": "A MEDIUM-SIZED BOMB EXPLODED SHORTLY BEFORE 1700 AT THE PRESTO INSTALLATIONS LOCATED ON (WORDS INDISTINCT) AND PLAYA AVENUE."}, {"text": "APPROXIMATELY 35 PEOPLE WERE INSIDE THE RESTAURANT AT THE TIME."}, {"text": "A WORKER NOTICED A SUSPICIOUS PACKAGE UNDER A TABLE WHERE MINUTES BEFORE TWO MEN HAD BEEN SEATED."}, {"text": "AFTER AN INITIAL MINOR EXPLOSION, THE PACKAGE EXPLODED."}, {"text": "THE 35 PEOPLE HAD ALREADY BEEN EVACUATED FROM THE BUILDING, AND ONLY 1 POLICEMAN WAS SLIGHTLY INJURED; HE WAS THROWN TO THE GROUND BY THE SHOCK WAVE."}, {"text": "THE AREA WAS IMMEDIATELY CORDONED OFF BY AUTHORITIES WHILE THE OTHER BUSINESSES CLOSED THEIR DOORS."}, {"text": "IT IS NOT KNOWN HOW MUCH DAMAGE WAS CAUSED; HOWEVER, MOST OF THE DAMAGE WAS OCCURRED INSIDE THE RESTAURANT."}, {"text": "THE MEN WHO LEFT THE BOMB FLED AND THERE ARE NO CLUES AS TO THEIR WHEREABOUTS."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0069", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["06 SEP 89", "06 SEP 89 - 07 SEP 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["COLOMBIA"], "document_mentions": [], "sentence_mentions": {}}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["MEDELLIN"], "strings_rhs": ["CITY"], "document_mentions": [[0, 8]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[0, 8]]}}], "incident_type": "ATTACK", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["ACCOMPLISHED"]}, "incident_instrument_id": null, "perp_incident_category": {"optional": true, "type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["TERRORIST ACT"]}, "perp_individual_id": null, "perp_organization_id": null, "perp_organization_confidence": null, "phys_tgt_id": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["BANK"], "document_mentions": [[88, 92]], "sentence_mentions": {"1": [[35, 39]]}}], "phys_tgt_effect_of_incident": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["SOME DAMAGE"], "strings_rhs": ["BANK"]}], "hum_tgt_name": null, "hum_tgt_description": null, "hum_tgt_effect_of_incident": null}, "hit_id": 164}

{"sentences": [{"text": "TODAY, RELIEF ORGANIZATIONS EVACUATED DOZENS OF PEOPLE WHO WERE LOCKED INSIDE "LA CENTROAMERICANA" BUILDING IN SAN SALVADOR WHERE THE COSTA RICAN EMBASSY IS LOCATED."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, THE EMBASSY CONTINUES TO BE OCCUPIED BY APPROXIMATELY 50 DEMONSTRATORS."}, {"text": "AMBASSADOR JESUS FERNANDEZ AND ANOTHER TWO DIPLOMATS, AS WELL AS THREE SALVADORAN TELEVISION JOURNALISTS, ARE STILL BEING HELD HOSTAGE."}, {"text": "APPROXIMATELY 50 PEOPLE LEFT THE BUILDING IN WHICH THEY WERE LOCKED FOR 5 HOURS FOLLOWING THE OCCUPATION OF THE EMBASSY BY MEMBERS AND SYMPATHIZERS OF THE MSGR OSCAR ARNULFO ROMERO FEDERATION OF COMMITTEES OF MOTHERS AND RELATIVES (FECMAFAM) OF POLITICAL PRISONERS AND MURDERED AND MISSING PEOPLE."}, {"text": "THE AMBASSADOR AND OTHER EMBASSY OFFICIALS STILL REMAIN ON THE THIRD FLOOR OF THE BUILDING, WHICH WAS SURROUNDED BY DOZENS OF RIOT POLICEMEN EXPERT IN ANTITERRORIST STRUGGLE, ARMED WITH HIGH-CALIBER RIFLES."}, {"text": "RED CROSS, GREEN CROSS, AND RELIEF COMMAND MEMBERS PARTICIPATED IN THE EVACUATION OF THE OFFICES IN THE BUILDING."}, {"text": "COLONEL ALEJANDRO SANCHEZ, DEPUTY DIRECTOR OF THE SALVADORAN NATIONAL POLICE, SAID THAT "THE PROBLEM COULD BE SOLVED WITHIN THE NEXT 24 HOURS, BUT OFFICIAL SOURCES RULED OUT THE USE OF FORCE."}, {"text": "MAURICIO SANDOVAL, DIRECTOR OF THE PRESIDENCY'S COMMUNICATIONS SECRETARIAT, WENT TO "LA CENTROAMERICANA" BUILDING, LOCATED IN EL SALVADOR'S BUSINESS DISTRICT, TO LEARN ABOUT THE SITUATION AND DESCRIBED THE OCCUPATION AS A "PROPAGANDA ACT" IN VIEW OF THE FACT THAT THE SECOND ROUND OF TALKS BETWEEN THE SALVADORAN GOVERNMENT AND THE GUERRILLAS, SCHEDULED FOR 16 AND 17 OCTOBER IN SAN JOSE (COSTA RICA), IS DRAWING CLOSER."}, {"text": "THE FECMAFAM OCCUPIED THE COSTA RICAN EMBASSY TO PROTEST "AN INCREASE IN REPRESSION AGAINST POPULAR ORGANIZATIONS UNLEASHED BY ALFREDO CRISTIANI'S FASCIST GOVERNMENT," FECMAFAM SPOKESMEN SAID."}, {"text": "MOST OF THOSE OCCUPYING THE EMBASSY ARE WOMEN WEARING WHITE SCARFS AND YOUTHS CARRYING WET HANDKERCHIEFS TO AVOID THE EFFECTS OF TEAR GAS."}, {"text": "SANDOVAL DISCLOSED THAT A WORKING COMMISSION HAS BEEN FORMED TO MAINTAIN CONSULTATIONS WITH THE COSTA RICAN GOVERNMENT "AND IS MAKING PERTINENT CONTACTS" TO SEEK A QUICK SOLUTION TO THIS PROBLEM."}, {"text": "THE OFFICIAL STRESSED: "WE WILL NOT BEGIN NEGOTIATIONS" WITH THE EMBASSY OCCUPIERS, WHOM, ACCORDING TO THE AMBASSADOR, ARE ARMED."}, {"text": "THE PRESIDENTIAL SPOKESMAN ALSO REPORTED THAT, IN THE WAKE OF THESE INCIDENTS, FERNANDEZ HAD A SLIGHT CARDIAC PROBLEM, BUT HAS ALREADY GOTTEN OVER IT."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THIS OFFICIAL, FERNANDEZ' WIFE SENT HIM MEDICINE AND FOOD."}, {"text": "SANDOVAL ANNOUNCED THAT AN OFFICIAL COMMUNIQUE WILL BE ISSUED WITHIN THE NEXT FEW HOURS."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0070", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["05 OCT 89", "04 OCT 89 - 05 {"sentences": [{"text": "HONDURAN PRESIDENT JOSE AZCONA HOYO TODAY SAID THAT THE SITUATION IN EL SALVADOR HAS REACHED "ABOMINABLE AND HORRENDOUS" EXTREMES."}, {"text": "THE PRESIDENT CITED THE KILLING OF THE JESUIT PRIESTS IN SAN SALVADOR ON 16 NOVEMBER AS PROOF OF "THE INCREDIBLE LEVELS OF VIOLENCE REACHED IN THE NEIGHBORING COUNTRY.""}, {"text": "AZCONA SAID THAT HE IS BEING KEPT INFORMED ABOUT THE DEVELOPMENTS IN EL SALVADOR, EVEN SPEAKING WITH HIS COUNTERPART, ALFREDO CRISTIANI, BUT DID NOT VOLUNTEER ANY DETAILS ABOUT THE MATTERS DISCUSSED."}, {"text": "VARIOUS HONDURAN POLITICAL, SOCIAL, AND RELIGIOUS ORGANIZATIONS HAVE EXPRESSED VIEWS SIMILAR TO THOSE VOICED BY THE PRESIDENT OF HONDURAS, A COUNTRY THAT SHARES A 417-KM BORDER WITH EL SALVADOR."}, {"text": "IN A STATEMENT RELEASED TODAY, THE HONDURAN EPISCOPAL CONFERENCE "DEPLORED THE SAD INCIDENTS THAT RESULTED IN THE COLD-BLOODED MURDER OF SIX JESUITS.""}, {"text": "THE HONDURAN BISHOPS STRESSED THAT "THE FRATRICIDAL STRUGGLE IS A BITTER RESULT OF THE INJUSTICE THAT THE SALVADORAN PEOPLE HAVE BEEN SUFFERING.""}, {"text": "IN SIMILAR TERMS, THE CHRISTIAN DEMOCRATIC PARTY AND THE SOCIAL DEMOCRATIC INNOVATION AND UNITY PARTY, AGREED THAT VIOLENCE IN EL SALVADOR FINDS ITS ROOTS IN THOSE WHO DO NOT UNDERSTAND ACTIONS IN FAVOR OF THE OPPRESSED AND THE PEOPLE'S TRUE LIBERATION."}, {"text": "THE HONDURAN ARMED FORCES HAVE BEEN CLOSELY FOLLOWING THE SALVADORAN MILITARY SITUATION, AND THEY ALSO CONDEMNED THE FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT (FMLN)."}, {"text": "RANKING OFFICERS, INCLUDING NEW MILITARY COMMANDER COLONEL ARNULFO CANTARERO, MAINTAINED THAT EL SALVADOR IS A VICTIM OF "COMMUNIST AGGRESSION.""}, {"text": "HOWEVER, THE MILITARY OFFICERS SAY THAT THEY WILL REMAIN OUTSIDE THE SALVADORAN CONFLICT, WHICH INCREASED WHEN THE INSURGENTS BEGAN A GENERAL OFFENSIVE A WEEK AGO."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0071", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["16 NOV 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], "document_mentions": [[69, 80], [369, 380], [682, 693], [1119, 1130], [1507, 1518]], {"sentences": [{"text": "MSGR GREGORIO ROSA CHAVEZ, AUXILIARY BISHOP OF SAN SALVADOR, SAID TODAY THAT PRESIDENT ALFREDO CRISTIANI'S MESSAGE REVEALING THE NAMES OF THE PERSONS REPORTEDLY INVOLVED IN THE SIX JESUITS' SLAYING REPRESENTS "A DECISIVE TURN TOWARD THE END OF IMPUNITY" IN THE COUNTRY."}, {"text": "ROSA CHAVEZ SAID IN HIS SUNDAY HOMILY THAT "THIS HAS AUGMENTED THE POSSIBILITIES FOR THE SALVADORAN PEOPLE TO RECOVER THEIR TRUST IN THE GOVERNMENT'S INSTITUTIONS.""}, {"text": "NEVERTHELESS, IN A STATEMENT GIVEN LATER TO THE MEDIA, THE AUXILIARY BISHOP EMPHASIZED THAT THE IMPLICATED MILITARY "DO NOT REPRESENT ISOLATED CASES OF PERSONS WHO VIOLATED THE NORMS OF AN INSTITUTION, BUT ARE ACTUALLY PART OF A FORMATION AND THOUGHT SCHEME ACCORDING TO WHICH THE DEFENSE OF HUMAN RIGHTS IS SOMETHING SUBVERSIVE.""}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO ROSA CHAVEZ, "THE MILITARY WORLD WRONGLY UNDERSTANDS THE CHURCH'S MISSION IN THE DEFENSE OF HUMAN RIGHTS.""}, {"text": ""ASKED ABOUT EVENTUAL RESPONSIBILITIES NOT SPECIFIED BY THE PRESIDENT, ROSA CHAVEZ ANSWERED: "THIS GRAVE ACTION IS THE RESULT OF A CONSPIRACY--AT LEAST A CONSPIRACY OF SILENCE.""}, {"text": "HE EMPHASIZED THAT, CONSEQUENTLY, THE STEP TAKEN YESTERDAY BY THE SALVADORAN PRESIDENT "IS VERY IMPORTANT, EVEN IF IT IS NOT THE LAST ONE.""}, {"text": "THE BISHOP RECALLED THAT THIS YEAR IS THE 10TH ANNIVERSARY OF MSGR OSCAR ARNULFO ROMERO'S ASSASSINATION, "WHICH HAS YET TO BE SOLVED," AND ASKED THE GOVERNMENT TO CARRY OUT "ALL THE LEGAL ACTIONS TO INVESTIGATE THE CASES OF THOUSANDS AND THOUSANDS OF SALVADORANS WHOSE LIVES WERE TAKEN BY GUERRILLA GROUPS OR THE ARMY.""}, {"text": "ROSA CHAVEZ SAID THAT THE CHURCH FULLY AGREES THAT THE CRIMES OF THE FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT (FMLN) SHOULD BE INVESTIGATED "WITH THE SAME ZEAL" WITH WHICH THE JESUIT PRIESTS' SLAYING HAS BEEN INVESTIGATED."}, {"text": ""HOWEVER, WE HAVE ASKED THAT THE INVESTIGATION BE EXHAUSTIVELY AND THOROUGHLY CARRIED OUT WITHOUT GIVING IT A PROPAGANDISTIC APPEARANCE," HE ADDED."}, {"text": "THE BISHOP EMPHASIZED THAT THE TWO IDEOLOGIES CONFRONTING EACH OTHER IN EL SALVADOR EQUALLY DISDAIN HUMAN RIGHTS."}, {"text": ""MARXISM IS THE ROOT OF THE FMLN'S ABUSE AND THE NATIONAL SECURITY DOCTRINE REPRESENTS THE BASIS OF THE ARMED FORCES' UNACCEPTABLE REPRESSION," HE SAID."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0073", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 14 JAN 90"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], {"sentences": [{"text": "THE MAIN REASON FOR COMING UP WITH THIS VERSION WAS TO (WORDS INDISTINCT) MASTERMINDS OF THE CRIME (WORDS INDISTINCT) TO FIND OUT WHO THE PERPETRATORS WERE."}, {"text": "WITH THIS VERSION, CRISTIANI AND THE HIGH COMMAND ARE TRYING TO COME UP WITH EXTENUATING CIRCUMSTANCES FOR THE TRIAL AND TO PLACE THE RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE ASSASSINATION OF THE JESUITS ON MID-LEVEL MILITARY OFFICERS."}, {"text": "THE COLONELS WHO WERE INVOLVED IN THE CRIME COULD BE SET FREE AND THEIR RESPONSIBILITY WOULD ONLY BE RELATED TO THE FACT THAT THE CRIME WAS COMMITTED WITHIN AN AREA UNDER THEIR COMMAND."}, {"text": "THIS VERSION OF THE CRIME IS AIMED AT LEAVING THE ARMED FORCES HIGH COMMAND FREE FROM ANY RESPONSIBILITY AND TO ONLY SLIGHTLY TOUCH THE MEMBERS OF LA TANDONA, ESPECIALLY COL ORLANDO CEPEDA, WHO WAS THE ONE WHO SIGNED THE ORDER TO ASSASSINATE THE JESUITS, AND COL RENE EMILIO PONCE, CHIEF OF STAFF."}, {"text": "COL GUILLERMO BENAVIDES, WHO IS A MEMBER OF LITTLE IMPORTANCE WITHIN LA TANDONA, WAS INDIRECTLY INVOLVED IN THE CRIME."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, THE (WORD INDISTINCT) IS SELF-EVIDENT."}, {"text": "THE DECISION TO CARRY OUT AN OPERATION TO KILL POPULAR AND RELIGIOUS DEMOCRATIC LEADERS WAS MADE BY THE GENERAL STAFF OF THE ARMED FORCES (WORDS INDISTINCT) 4 DAYS AFTER THE FMLN OFFENSIVE BEGAN."}, {"text": "THIS OPERATION WAS PART OF A COMPLETE COUNTEROFFENSIVE PLAN OF THE ARMED FORCES, WHICH INCLUDED THE MASSIVE USE OF ALL THE FIREPOWER OF THE AIR FORCE AGAINST POOR NEIGHBORHOODS AND THE KILLING OF DEMOCRATIC PEOPLE'S MOVEMENT AND CHURCH LEADERS."}, {"text": "ALFREDO CRISTIANI, WHO WAS TAKEN TO THE HEADQUARTERS OF THE GENERAL STAFF FOR SECURITY REASONS AND ASSUMED CONTROL OF THE DEFENSE PLAN, WAS FULLY AWARE OF THE GENOCIDE PLAN."}, {"text": "U.S. OFFICERS AND ADVISERS WERE ALSO AT THE GENERAL STAFF HEADQUARTERS AT THE TIME TO DISCUSS AND APPROVE THIS GENOCIDE PLAN."}, {"text": "THE PLAN WAS IMPLEMENTED ON THE EVENING OF 16 NOVEMBER."}, {"text": "ALL LABOR UNION OFFICES IN SAN SALVADOR WERE LOOTED."}, {"text": "THE OFFICES OF HUMANITARIAN ORGANIZATIONS, POLITICAL PARTIES, AND RELIGIOUS CENTERS WERE ALSO LOOTED."}, {"text": "THE PLAN WAS IMPLEMENTED AT THE INSTALLATIONS OF THE UCA."}, {"text": "THE DAYS THAT FOLLOWED SAW A CONTINUATION OF THE ARRESTS, PERSECUTIONS, AND ASSASSINATIONS."}, {"text": "THE OFFICES OF ALL THE (WORDS INDISTINCT) WERE ATTACKED."}, {"text": "ITS LEADERS WERE FORCED TO SEEK REFUGE OR TO LEAVE THE COUNTRY TO ESCAPE THIS MANHUNT."}, {"text": "THIS IS A POLICY FOR WHICH THE HIGH COMMAND AND ALFREDO CRISTIANI ARE DIRECTLY RESPONSIBLE."}, {"text": "(WORDS INDISTINCT) THE U.S. AMBASSADOR AND U.S. EMBASSY PERSONNEL ARE FULLY AWARE OF THIS."}, {"text": "THE NEED TO COME UP WITH THIS VERSION COMES FROM THE PRECARIOUS PREDICAMENT THAT THE GOVERNMENT AND THE ARMED FORCES HAVE FOUND THEMSELVES IN IN VIEW OF THE DEBATES TAKING PLACE IN THE U.S. CONGRESS TO DECIDE THE FATE OF AID TO EL SALVADOR, WHICH IS LINKED TO THE RESULTS OF THE INVESTIGATION OF THE ASSASSINATION OF THE JESUIT PRIESTS ON 16 NOVEMBER."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0074", "message_template": 1, {"sentences": [{"text": "OFFICIAL SOURCES ANNOUNCED THAT A U.S. STATE DEPARTMENT HERCULES C-123 CARGO PLANE WAS PARTIALLY DESTROYED EARLY THIS MORNING WHEN AN INCENDIARY BOMB EXPLODED AT THE MONTERIA AIRPORT."}, {"text": "MONTERIA IS THE CAPITAL OF CORDOBA DEPARTMENT AND IT IS LOCATED 490 KM NORTH OF BOGOTA."}, {"text": "A SPOKESMAN FOR THE MONTERIA POLICE ADVISED AFP VIA TELEPHONE THAT THE FRONT PART OF THE PLANE, AS WELL AS THE COCKPIT, WERE BURNED WHEN A BOMB, PLANTED BY UNIDENTIFIED PERSONS, EXPLODED."}, {"text": "NO VICTIMS WERE REPORTED."}, {"text": "THE U.S. EMBASSY IN BOGOTA CONFIRMED THAT THE PLANE WAS "SERIOUSLY DAMAGED" BY THE FLAMES; HOWEVER, THE EMBASSY DID NOT SPECIFY THE ORIGIN OF THE FIRE."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO EMBASSY SPOKESMAN PETER SAMSON, THE PLANE IS THE PROPERTY OF THE U.S. STATE DEPARTMENT'S INTERNATIONAL NARCOTICS MATTERS (INM)."}, {"text": "THE PLANE, WHICH WAS RETURNING TO THE UNITED STATES AFTER FULFILLING A MISSION IN PERU, HAD BEEN PARKED AT THE MONTERIA AIRPORT FOR THE PAST 2 WEEKS."}, {"text": "THE PLANE WAS FORCED TO LAND IN MONTERIA AFTER ONE OF ITS ENGINES FAILED, THE EMBASSY SPOKESMAN ADDED."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THE MONTERIA POLICE, THE FIRE BROKE OUT AFTER AN EXPLOSION WAS HEARD."}, {"text": "THE FIREMEN INTERVENED QUICKLY TO PREVENT THE FIRE FROM SPREADING AND COMPLETELY DESTROYING THE PLANE."}, {"text": "THE FIRE BROKE OUT AT 0430 (0930 GMT), A FEW HOURS BEFORE TWO C-130 PLANES--U.S. MILITARY CARGO PLANES--ARRIVED AT BOGOTA AIR FORCE BASE WITH MILITARY MATERIEL SENT TO HELP FIGHT THE BATTLE AGAINST DRUG TRAFFICKING LAUNCHED BY THE COLOMBIAN AUTHORITIES."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0076", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["03 SEP 89"]}], {"sentences": [{"text": "IN A COMMUNIQUE ADDRESSED TO THE LOCAL MEDIA, THE PERUVIAN GUERRILLA MOVEMENT TUPAC AMARU REVOLUTIONARY MOVEMENT (MRTA) TODAY CLAIMED RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE KIDNAPPING OF 102 PEOPLE."}, {"text": "AMONG THE MANY BUSINESSMEN WHO HAVE BEEN KIDNAPED FROM DIFFERENT INDUSTRIAL AND BUSINESS SECTORS IS CARLOS ENRIQUE FERREYROS, ALIAS "THE KIND OF THE MACHINERY INDUSTRY.""}, {"text": "FERREYROS WAS KIDNAPED ON 2 DECEMBER."}, {"text": "THE MRTA IS ASKING $10 MILLION RANSOM FOR FERREYROS' RELEASE."}, {"text": "THIS IS THE LARGEST RANSOM THE MRTA HAS EVER REQUESTED."}, {"text": "(PASSAGE OMITTED)"}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0077", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 01 FEB 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["PERU"], "document_mentions": [[50, 54]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[50, 54]]}}], "incident_type": "KIDNAPPING", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["ACCOMPLISHED"]}, "perp_incident_category": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["TERRORIST ACT"]}, "perp_individual_id": null, "perp_organization_id": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["TUPAC AMARU REVOLUTIONARY MOVEMENT", "MRTA"], "document_mentions": [[78, 112], [114, 118], [395, 399], [484, 488]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[78, 112], [114, 118]], "3": [[4, 8]], "4": [[31, 35]]}}], "perp_organization_confidence": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["CLAIMED OR ADMITTED"], "strings_rhs": ["TUPAC AMARU REVOLUTIONARY MOVEMENT", "MRTA"]}], "hum_tgt_name": null, "hum_tgt_description": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["PEOPLE"], "document_mentions": [[175, 181]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[175, 181]]}}], "hum_tgt_effect_of_incident": null}, "hit_id": 173}

{"sentences": [{"text": "ATTENTION: A REPORT FROM SAN SALVADOR STATES THAT FIGHTING CONTINUES IN THE NORTHERN SECTOR OF THE CITY."}, {"text": "OUR FORCES ARE FINDING LITTLE RESISTANCE FROM THE SO-CALLED TROOPS BROUGHT FROM THE INTERIOR OF THE COUNTRY."}, {"text": "THE REPORT STATES THAT DURING TODAY'S CLASHES IN CIUDAD DELGADO, LOS ALPES, GUADALUPE, AND SAN PATRICIO NEIGHBORHOODS, THE TREASURY POLICE SUFFERED THREE CASUALTIES."}, {"text": "WE INFLICTED TWO CASUALTIES ON THE TREASURY POLICE IN LOS ALPES NEIGHBORHOOD, AND THE 6TH MILITARY DETACHMENT SUFFERED ONE CASUALTY DURING A CLASH IN SAN PATRICIO NEIGHBORHOOD."}, {"text": "IT HAS ALSO BEEN REPORTED THAT FMLN (FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT) FORCES HAVE SET UP BARRICADES ON THE NORTHERN TRUNK ROAD AND POWER LINES HAVE BEEN SABOTAGED."}, {"text": "AS A RESULT OF THIS SABOTAGE, AN AREA OF SAN SALVADOR DOES NOT HAVE POWER."}, {"text": "WE HAVE ALSO LEARNED THAT TWO TRANSFORMERS WERE DESTROYED ON KM 10 OF THE NORTHERN TRUNK ROAD, WHERE BARRICADES WERE ALSO SET UP."}, {"text": "THE REPORT ADDS THAT THE ENEMY SHOWED UP 90 MINUTES AFTER THE BARRICADES HAD BEEN SET UP AND HEAVY FIGHTING RESULTED."}, {"text": "THE ENEMY TROOPS SUFFERED FOUR CASUALTIES; OUR FORCES HAVE REPORTED THAT THEY HAVE NOT ENCOUNTERED PROBLEMS ON THE NORTHERN TRUNK ROAD."}, {"text": "AT THIS HOUR, 1613 (2213 GMT), THE REBEL PRESENCE IN INCREASING ON THE NORTHERN TRUNK ROAD."}, {"text": "ATTENTION: DURING YESTERDAY'S ATTACK, WITH PEOPLE'S ARTILLERY ON 4TH INFANTRY BRIGADE TROOPS, WE INFLICTED EIGHT CASUALTIES."}, {"text": "THESE EIGHT CASUALTIES HAVE BEEN CONFIRMED."}, {"text": "AT NOON TODAY, CLASHES WITH 1ST MILITARY DETACHMENT TROOPS WAS REPORTED IN LA CRUZ HILL, SAN MIGUEL DE MERCEDES JURISDICTION."}, {"text": "WE REPEAT: TODAY AT NOON, FIGHTING WAS REPORTED IN LA CRUZ HILL, SAN MIGUEL DE MERCEDES, CHALATENANGO DEPARTMENT."}, {"text": "THIS HAS BEEN THE LATEST REPORT WE HAVE RECEIVED."}, {"text": "THERE IS FIGHTING IN CIUDAD DELGADO, LOS ALPES, GUADALUPE, SAN PATRICIO, AND OUR GUERRILLA COLUMNS ARE SPREADING THROUGHOUT THE NORTHERN PART OF THE CITY."}, {"text": "IT IS NOW 1615 (2215 GMT) AND THE HIGH COMMAND HAS NOT REACTED."}, {"text": "THIS GIVES US AN IDEA OF HOW LOW MORALE IS AMONG THE SOLDIERS IN SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": "THIS NEW BLOW AGAINST THE ENEMY FORCES IN SAN SALVADOR HAS CAUSED THE MORALE OF THE ENEMY FORCES TO DROP EVEN FURTHER."}, {"text": "ATTENTION: WE HAVE JUST LEARNED THAT THERE HAS BEEN A REBEL AMBUSH IN THE NORTHERN SECTOR OF SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": "THE REPORT ADDS THAT AT 0630 (1230 GMT) TODAY, REBEL FORCES AMBUSHED A VEHICLE TRANSPORTING NATIONAL GUARDSMEN."}, {"text": "THE AMBUSH OCCURRED ON KM 9.5 ON THE NORTHERN TRUNK ROAD."}, {"text": "THE GUARDSMEN WERE HEADING INTO AN AREA WHERE THE FMLN REBELS HAVE SET UP BARRICADES."}, {"text": "A POWERFUL GUAZAPA-TYPE MINE AND RIFLES WERE USED IN THE AMBUSH."}, {"text": "AT LEAST 10 CASUALTIES, INCLUDING A NATIONAL GUARD OFFICER, WERE INFLICTED."}, {"text": "WE REPEAT: A NATIONAL GUARD OFFICER IS INCLUDED AMONG THE CASUALTIES WE INFLICTED DURING THIS AMBUSH CARRIED OUT ON KM 9.5 ON THE NORTHERN TRUNK ROAD."}, {"text": "LIKEWISE, WE HAVE LEARNED THAT FIGHTING CONTINUES IN MEJICANOS, AYUTUXTEPEQUE, CIUDAD DELGADO, AND SOYAPANGO."}, {"text": "HEAVY FIGHTING IS ALSO BEING REPORTED IN APOPA AND MARIONA."}, {"text": "REBEL FORCES ARE SPREADING OUT THROUGHOUT THE NORTHERN AREA OF SAN SALVADOR AND THEY ARE FINDING LITTLE RESISTANCE."}, {"text": "AT 1616 (2216 GMT), THIS HAS BEEN THE REPORT RECEIVED AT RADIO VENCEREMOS."}, {"text": "WE ARE RECEIVING REPORTS FROM OUR LIBERATED TERRORITORIES, FROM CHALATE (CHALATENANGO), MORAZAN, SAN MIGUEL."}, {"text": "GREETINGS TO OUR FORCES IN SAN SALVADOR; ONWARDS FIGHTING COMRADES; OUR PEOPLE ARE SUPPORTING YOU IN SAN SALVADOR."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0078", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", {"sentences": [{"text": "ATTENTION PLEASE, LISTENERS OF YSKL."}, {"text": "WE CONTINUE REPORTING ON THE RECENT INCIDENTS IN THE CAPITAL."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO REPORTS WE HAVE RECEIVED, THE PRESIDENCIAL RESIDENCE LOCATED IN THE ESCALON NEIGHBORHOOD WAS TARGET OF AN ATTACK TONIGHT."}, {"text": "WE HAVE ALSO LEARNED THAT TWO VEHICLES OF THE SALVADORAN RED CROSS HAVE ALSO BEEN ATTACKED."}, {"text": "ONE OF THEM WAS TOTALLY DESTROYED BY FIRE IN THE MEJICANOS SECTOR, AND AN AMBULANCE WAS ATTACKED NEAR THE NATIONAL UNIVERSITY."}, {"text": "WE HAVE ALSO RECEIVED REPORTS FROM THE NORTHERN NATIONAL GUARD SECTOR IN THE SAN JOAQUIN NEIGHBORHOOD AND SURROUNDING AREAS, FROM WHERE THE ATTACKS AGAINST THE NATIONAL GUARD HEADQUARTERS ARE BEING LAUNCHED."}, {"text": "HERE IS FRANCISCO BENITEZ WITH AN IMPORTANT LAST MINUTE REPORT."}, {"text": "GO AHEAD, FRANCISCO: (BEGIN RELAY) GOOD EVENING YSKL LISTENERS."}, {"text": "WE HAVE CONFIRMED THAT CLASHES CONTINUE AT THIS TIME OF THE NIGHT NEAR THE UNIVERSITY OF EL SALVADOR BETWEEN URBAN COMMANDOES OF THE FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT (FMLN) AND MEMBERS OF THE 1ST INFANTRY BRIGADE WHO ARE IN AREA SURROUNDING THE UNIVERSITY OF EL SALVADOR, SPECIFICALLY IN FRONT OF THE INSTITUTE OF URBAN HOUSING, IVU, OFFICES."}, {"text": "THIS IS A DARK SECTOR."}, {"text": "ALL CIVILIANS, PEDESTRIANS, AND DRIVERS ARE ASKED TO AVOID THIS SECTOR BECAUSE HEAVY SHOOTING CONTINUES IN THE AREA BETWEEN REBELS AND MEMBERS OF THE 1ST INFANTRY BRIGADE."}, {"text": "WE HAVE CONFIRMED THAT THERE IS A HEAVY EXCHANGE OF FIRE IN THIS SECTOR."}, {"text": "WE HAVE BEEN TOLD THAT PEDESTRIANS AND DRIVERS SHOULD BE WARNED TO AVOID THIS AREA, AS THERE IS HEAVY SHOOTING NEAR THE UNIVERSITY OF EL SALVADOR."}, {"text": "WE HAVE CONFIRMED THIS."}, {"text": "WE CAN HEAR SHOOTING EVERYWHERE IN THIS SECTOR, PARTICULARLY IN FRONT OF THE IVU OFFICES."}, {"text": "MEMBERS OF THE CIVIL DEFENSE IN MEJICANOS HAVE JUST CONFIRMED THAT THEY ARE ALSO FIGHTING IN MEJICANOS AT THIS TIME OF THE NIGHT."}, {"text": "STAY TUNED, AS WE WILL CONTINUE REPORTING."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0080", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": {"sentences": [{"text": "THE RESPECTED EL ESPECTADOR NEWSPAPER HAS REPORTED THAT COLOMBIAN JUSTICE MINISTER MONICA DE GREIFF, A KEY OFFICIAL IN THE WAR ON DRUG TRAFFICKING, HAS RESIGNED."}, {"text": "MEANWHILE, MEDELLIN METROPOLITAN POLICE ANNOUNCED THAT, EARLY THIS MORNING, UNIDENTIFIED PERSONS PLACED 11 BOMBS IN VARIOUS GOVERNMENT BANK BRANCHES."}, {"text": "SEVEN OF THESE BOMBS EXPLODED, CAUSING DAMAGE, BUT THERE WERE NO VICTIMS."}, {"text": "JUSTICE MINISTER MONICA DE GREIFF, 32, WENT TO THE UNITED STATES ON 25 AUGUST TO SUBMIT A SPECIFIC PLAN ON THE USE OF A $2-MILLION U.S. GRANT TO PROVIDE SECURITY TO COLOMBIAN JUDGES."}, {"text": "EL ESPECTADOR SAID THAT "RUMORS OF A POSSIBLE CABINET RESHUFFLE GREW, AND IT WAS FULLY CONFIRMED THAT JUSTICE MINISTER MONICA DE GREIFF HAD RESIGNED AND WILL STAY FOR AN INDEFINITE PERIOD IN THE UNITED STATES.""}, {"text": "A JUSTICE MINISTRY SPOKESMAN DECLINED TO COMMENT ON THE NEWSPAPER REPORT, BUT A POLITICAL SOURCE OF THE RULING PARTY TOLD REUTER HE HAD HEARD THE MINISTER WAS GOING TO RESIGN."}, {"text": "ANOTHER SOURCE SAID GREIFF WILL STAY IN THE UNITED STATES FOR 12 DAYS AND THAT SHE WILL TENDER HER RESIGNATION UPON HER RETURN."}, {"text": "GREIFF, WHO WAS APPOINTED ON 16 JULY, WAS ASKED BEFORE LEAVING THE COUNTRY IF SHE WAS A WARTIME OR PEACETIME MINISTER."}, {"text": "SHE REPLIED: "I AM A PEACETIME MINISTER.""}, {"text": "LOCAL NEWS MEDIA AND POLITICAL SECTORS INTERPRETED THIS COMMENT AS AN ADVANCED NOTICE OF HER RESIGNATION."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0081", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": {"sentences": [{"text": "THE SIMON BOLIVAR NATIONAL COORDINATING BOARD (CNG) ASKED TODAY THAT THE DIALOGUE THE GOVERNMENT HAS ANNOUNCED THAT IT WILL HOLD WITH TWO OF THE SIX ARMED ORGANIZATIONS OPERATING IN THE COUNTRY BE HELD "WITH ALL" (ARMED GROUPS)."}, {"text": "THE CNG ALSO REQUESTED AN "OPEN AGENDA" FOR ALL OF THESE TALKS AND PRAISED THE "GOVERNMENT'S RECENT WILLINGNESS TO HOLD TALKS.""}, {"text": "IN ITS REQUEST FOR A "DIALOGUE WITH ALL," THE CNG, THROUGH A DECLARATION ISSUED "FROM THE COLOMBIAN MOUNTAINS" AND BROADCAST ON THE MEDIA, STATES: "WE HAVE NAMED A HIGH-LEVEL COMMISSION AND EXPECT THE GOVERNMENT TO DO THE SAME.""}, {"text": "IN ITS DECLARATION, THE CNG "REITERATES ITS DESIRE TO FIND A POLITICAL SOLUTION TO THE ARMED CONFLICT" IN COLOMBIA."}, {"text": ""WE ARE PLEASED ABOUT THE PATH THAT IS BEING OPENED TOWARD CONSTITUTIONAL REFORMS THROUGH THE REFERENDUM AND THE PLEBISCITE," THE DOCUMENT ADDS."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, THE COMMUNIQUE ALSO MAINTAINS THAT "IN VIEW OF THE VARIOUS APPROACHES SUGGESTED, WE REAFFIRM OUR BELIEF THAT ONLY A NATIONAL CONSTITUENT ASSEMBLY WITH BROAD POPULAR PARTICIPATION WILL ENSURE THAT THE CHANGES DEMANDED BY THE MAJORITIES WILL BE MADE.""}, {"text": "IN ADDITION TO THE NATIONAL CONSTITUENT ASSEMBLY, "THERE SHOULD ALSO BE TRUE ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL REFORMS AS WELL AS THE EFFECTIVE EXERCISE OF NATIONAL SOVEREIGNTY.""}, {"text": "THE DECLARATION CONDEMNS "THE DIRTY WAR, WHICH, IN THE PAST FEW DAYS, HAS RESULTED IN THE ASSASSINATIONS OF JUDGES, LEFT-WING POLITICAL LEADERS, LABOR UNION LEADERS, AND PEASANTS, AND IN THE ATTEMPTED MURDER OF PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES.""}, {"text": "THE DOCUMENT IS SIGNED BY JACOBO ARENAS, IDEOLOGUE AND LEADER OF THE REVOLUTIONARY ARMED FORCES OF COLOMBIA, AND BY JAVIER ROBLES FROM THE PRO - MAOIST POPULAR LIBERATION ARMY."}, {"text": "IT WAS ANNOUNCED LAST WEEK THAT THESE GROUPS WILL JOIN THE DIALOGUE WITH THE GOVERNMENT."}, {"text": "GILFARDO FERNANDEZ FROM THE PRO - INDIAN QUINTIN LAME FRONT AND VALENTIN GONZALEZ FROM THE REVOLUTIONARY WORKERS PARTY ALSO SIGNED THE DOCUMENT."}, {"text": "THE 19 APRIL MOVEMENT -- WHICH, SINCE JANUARY, HAS BEEN NEGOTIATING WITH THE GOVERNMENT FOR ITS REINCORPORATION INTO CIVILIAN LIFE -- AND THE PRO - CASTRO ARMY OF NATIONAL LIBERATION -- WHICH HAS ALWAYS REFUSED TO HOLD A DIALOGUE -- ARE ALSO MEMBERS OF THE CNG."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0086", "message_template": 1, "message_template_optional": true, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 07 AUG 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "strings": ["JUDGES"], "document_mentions": [[1379, 1385]], "sentence_mentions": {"7": [[108, 114]]}}, {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["LEFT-WING POLITICAL LEADERS", "POLITICAL LEADERS"], "document_mentions": [[1387, 1414], [1397, 1414]], "sentence_mentions": {"7": [[116, 143], [126, 143]]}}, {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["LABOR UNION LEADERS"], "document_mentions": [[1416, LEADERS", "POLITICAL LEADERS"]}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["DEATH"], "strings_rhs": ["LABOR UNION LEADERS"]}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["DEATH"], "strings_rhs": {"sentences": [{"text": "IS THERE ANY UNREST BECAUSE OF SOME OF THE LAWS PASSED BY CONGRESS?"}, {"text": "(AZCONA) NO, THERE IS NO UNREST BECAUSE OF LAWS PASSED BY CONGRESS."}, {"text": "SOME MEASURES THAT HAVE AFFECTED INCOME HAVE BEEN ADOPTED, BUT WE WILL MAKE PROGRESS ANYHOW."}, {"text": "(GIRON) WILL YOU ASK THAT SOME OF THESE LAWS BE RECONSIDERED?"}, {"text": "(AZCONA) NO, I AM NOT GOING TO DO THAT."}, {"text": "THERE IS, HOWEVER, THE LAW ON COFFEE TAXES WHICH COULD BE DISCUSSED WITH PRODUCERS BECAUSE THE LAW-DECREE ON COFFEE IS VERY DRASTIC."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, THE COUNTRY IS MAKING PROGRESS, AND ECONOMIC ACTIVITIES IN VARIOUS SECTORS--COMMERCE, CONSTRUCTION, AND MANUFACTURING--ARE ON THE INCREASE."}, {"text": "SOME SECTORS HAVE SOME PROBLEMS, BUT I BELIEVE WE ARE GOING TO RESOLVE THOSE PROBLEMS."}, {"text": "(GIRON) DO YOU HAVE ECONOMIC ADVISERS, MR PRESIDENT?"}, {"text": "(AZCONA) ANY PERSON CONSULTED IS AN ECONOMIC ADVISER."}, {"text": "THE MAIN ECONOMIC ADVISERS, HOWEVER, ARE THOSE IN THE GOVERNMENT."}, {"text": "(GIRON) IT IS BEING SAID THAT POLITICALLY SPEAKING YOU HAVE BEEN LEFT ON YOUR OWN."}, {"text": "IS THIS HOW YOU SEE IT ALSO?"}, {"text": "(AZCONA) NO WAY."}, {"text": "HOW COULD I BE ALONE?"}, {"text": "ON THE CONTRARY, WE ARE DOING WELL."}, {"text": "I BELIEVE WE ARE GOING TO RECEIVE MORE SUPPORT."}, {"text": "I DO NOT SEE WHY I COULD BE LEFT ALONE."}, {"text": "THERE IS THE GOVERNMENT AND THE EXPERTS."}, {"text": "WE ARE ESTABLISHING RELATIONS WITH THE PARTY, WITH THE MOST IMPORTANT PEOPLE OF THE PARTY."}, {"text": "(GIRON) ARE EMPLOYEES GOING TO BE PRESSURED?"}, {"text": "(AZCONA) I DO NOT BELIEVE THEY ARE GOING TO BE FORCED TO DO ANYTHING BECAUSE NO LAW SAYS THAT THE EMPLOYEES OF A GOVERNMENT MUST SUPPORT ANY PARTICULAR PARTY."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, I BELIEVE THAT IF THE EXECUTIVE BRANCH WORKS IN UNISON, AS IT HAS BEEN DOING, THEN ALL MEMBERS OF THE LIBERAL PARTY WILL BE HAPPY TO MAKE CONTRIBUTIONS TO THE PARTY TO GUARANTEE A NEW VICTORY."}, {"text": "(GIRON) WOULD YOU SUPPORT REFORMS TO THE ELECTORAL LAW?"}, {"text": "(AZCONA) WE DISCUSSED THAT ISSUE TODAY."}, {"text": "APPARENTLY THE NATIONAL CONVENTION, WHICH IS THE PARTY'S TOP AUTHORITY, HAS APPROVED SOME REFORMS."}, {"text": "(GIRON) DO YOU AGREE WITH INTERNAL ELECTIONS TAKING PLACE SIMULTANEOUSLY (AS HEARD)?"}, {"text": "(AZCONA) I BELIEVE IT WOULD BE BENEFICIAL IF THEY TAKE PLACE IN ONE SINGLE DAY, BUT WE DID NOT DISCUSS THAT TODAY, AND I DO NOT WANT TO DISCUSS DETAILS ABOUT THAT."}, {"text": "(GIRON) DO YOU BELIEVE THAT EITHER YOUR GOVERNMENT OR YOURSELF COULD HAVE BEEN POLITICALLY HARMED BY THE LATEST CRISIS ENDURED BY THE COUNTRY?"}, {"text": "(AZCONA) I DO NOT THINK SO."}, {"text": "I THINK THAT WHAT HAPPENED WILL BENEFIT THE COUNTRY."}, {"text": "ACTS OF VIOLENCE ARE REGRETTABLE, BUT THOSE THAT HAVE TAKEN PLACE HAVE SHOWN THAT WE IN HONDURAS ARE NOT IMMUNE TO VIOLENCE."}, {"text": "THE SAME DAY INCIDENTS WERE TAKING PLACE HERE, 13 PERSONS DIED IN SAN SALVADOR AS A RESULT OF A BOMB EXPLOSION."}, {"text": "THE LOSS OF LIVES IS UNFORTUNATE AND VIOLENCE AGAINST A BUILDING AND FACILITIES NEXT TO THE U.S. EMBASSY IS REGRETTABLE BECAUSE THIS DOES NOT HELP THE COUNTRY."}, {"text": "(GIRON) HAVE YOU TALKED WITH U.S. GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS ABOUT AN INDEMNITY?"}, {"text": "IT IS BEING SAID THAT DAMAGE AMOUNTS TO $6 MILLION."}, {"text": "(AZCONA) NO, WE HAVE NOTHING ABOUT $6 MILLION."}, {"text": "WHAT WE HAVE RECEIVED IS A NOTE FROM THE U.S. AMBASSADOR THE DAY AFTER THE INCIDENTS."}, {"text": "THEY ARE ENTITLED TO FILE A PROTEST."}, {"text": "THE NOTE SAYS THAT LATER THERE WILL BE A (WORDS INDISTINCT)."}, {"text": "HONDURAS SIGNED THE GENEVA CONVENTION ON THE RESPONSIBILITY OF GOVERNMENTS WHEN ACTIONS ARE CARRIED OUT AGAINST DIPLOMATIC INSTALLATIONS."}, {"text": "(GIRON) THE FORCING OF RADIO STATIONS TO JOIN A RADIO NETWORK AND THE IMPOSING OF A STATE OF EMERGENCY HAVE BEEN THE SOURCE OF MUCH CRITICISM AGAINST YOUR GOVERNMENT."}, {"text": "(AZCONA) I HAVE HEARD SOME CRITICISM BECAUSE OF THE NETWORK."}, {"text": "PERHAPS WE HAD IT FOR A FEW HOURS TOO MANY."}, {"text": "REGARDING THE STATE OF EMERGENCY, HOWEVER, THE PEOPLE HAVE RESPONDED POSITIVELY BECAUSE ONE MORE CASUALTY WOULD HAVE HAD NEGATIVE EFFECTS."}, {"text": "THE STATE OF EMERGENCY MADE IT POSSIBLE FOR PEOPLE TO COOL DOWN, AND THOSE ON THE STREETS RETURNED TO THEIR HOMES."}, {"text": "I FEEL IT WAS BENEFICIAL."}, {"text": "THE DECLARATION OF EMERGENCY DECREE WAS BASED ON THE CONSTITUTION AND ON PRESIDENTIAL AUTHORITY."}, {"text": "CONGRESS WAS INFORMED ABOUT THIS."}, {"text": "I BELIEVE THIS WAS A POSITIVE MEASURE, AND THIS IS HOW THE PEOPLE HAVE VIEWED IT, POSITIVELY."}, {"text": "(GIRON) DO YOU BELIEVE THE SITUATION HAS BEEN OVERCOME?"}, {"text": "(AZCONA) WE DO NOT KNOW IF THE SITUATION IS OVER."}, {"text": "I THINK SO."}, {"text": "I BELIEVE THAT WHAT HAPPENED IS THAT TEMPERS GOT HOT FOR A MOMENT, AND THAT SOME SECTORS, WHICH I DO NOT WANT TO NAME BECAUSE THEY HAVE BEEN IDENTIFIED BY THE PEOPLE, TOOK ADVANTAGE OF THIS."}, {"text": "PERHAPS SOME PEOPLE TRIED TO MAKE POLITICAL GAINS AND THE SITUATION GOT OUT OF HAND."}, {"text": "I BELIEVE, HOWEVER, THAT EVERYTHING IS MORE OR LESS QUIET."}, {"text": "THE GOVERNMENT IS TALKING WITH THE VARIOUS SECTORS."}, {"text": "THERE IS A SMALL STRIKE BY A SMALL GROUP OF HEALTH WORKERS."}, {"text": "CHECKS WITH SALARY INCREASES COVERING A 4-MONTH PERIOD WILL BE PAID TODAY."}, {"text": "SOME READJUSTMENTS WILL BE MADE TO FAVOR SOME EMPLOYEES WHO HAVE NOT RECEIVED THE INCREASES WE HAD PROMISED."}, {"text": "WE WANT TO APPEAL TO HEALTH SECTOR LABOR UNIONS TO SET ASIDE ANY CONFRONTATIONAL ATTITUDE BECAUSE THE GOVERNMENT IS MEETING AND WILL MEET ALL ITS COMMITMENTS."}, {"text": "(GIRON) WHAT CAN YOU TELL US ABOUT THE LATEST INCIDENTS WITH NICARAGUA?"}, {"text": "(AZCONA) THESE ARE NOT THE FIRST INCIDENTS."}, {"text": "I BELIEVE INCIDENTS WILL CONTINUE HAPPENING."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, THE GOVERNMENT IS PREPARED TO ENFORCE RESPECT FOR THE COUNTRY'S SOVEREIGNTY."}, {"text": "(END RECORDING)"}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0090", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["- 29 APR 88"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], "document_mentions": [], "sentence_mentions": {}}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["SAN SALVADOR"], "strings_rhs": ["CITY"], "document_mentions": [[2545, 2557]], "sentence_mentions": {"32": [[66, 78]]}}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["SAN SALVADOR"], "strings_rhs": ["DEPARTMENT"], "document_mentions": [[2545, 2557]], "sentence_mentions": {"32": [[66, 78]]}}], "incident_type": "BOMBING", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["ACCOMPLISHED"]}, "incident_instrument_id": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["BOMB"], "document_mentions": [[2575, 2579]], "sentence_mentions": {"32": [[96, 100]]}}], "perp_incident_category": null, "perp_individual_id": null, "perp_organization_id": null, "perp_organization_confidence": null, "phys_tgt_id": null, "phys_tgt_effect_of_incident": null, "hum_tgt_name": null, "hum_tgt_description": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["PERSONS"], "document_mentions": [[2529, 2536]], "sentence_mentions": {"32": [[50, 57]]}}], "hum_tgt_effect_of_incident": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["DEATH"], "strings_rhs": ["PERSONS"]}]}, "hit_id": 182}

INCREASES WE HAD PROMISED."}, {"text": "WE WANT TO APPEAL TO HEALTH SECTOR LABOR UNIONS TO SET ASIDE ANY CONFRONTATIONAL ATTITUDE BECAUSE THE GOVERNMENT IS MEETING AND WILL MEET ALL ITS COMMITMENTS."}, {"text": "(GIRON) WHAT CAN YOU TELL US ABOUT THE LATEST INCIDENTS WITH NICARAGUA?"}, {"text": "(AZCONA) THESE ARE NOT THE FIRST INCIDENTS."}, {"text": "I BELIEVE INCIDENTS WILL CONTINUE HAPPENING."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, THE GOVERNMENT IS PREPARED TO ENFORCE RESPECT FOR THE COUNTRY'S SOVEREIGNTY."}, {"text": "(END RECORDING)"}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0090", {"sentences": [{"text": "GUERRILLA UNITS ARE FIGHTING SALVADORAN GOVERNMENT FORCES A FEW METERS FROM THEIR GENERAL BARRACKS AND IN THE CAPITAL NEIGHBORHOODS OF SAN MARTIN AND GENERAL ARCE."}, {"text": "A COMMUNIQUE ISSUED BY THE FARABUNDO MARTI NATIONAL LIBERATION FRONT, FMLN, AND BROADCAST BY RADIO VENCEREMOS INDICATES THAT THE INSURGENT FORCES THIS MORNING PENETRATED PERIPHERAL NEIGHBORHOODS OF SAN SALVADOR."}, {"text": "THE COMMUNIQUE ALSO SAYS THAT HEAVY FIGHTING IS TAKING PLACE NEAR THE SAN BENITO POLICE BARRACKS, THE ZONA ROSA, THE NATIONAL MUSEUM, AND THE INTERNATIONAL FAIR."}, {"text": "RADIO VENCEREMOS REPORTS THAT FIGHTING IS TAKING PLACE THROUGHOUT SAN SALVADOR; IT ALSO DENOUNCED THE DEATH OF MANY CIVILIANS DUE TO THE INDISCRIMINATE BOMBINGS OF THE GOVERNMENT'S AIR FORCE."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO INSURGENT RADIO VENCEREMOS THE PRESENCE OF THE GUERRILLA FORCES IN THE MAIN CITIES OF THE COUNTRY HAS ENCOURAGED POPULAR UPRISINGS AND THE GROWING PARTICIPATION OF THE POPULATION IN THE STRUGGLE."}, {"text": "THE REPORT ADDS THAT THE REBEL UNITS CONTINUE FIGHTING THE ARMY IN SEVEN OTHER DEPARTMENTS OF THE COUNTRY."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0093", "message_template": 1, "message_template_optional": true, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["14 NOV 89", "- 14 NOV 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EL SALVADOR"], "document_mentions": [], "sentence_mentions": {}}, {"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["SAN SALVADOR"], "strings_rhs": ["CITY"], "document_mentions": [[362, 374], [604, 616]], "sentence_mentions": {"1": [[198, 210]], "3": [[66, 78]]}}], "incident_type": "BOMBING / ATTACK", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["ACCOMPLISHED"]}, "incident_instrument_id": null, "perp_incident_category": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["STATE-SPONSORED VIOLENCE"]}, "perp_individual_id": null, "perp_organization_id": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["AIR FORCE"], "document_mentions": [[719, 728]], "sentence_mentions": {"3": [[181, 190]]}}], "perp_organization_confidence": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["REPORTED AS FACT"], "strings_rhs": ["AIR FORCE"]}], "phys_tgt_id": null, "phys_tgt_effect_of_incident": null, "hum_tgt_name": null, "hum_tgt_description": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["CIVILIANS"], "document_mentions": [[654, 663]], "sentence_mentions": {"3": [[116, 125]]}}], "hum_tgt_effect_of_incident": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["DEATH"], "strings_rhs": ["CIVILIANS"]}]}, "hit_id": 184}

{"sentences": [{"text": "GENERAL HECTOR GRAMAJO MORALES HAS REPORTED THAT LAST NIGHT'S TERRORIST ACTS WERE PROBABLY INTENDED TO DAMAGE GUATEMALAN AIR FORCE INSTALLATIONS, BUT ONE OF THE EXPLOSIVE DEVICES WENT OFF PREMATURELY."}, {"text": "HE ADDED THAT ONE OF THE EXPLOSIVE DEVICES HIT A WALL OF THE AIR FORCE INSTALLATIONS AND THE SHOCK WAVE FROM THE EXPLOSION DAMAGED SOME BUILDINGS."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO PRELIMINARY CONCLUSIONS, THE ATTACK WAS PROBABLY A PROPAGANDA PLOY BECAUSE THE DEVICES WERE RUDIMENTARY AND SIMILAR TO FIRECRACKERS."}, {"text": "THE TERRORIST ACTIONS SEEM TO BE MOTIVATED BY THE FACT THAT THE IRREGULAR GROUPS ARE SHRINKING CONSIDERABLY."}, {"text": "EVIDENCE OF THIS IS THE FACT THAT A SUBVERSIVE WHO SURRENDERED ON THE SOUTHERN COAST WAS CARRYING SOME IMPORTANT DOCUMENTS IN WHICH THE GUERRILLAS ADMITTED THAT THEY HAD MADE A BIG EFFORT TO SHOW THEIR PRESENCE, BUT THAT NOTHING SUBSTANTIAL RESULTED AND THEY SUFFERED MANY CASUALTIES INSTEAD, GRAMAJO SAID."}, {"text": "WHEN QUESTIONED ABOUT THE POSSIBLE IMPACT OF THESE TERRORIST ACTIONS ON THE TALKS BEING HELD IN OSLO, NORWAY, GRAMAJO SAID THAT THOSE WHO ARE TAKING PART IN THE TALKS DO NOT MAINTAIN CONTACT WITH THE GROUPS THAT CARRY OUT THE TERRORIST ACTIONS."}, {"text": "AMONG THOSE GROUPS, THERE IS ONE FACTION THAT IS CALLED THE INTERNATIONAL MILITANT GROUP."}, {"text": "THIS FACTION IS COMPRISED OF PERSONS WHO LOVE ADVENTURE; THESE PEOPLE TAKE ADVANTAGE OF SUBVERSIVE GROUPS TO ENGAGE IN SOME OF THESE ACTIVITIES."}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0095", "message_template": 1, "message_template_optional": true, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["17 MAY 90 - 18 MAY 90"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["GUATEMALA"], "document_mentions": [[110, 119]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[110, 119]]}}], "incident_type": "BOMBING", "incident_stage_of_execution": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["ACCOMPLISHED"]}, "incident_instrument_id": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["EXPLOSIVE DEVICES"], "document_mentions": [[161, 178], [226, 243]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[161, 178]], "1": [[25, 42]]}}], "perp_incident_category": {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["TERRORIST ACT"]}, "perp_individual_id": [{"optional": true, "type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["TERRORIST"], "document_mentions": [[62, 71], [498, 507], [961, 970], [1136, 1145]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[62, 71]], "3": [[4, 13]], "5": [[51, 60], [226, 235]]}}], "perp_organization_id": null, "perp_organization_confidence": null, "phys_tgt_id": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["AIR FORCE INSTALLATIONS"], "document_mentions": [[121, 144], [262, 285]], "sentence_mentions": {"0": [[121, 144]], "1": [[61, 84]]}}, {"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["BUILDINGS"], "document_mentions": [[337, 346]], "sentence_mentions": {"1": [[136, 145]]}}], "phys_tgt_effect_of_incident": [{"type": "colon_clause", "strings_lhs": ["SOME DAMAGE"], "strings_rhs": ["BUILDINGS"]}], "hum_tgt_name": null, "hum_tgt_description": null, "hum_tgt_effect_of_incident": null}, "hit_id": 185}

{"sentences": [{"text": "THE GUATEMALAN ASSOCIATION OF UNIVERSITY STUDENTS (AEU), WHOSE TOP LEADERS WERE KIDNAPPED, MURDERED, OR HAD TO GO INTO HIDING DURING THE LAST FEW WEEKS, TODAY DEMANDED THE INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITY'S SOLIDARITY TO CONTAIN THE WAVE OF VIOLENCE THAT HAS SHAKEN THE COUNTRY OVER THE LAST 2 MONTHS."}, {"text": "TWO MEMBERS OF THE AEU COORDINATING BOARD, WHO LAST WEEK WENT INTO EXILE, SAID THAT IT IS URGENT THAT A PERMAMENT UN RAPPORTEUR BE SENT TO GUATEMALA TO CERTIFY THE CONTINUAL AND INCREASING HUMAN RIGHTS VIOLATIONS IN THE COUNTRY."}, {"text": "THE UNIVERSITY STUDENTS ALSO CALLED FOR GOVERNMENTS AND INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATIONS TO SEND DELEGATIONS TO GUATEMALA AS SOON AS POSSIBLE, "TO PRESSURE THE VINICIO CEREZO GOVERNMENT TO STOP THE CAMPAIGN OF TERROR AND THE BLOODBATH BEING PREPARED BY THE ARMY TO CONTAIN THE STUDENT AND PEOPLES' MOVEMENTS.""}, {"text": "THE AEU REPRESENTATIVES SAID THEY HAD EVIDENCE THAT THE RECENT KIDNAPPING OF 12 STUDENT LEADERS, OUT OF WHICH 5 WERE LATER FOUND MURDERED WITH BRUTAL SIGNS OF TORTURE, "WAS DIRECTLY PLANNED AND CARRIED OUT BY THE GUATEMALAN ARMY."}, {"text": "THESE SAME STUDENTS BELIEVE THAT VINICIO CEREZO'S CHRISTIAN DEMOCRATIC GOVERNMENT "KNOWS WHO IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE CAMPAIGN OF TERROR, AND IT WILL NOT TAKE ACTION BECAUSE THE GOVERNMENT IS AN ACCOMPLICE OF THE MILITARY.""}, {"text": "THE AEU LEADERS, WHO DID NOT DARE GIVE THEIR NAMES BECAUSE THEIR FAMILIES "COULD SUFFER WORSE CONSEQUENCES IN GUATEMALA," INSISTED THAT "THE ONLY THING REMAINING FOR GUATEMALANS TO FACE THE TERROR AND VIOLENCE IS INTERNATIONAL SOLIDARITY.""}, {"text": ""THE SITUATION IS TERRIBLE."}, {"text": "THE HUMAN RIGHTS PROSECUTOR HIMSELF TOLD US THAT HE COULD DO NOTHING TO CONTAIN THIS WAVE OF REPRESSION AND ADVISED US THAT WE BETTER SEEK INTERNATIONAL PRESSURE," ONE OF THE EXILED AEU LEADERS SAID."}, {"text": "ACCORDING TO THEM, THE WAVE OF REPRESSION OVER THE LAST FEW WEEKS AGAINST GUATEMALAN UNIVERSITY STUDENTS "IS THE WORST SINCE 1978," WHEN NUMEROUS UNIVERSITY LEADERS WERE MURDERED, INCLUDING AEU SECRETARY GENERAL OLIVERIO CASTANEDA, KILLED AT POINT-BLANK RANGE WHILE HEADING A DEMONSTRATION IN THE MIDDLE OF THE CAPITAL."}, {"text": "CASTANEDA'S MURDER FORCED THE AEU TO ELIMINATE THE POST OF SECRETARY GENERAL AND MODIFY ITS STRATEGIES SO ITS TOP LEADERS WOULD NOT BECOME EASY TARGETS OF REPRESSION."}, {"text": "HOWEVER, IN LIGHT OF THE LATEST EVENTS, THESE CHANGES SEEM TO HAVE HAD LITTLE EFFECT."}, {"text": ""BECAUSE NOW THEY CANNOT IDENTIFY ANY PARTICULAR LEADER TO KILL, LIKE THEY DID WITH OLIVERIO, THIS TIME THEY HAVE ATTACKED US ALL," ONE OF THE BANISHED LEADERS , WHO ARRIVED IN COSTA RICA LAST WEEKEND, SAID."}, {"text": "SINCE 21 AUGUST, WHEN THE CAMPAIGN OF STUDENT KIDNAPPINGS AND MURDERS BEGAN, OF THE 16 MEMBERS OF THE AEU EXECUTIVE COORDINATING BOARD, THREE WERE MURDERED, SEVEN ARE STILL MISSING, FOUR HAD TO GO INTO HIDING, AND TWO WENT INTO EXILE."}, {"text": ""I WAS TOLD THROUGH A FRIEND: YOUR TURN IS ON 4 SEPTEMBER."}, {"text": "I THEN HAD TO HIDE UNTIL I WAS ABLE TO LEAVE THE COUNTRY," ONE OF THE EXILED TOLD AFP WITH ANGUISH."}, {"text": ""WE REALLY DID NOT EXPECT THIS."}, {"text": "WE THOUGHT WE WERE GOING TO BE POLITICALLY NEUTRALIZED, BUT NEVER THOUGHT THEY WOULD ORDER US KIDNAPPED AND MURDERED," ANOTHER OF THE STUDENTS ADMITTED."}, {"text": "FOR BOTH LEADERS "THE ARMY'S REPRESSIVE CAMPAIGN AGAINST THE AEU SEEKS TO SCARE THE POPULATION AND STOP THE PEOPLE'S MOVEMENT THAT BECAME MOTIVATED FOLLOWING THE LAST TEACHERS' STRIKE ALL OVER THE COUNTRY.""}, {"text": "HOWEVER, THEY CONCLUDED, "THE ARMY WILL NEVER BE ABLE TO END THE AEU BECAUSE TO DO SO THE ARMY WOULD HAVE TO KIDNAP, MURDER, OR SEND INTO EXILE THE 60,000 SAN CARLOS UNIVERSITY STUDENTS, THE LARGEST AND OLDEST UNIVERSITY IN CENTRAL AMERICA.""}], "template": {"message_id": "TST2-MUC4-0098", "message_template": 1, "incident_date": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["21 AUG 89 - 27 SEP 89"]}], "incident_location": [{"type": "simple_strings", "strings": ["GUATEMALA"], "document_mentions": [[4, 13], [432, 441], [629, 638], [1040, 1049], [1389, 1398], [1445, 1454], {"sentences": [{"text": "COLOMBIAN OFFICIALS REPORT THAT GUERRILLAS PRESUMED TO BE MEMBERS OF THE PRO-CASTRO ARMY OF NATIONAL LIBERATION (ELN) TODAY ONCE AGAIN DYNAMITED THE CANO LIMON-COVENAS OIL PIPELINE, COLOMBIA'S MAJOR OIL PIPELINE."}, {"text": "AN ECOPETROL (COLOMBIAN PETROLEUM ENTERPRISE) SPOKESMAN SAID THAT THE EXPLOSION TOOK PLACE AT KM - 102 OF THE PIPE NEAR BENADIA IN ARAUCA INTENDANCY, IN THE EASTERN PART OF THE COUNTRY."}, {"text": "THIS ATTACK TAKES PLACE 25 DAYS AFTER A PREVIOUS GUERRILLA ACTION, WHICH INTERRUPTED THE PUMPING OF CRUDE THROUGH THE 780 - KM LONG PIPELINE."}, {"text": "ON 16 JUNE, THE ELN DESTROYED THE CANO LIMON-COVENAS OIL TERMINAL ON COLOMBIA'S ATLANTIC COAST, IN WHAT IS CONSIDERED THE MOST SERIOUS ATTACK AGAINST COLOMBIA'S PETROLEUM INDUSTRY IN ITS HISTORY."}, {"text": "SINCE THAT TIME, COLOMBIA HAS BEEN FORCED TO SUSPEND AN AVERAGE OF 180,000 OF THE 220,000 DAILY BARRELS OF CRUDE PIPED THROUGH THE COUNTRY'S LEADING PIPELINE."}, {"text": "TODAY'S ATTACK IS THE 25TH DURING 1989, AND THE THIRD THIS WEEK, THE ECOPETROL SPOKESMAN REVEALED."}, {"text": "THE ELN'S ATTACKS HAVE REDUCED THE NATION'S HYDROCARBON PRODUCTION THIS YEAR BY 20 PERCENT, WITH LOSSES EXCEEDING $180 MILLION."}, {"text": "THE ELN HAS DYNAMITED THE CANO LIMON-COVENAS PIPELINE 125 TIMES SINCE JANUARY 1988, CAUSING LOSSES OF MORE THAN $450 MILLION AS A RESULT OF OIL SPILLS, HALTED PRODUCTION, THE SUSPENSION OF EXPORTS, AND ECOLOGICAL DAMAGE, THE ECOPETROL SPOKESMAN ADDED."}, {"text": "DURING THE 25 YEARS OF ITS ARMED STRUGGLE, THE ELN -- LED BY FORMER
